GE07bhg4c02u:6: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca - taṃ tathety ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:7: aśrubhiḥ pūrṇe ākule īkṣaṇe yasya taṃ tathā,
GE07bhg4c02u:8: ukta-prakāreṇa visam arjunaṃ prati madhusūdana idaṃ vākyam uvāca //1//
GE07bhg4c02u:10_0: ahiṃsā paramo dharmo bhikṣāśanaṃ cety evaṃ-lakṣaṇayā buddhyā yuddha-vaimukhyam arjunasya
GE07bhg4c02u:10_1: śrutvā svaputrāṇāṃ rājyam apracalitam avadhārya svastha-hṛdayasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya
GE07bhg4c02u:10_2: harṣa-nimittāṃ tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity ākāṅkṣām apaninīṣuḥ saṃjayas taṃ pratyuktavān
GE07bhg4c02u:13: arjunasya karmatvaṃ kṛpāyāś ca kartṛtvaṃ vadatā tasyā āgantukatvaṃ vyudastam /
GE07bhg4c02u:14: ataeva viṣīdantaṃ sneha-viṣayī-bhūta-svajana-vicchedāśaṅkā-nimittaḥ śokāpara-paryāyaś citta-vyākulī-bhāvo viṣādas taṃ prāpnuvantam /
GE07bhg4c02u:15: atra viṣādasya karmatvenārjunasya kartṛtvena ca tasyāgantukatvaṃ sūcitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:16: ataeva kṛpā-viṣāda-vaśād aśrubhiḥ pūrṇe ākule darśanākṣame cekṣaṇe yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c02u:17: evam aśru-pāta-vyākulī-bhāvākhya-kārya-dvaya-janakatayā paripoṣaṃ gatābhyāṃ kṛpā-viṣādābhyām udvignaṃ tam arjunam idaṃ sopapattikaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ vākyam uvāca na tūpekṣitavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:19: svayaṃ duṣṭa-nigraha-kartārjunaṃ praty api tathaiva vakṣyatīti bhāvaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c02u:26: evam arjuna-vairāgyam upaśrutya sva-putra-rājyābhraṃśāśayā hṛṣyantaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭram ālakṣya sañjaya uvāca taṃ tatheti /
GE07bhg4c02u:27: madhusūdana iti tasya śokam api madhuvan nihaniṣyatīti bhāvaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c02u:31: kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:33: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva vākyam āha śrī-bhagavān uvāca kuta iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:34: kuto hetos tvā tvāṃ viṣame saṅkaṭe idaṃ kuśalaṃ samupasthitam ayaṃ mohaḥ prāptaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:38: tad eva bhagavato vākyam avatārayati kutas tveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:44: etādṛśaṃ samagramaiśvaryādikaṃ nityam apratibandhena yatra vartate sa bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:46: utpattiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim /
GE07bhg4c02u:47: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti // [ViP 6.78]
GE07bhg4c02u:51: etādṛśo bhagavac-chabdārthaḥ śrī-vāsudeva eva paryavasita iti tathocyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:52_0: idaṃ svadharmāt parāṅmukhatvaṃ kṛpā-vyāmohāśru-pātādi-puraḥ-saraṃ kaśmalaṃ śiṣṭa-garhitatvena
GE07bhg4c02u:52_1: malinaṃ viṣame sa-bhaye sthāne tvā tvāṃ sarva-kṣatriya-pravaraṃ kuto hetoḥ samupasthitaṃ prāptam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:56: hetu-trayam api niṣedhati tribhir viśesaṇair uttarārdhena /
GE07bhg4c02u:58: sva-dharmair āśaya-śuddhi-dvārā moks icchadbhir apakva-kaṣāyair mumukṣubhiḥ kathaṃ sva-dharmas tyājya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:61: akīrtikaraṃ kīrty-abhāva-karam apakīrtikaraṃ vā na kīrtīcchayā sevyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:62: tathā ca mokṣa-kāmaiḥ svarga-kāmaiḥ kīrti-kāmaiś ca varjanīyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:64: sevasva ity aho anucitaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ taveti bhāvaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c02u:71: asvargyam akīrtikaram iti pāratrikaihika-sukha-pratikūlam ity arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c02u:72: baladevaḥ : tad vākyam anuvadati śrī-bhagavān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:78: idaṃ sva-dharma-vaimukhyaṃ kaśmalaṃ śiṣṭa-nindyatvān malinaṃ kuto hetos tvāṃ kṣatriya-cūḍāmaṇiṃ samupasthitam abhūt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:80: na ca mokṣāya svargāya kīrtaye vaitad-yuddha-vairāgyam ity āha anāryeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:87: klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:89: śrīdharaḥ : klaibyaṃ mā sma gama iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:93: yatas tvayi etan nopapadyate yogyaṃ na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:94: kṣudraṃ tucchaṃ hṛdaya-daurbalyaṃ kātaryaṃ yuddhāya uttiṣṭha,
GE07bhg4c02u:97: nanu bandhu-senāvekṣaṇa-jātenādhairyeṇa dhanur api dhārayitum aśaknuvatā mayā kiṃ kartuṃ śakyam ity ata āha klaibyam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:98: klaibyaṃ klīb-bhāvam adhairyam ojas-teja-ādi-bhaṅga-rūpaṃ mā sma gamo mā gā /
GE07bhg4c02u:100: pṛthayā deva-prasāda-labdhe tat-tanaya-mātre vīryātiśayasya prasiddhatvāt pṛthā-tanayatvena tvaṃ klaibyāyogya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:102: tvayi arjune sākṣān-maheśvareṇāpi saha kṛtāhave prakhyāta-mahā-prabhāve nopapadyate na yujyata etat-klaibyam ity asādhāraṇyena tad-ayogyatva-nirdeśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:103: nanu na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ iti pūrvam eva mayoktam ity āśaṅkyāha kṣudram iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:104: hṛdaya-daurbalyaṃ manaso bhramaṇādi-rūpam adhairyaṃ kṣudratva-kāraṇatvāt kṣudraṃ sunirasanaṃ vā tyaktvā vivekenāpanīyottiṣṭha yuddhāya sajjo bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:106: paraṃ śatruṃ tāpayatīti tathā saṃbodhyate hetu-garbham //3//
GE07bhg4c02u:109: he pārtheti tvaṃ pṛthā-putraḥ sann api gacchasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:114: nanv idaṃ śauryābhāva-lakṣaṇaṃ klaibyaṃ mā śaṅkiṣṭhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:115: kintu bhīṣma-droṇādi-guruṣu dharma-dṛṣṭyā viveko 'yaṃ dhārtarāṣṭreṣu tu durbaleṣu mad-astrāghātam āsādya martum udyateṣu dayaiveyam iti tatrāha kṣudram iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:122: baladevaḥ : nanu bandhu-kṣayādhyavasāya-doṣāt prakampitena mayā kiṃ bhāvyam iti cet tatrāha klaibyam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:125: klaibyaṃ kātaryaṃ mā sma gamaḥ prāpnuhi /
GE07bhg4c02u:126: tvayi viśva-vijetari mat-sakhe 'rjune kṣatra-bandhāv ivaitad īdṛśaṃ klaibyaṃ nopayujyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:127_0: nanu na me śauryābhāva-rūpaṃ klaibyaṃ kintu bhīṣmādiṣu pūjyeṣu dharma-buddhyā viveko
GE07bhg4c02u:127_1: 'yaṃ duryodhanādiṣu bhrātṛṣu mac-chastra-prahāreṇa mariṣyatsu kṛpeyam iti cet tatrāha kṣudram iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:136: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana /
GE07bhg4c02u:139: kintu yuddhasya anyāyyatvād adharmyatvāc cety āha arjuna uvāca katham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:140: bhīṣma-droṇau pūjārhau pūjāyām arho yogyau tau prati katham ahaṃ yotsyāmi,
GE07bhg4c02u:141: tatrāpi iṣubhiḥ yatra vācāpi yotsyāmīti vaktum anucitaṃ tatra bāṇaiḥ kathaṃ yotsyāmīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:144_0: nanu nāyaṃ svadharmasya tyāgaḥ śoka-mohādi-vaśāt kintu dharatvābhāvād adharmatvāc
GE07bhg4c02u:144_1: cāsya yuddhasya tyāgo mayā kriyata iti bhagavad-abhiprāyam apratipadyamānasyārjunasyābhiprāyam
GE07bhg4c02u:145: bhīṣmaṃ pitāmahaṃ droṇām cācāryaṃ saṅkhye raṇa iṣubhiḥ sāyakaiḥ pratiyotsyāmi prahariṣyāmi katham ?
GE07bhg4c02u:148: pūjārhābhyāṃ saha krīḍā-sthāne 'pi vācāpi harṣa-phalam api līlā-yuddham anucitaṃ kiṃ punar yuddha-bhūmau śaraiḥ prāṇa-tyāga-phalakaṃ praharaṇam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:150: ato na madhusūdanārisūdanety asyārthasya punar uktatvaṃ doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:151: yuddha-mātram api yatra nocitaṃ dūre tatra vadha iti pratiyotsyāmīty anena sūcitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:153: pūjārhayor eva vivaraṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ ceti /
GE07bhg4c02u:154: dvau brāhmaṇau bhojaya deva-dattaṃ yajña-dattaṃ cetivat sambandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:155: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - duryodhanādayo nāpuraskṛtya bhīṣma-droṇau yuddhāya sajjībhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:156: tatra tābhyāṃ saha yuddhaṃ na tāvad dharmaḥ pūjādivad avihitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:157: na cāyam aniṣiddhatvād adharmo 'pi na bhavatīti vācyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:158: guruṃ huṅkṛtya tvaṃkṛtya ity ādinā śabda-mātreṇāpi guru-droho yadāniṣṭa-phalatva-pradarśanena niṣiddhas tadā kiṃ vācyaṃ tābhyāṃ saha saṅgrāmasyādharmatve niṣiddhatve ceti //4//
GE07bhg4c02u:160: nanu pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjya-pūjā-vyatikramaḥ iti dharma-śāstram /
GE07bhg4c02u:161: ato 'haṃ yuddhān nivarta ity āha katham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:163: nanv etau yudhyete tarhy anayoḥ pratiyoddhā bhavituṃ tvaṃ kiṃ na śaknoṣi ?
GE07bhg4c02u:164: satyaṃ na śaknomy evety āha pūjārhāv iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:165: anayoś caraṇeṣu bhaktyā kusumāny eva dātum arhāmi na tu krodhena tīkṣṇa-śarān iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:166: bho vayasya kṛṣṇa tvam api śatrūn eva yuddhe haṃsi,
GE07bhg4c02u:168: nāpi bandhūn yadūn ity āha he madhusūdaneti /
GE07bhg4c02u:171: madhur nāma daityo yas tavārir iti bravīmīti //4//
GE07bhg4c02u:172: baladevaḥ : nanu bhīṣmādiṣu pratiyoddhṛṣu satsu tvayā kathaṃ na yoddhavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:173: āhūto na nivarteta iti yuddha-vidhānāc ca kṣatriyasyeti cet tatrāha katham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:177: parihāsa-vāgbhir api yābhyāṃ yuddhaṃ na yuktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:179: pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjya- pūjya-pūjā-vyatikramaḥ iti smṛteś ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:182: tad-bhāvaś ca tvam api śatrūn eva yuddhe nihaṃsi na tūgrasena-sāndīpany-ādīn pūjyān iti //4//
GE07bhg4c02u:189: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi tān ahatvā tava deha-yātrāpi na syād iti cet,
GE07bhg4c02u:191: gurūn droṇācāryādīn ahatvā para-loka-viruddhaṃ guru-vadham akṛtvā iha-loke bhaikṣyaṃ bhikṣānnam api bhoktuṃ śreya ucitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:192: vipakṣe tu na kevalaṃ paratra duḥkhaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:193: kintu ihaiva ca naraka-duḥkham anubhaveyam ity āha hatveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:194: gurūn hatvā ihaiva tu rudhireṇa pradigdhān prakarṣeṇa liptān artha-kāmātmakān bhogān ahaṃ bhuñjīya aśnīyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:195: yad vā artha-kāmān iti gurūṇāṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c02u:196: artha-tṛṣṇākulatvād ete tāvad yuddhān na nivarteran tasmād etad vadhaḥ prasajyetaivety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:198: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit /
GE07bhg4c02u:199: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ // iti [ṃBh 6.41.36] //5//
GE07bhg4c02u:203: na ca teṣāṃ gurutvena svīkāraḥ sāmpratam ucitaḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:206: iti smṛteḥ / tasmād eṣāṃ yuddha-garveṇāvaliptānām anyāya-rājya-grahaṇena śiṣya-droheṇa ca kāryākārya-viveka-śūnyānām utpatha-niṣṭhānāṃ vadha eva śreyān ity āśaṅkyāha gurūn iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:207: gurūn ahatvā para-lokas tāvad asty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:208_0: asmiṃs tu loke tair hṛta-rājyānāṃ no nṛpādīnāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhaikṣam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:208_1: praśasyataram ucitaṃ na tu tad-vadhena rājyam api śreya iti dharme 'pi yuddhe vṛtti-mātra-phalatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:209: nanv avaliptatvādinā teṣāṃ gurutvābhāva ukta ity āśaṅkyāha mahānubhāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:211: tathā ca kāla-kāmādayo 'pi yair vaśīkṛtās teṣāṃ puṇyātiśaya-śālināṃ nāvaliptatvādi-kṣudra-pāpma-saṃśleṣa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:213: himaṃ jāḍyam apahantīti himahā ādityo 'gnir vā tasyaivānubhāvaḥ sāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ tān /
GE07bhg4c02u:214: tathā cātitejasvitvāt teṣām avaliptatvādi-doṣo nāsty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:216: tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva-bhujo yathā // [BhP 10.33.30]
GE07bhg4c02u:217: nanu yadārtha-lubdhāḥ santo yuddhe pravṛttās tadaiṣāṃ vikrītātmanāṃ kutastyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ māhātmyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:219: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit /
GE07bhg4c02u:220: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ // [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:222: artha-lubdhā api te mad-apekṣayā guravo bhavanty eveti punar guru-grahaṇenoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:223: tu-śabdo 'py arthe īdṛśān api gurūn hatvā bhogān eva bhuñjīya na tu mokṣaṃ labheya /
GE07bhg4c02u:224: bhujyanta iti bhogā viṣayāḥ karmaṇi ghañ /
GE07bhg4c02u:225: te ca bhogā ihaiva na para-loke /
GE07bhg4c02u:226: ihāpi ca rudhira-pradigdhā ivāpayaśo-vyāptatvenātyanta-jugupsitā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:227: yadehāpy evaṃ tadā para-loka-duḥkhaṃ kiyad varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:228: athavā gurūn hatvārtha-kāmātmakān bhogān eva bhuñjīya na tu dharma-mokṣāv ity artha-kāma-padasya bhoga-viśeṣaṇatayā vyākhyānāntaraṃ draṣṭavyam //5//
GE07bhg4c02u:230: nanv evaṃ te yadi svarājye 'smin nāsti jighṛkṣā,
GE07bhg4c02u:231: tarhi kayā vṛttyā jīviṣyasīty atrāha gurūn ahatveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:232: guru-vadham akṛtvā bhaikṣyaṃ kṣatriyair vigītam api bhikṣānnam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:233: aihika-duryaśo-lābhe 'pi pāratrikam amaṅgalaṃ tu naiva syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:234: na caiva guravo 'valiptāḥ kāryākāryam ajānantaś cādhārmika-duryodhanādy-anugatās tyājyā eva / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c02u:239: kāla-kāmādayo 'pi yair vaśīkṛtās teṣāṃ bhīṣmādīnāṃ kutas tad-doṣa-sambhava iti bhāvaḥ / nanu -
GE07bhg4c02u:240: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit /
GE07bhg4c02u:241: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ // [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:242: iti yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati bhīṣmeṇaivoktam ataḥ sāmpratam artha-kāmatvād eteṣāṃ mahānubhāvatvaṃ prāktanaṃ vigalitam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:243: satyam, tad apy etān hatavato mama duḥkham eva syād ity āha artha-kāmānartha-lubdhān apy etān kurūn hatvāhaṃ bhogān bhuñjīya kintv eteṣāṃ rudhireṇa pradigdhān praliptān eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:244: ayam arthaḥ - eteṣām artha-lubdhatve 'pi mad-gurutvam asty eva,
GE07bhg4c02u:245: ataevaitad-vadhe sati guru-drohiṇo mama khalu bhogo duṣkṛti-miśraḥ syād iti //5//
GE07bhg4c02u:246: baladevaḥ : nanu svarājye spṛhā cet tava nāsti tarhi deha-yātrā vā kathaṃ setsyatīti cet tatrāha gurūn iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:247: gurūn ahatvā guru-vadham akṛtvā sthitasya me bhaikṣyānnaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nindyam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ praśastataram /
GE07bhg4c02u:249_0: nanv ete bhīṣmādayo guravo 'pi yuddha-garvāvalepāt chadmanā yuṣmad-rājyāpahāraṃ yuṣmad-drohaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:249_1: ca kurvatāṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ saṃsargeṇa kāryākārya-viveka-virahāc ca samprati tyājyā eva-
GE07bhg4c02u:254: mahān sarvotkṛṣṭo 'nubhāvo vedādhyayana-brahmacaryādi-hetukaḥ prabhāvo yeṣāṃ tān /
GE07bhg4c02u:255: kāla-kāmādayo 'pi yad-vaśyās teṣāṃ tad-doṣa-sambandho neti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:257: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit /
GE07bhg4c02u:258: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ // [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:259: iti bhīṣmokter artha-lobhena vikrītātmanāṃ teṣāṃ kuto mahānubhāvatā ?
GE07bhg4c02u:260: tato yuddhe hantavyās te iti cet tatrāha hatvārtha-kāmān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:261: artha-kāmān api gurūn hatvāham ihaiva loke bhogān bhuñjīya,
GE07bhg4c02u:264: na tu śuddhān bhuñjīya tad-dhiṃsayā tal-lābhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:265: tathā ca yuddha-garvāvalepādi-mattve 'pi teṣāṃ mad-gurutvam asty eveti punar guru-grahaṇena sūcyate //5//
GE07bhg4c02u:268: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo
GE07bhg4c02u:269: yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:272: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca yadyapy adharmam aṅgīkariṣyāmaḥ tathāpi kim asmākaṃ jayaḥ parājayo vā garīyān bhaved iti na jñāyata ity āha na ced ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:273: etad dvayor madhye no 'smākaṃ katarat kiṃ nāma garīyo 'dhikataraṃ bhaviṣyatīti na vidmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:275: yad vā etān vayaṃ jayema jeṣyāmaḥ yadi vā no 'smān ete jayeyuḥ jeṣyantīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:276: jayo 'pi kiṃ cāsmākaṃ katarat jaya-parājayayor madhye kiṃ khalu garīyo 'dhikataraṃ bhaviṣyati etan na vidmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:277: tad eva pakṣa-dvayaṃ darśayati etān vayaṃ jayema,
GE07bhg4c02u:279: kiṃ ca jayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya evety āha yān eveti //6//
GE07bhg4c02u:281: nanu bhikṣāśanasya kṣatriyaṃ prati niṣiddhatvād yuddhasya ca vihitatvāt svadharmatvena yuddham eva tatra śreyaskaram ity āśaṅkyāha na caitad iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:282: etad api na jānīmo bhaikṣa-yuddhayor madhye kataran no 'smākaṃ garīyaḥ śreṣṭham /
GE07bhg4c02u:283: kiṃ bhaikṣaṃ hiṃsā-śūnyatvād uta yuddhaṃ svadharmatvād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:284: idaṃ ca na vidma ārabdhe 'pi yuddhe yad vā vayaṃ jayemātiśayīmahi yadi vā no 'smān jayeyur dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:286: kiṃ ca jāto 'pi jayo naḥ phalataḥ parājaya eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:287: yato yān bandhūn hatvā jīvitum api vayaṃ necchāmaḥ kiṃ punar viṣayānupabhoktum ?
GE07bhg4c02u:288: ta evāvasthitāḥ saṃmukhe dhārtarāṣṭrā dhṛtarāṣṭra-sambandhino bhīṣma-droṇādayaḥ sarve 'pi /
GE07bhg4c02u:289: tasmād bhaikṣād yuddhasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ na siddham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:290: tad evaṃ prāktanena granthena saṃsāra-doṣa-nirūpaṇād adhikāri-viśeṣaṇāny uktāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:291_0: tatra na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ity atra raṇe hatasya parivrāṭ-samāna-yoga-kṣematvokteḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:291_1: anyac chreyo 'nyad utaiva preyaḥ [KaṭhU 2.1] ity ādi-śruti-siddhaṃ śreyo mokṣākhyam upanyastam /
GE07bhg4c02u:292: arthāc ca tad itarad aśreya iti nityānitya-vastu-viveko darśitaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:294: api trailokya-rājyasya [Gītā 1.35] hetor ity atra pāralaukika-phala-virāgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:295: narake niyataṃ vāsa [Gītā 1.44] ity atra sthūla-dehātirikta ātmā,
GE07bhg4c02u:296: kiṃ no rājyena [Gītā 1.32] iti vyākhyāta-vartmanā śamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:298: yadyapy ete na paśyanti [Gītā 1.38] ity atra nirlobhatā /
GE07bhg4c02u:299: tan me kṣemataraṃ bhaved [Gītā 1.46] ity atra titikṣā /
GE07bhg4c02u:301: / asmiṃs tv adhyāye śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣam api [Gītā 2.5] ity atra bhikṣā-caryopalakṣitaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ pratipāditaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c02u:303: kiṃ ca guru-drohe pravṛttasyāpi mama jayaḥ parājayo vā bhaved ity api na jñāyata ity āha na caitad ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:304: tathāpi no 'smākaṃ katarat jaya-parājayayor madhye kiṃ khalu garīyo 'dhikataraṃ bhaviṣyati etan na vidmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:305: tad eva pakṣa-dvayaṃ darśayati -- etān vayaṃ jayema,
GE07bhg4c02u:307: kiṃ ca jayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya evety āha yān eveti //6//
GE07bhg4c02u:309: yuddhaṃ ca sva-dharmaṃ vijānann api vibhāṣase iti cet tatrāha na caitad iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:311: bhaikṣya-yuddhayor madhye no 'smākaṃ katarad garīyaḥ praśastataram /
GE07bhg4c02u:312: hiṃsā-virahād bhaikṣaṃ garīyaḥ svadharmatvād yuddhaṃ veti,
GE07bhg4c02u:314: samārabdhe yuddhe vayaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān jayema te vā no 'smān jayeyur iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:315: nanu mahā-vikramiṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhānāṃ ca bhavatām eva vijayo bhāvīti cet tatrāha yān eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:317: na jijīviṣāmo jīvitum api necchāmaḥ kiṃ punar bhogān bhoktum ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:318: tathā ca vijayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:319: tasmād yuddhasya bhaikṣād garīyas tvam aprasiddham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:320: evam etāvatā granthena tasmād evaṃvic chānta-dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhānvito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet iti śruti-prasiddham arjunasya jñānādhikāritvaṃ darśitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:321: tatra kiṃ no rājyena [Gītā 1.32] iti śama-damau /
GE07bhg4c02u:323: bhaikṣaṃ bhoktuṃ śreya iti dvandva-sahiṣṇutva-lakṣaṇā titikṣā /
GE07bhg4c02u:325: na khalu śamādi-śūnyasya jñāne 'sty adhikāraḥ paṅgāder iva karmaṇīti //6//
GE07bhg4c02u:330: yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me
GE07bhg4c02u:331: śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam //7//
GE07bhg4c02u:332: śrīdharaḥ : upadeśa-grahaṇe svādhikāraṃ sūcayati kārpaṇyety ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:333: arthāt kārpaṇya-doṣopahata-svabhāvaḥ etān hatvā kathaṃ jīviṣyāma iti kārpaṇyaṃ dosaś ca svakula-kṣaya-kṛtaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:334: tābhyām upahato 'bhibhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ śauryādi-lakṣaṇo yasya so 'haṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmi,
GE07bhg4c02u:335: tathā dharme saṃmūḍhaṃ ceto yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:336: yuddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣāṭanam api kṣatriyasya dharmo 'dharmo veti sandigdha-cittaḥ sann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:337: ato me yan niścitaṃ śreyaḥ yuktaṃ syāt tad brūhi /
GE07bhg4c02u:339: atas tvāṃ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ śādhi śikṣaya //7//
GE07bhg4c02u:341: gurūpasadanam idānīṃ pratipādyate samadhigata-saṃsāra-doṣa-jātasyātitarāṃ nirviṇṇasya vidhivad gurum upasannasyaiva vidyā-grahaṇe 'dhikārāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:343: vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti [BAU 3.5.1] iti śruti-siddha-bhikṣā-carye 'rjunasyābhilāṣaṃ pradarśya vidhivad gurūpasattim api tat-saṅkaṭa-vyājenaiva darśayati kārpaṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:344: yaḥ svalpām api citta-kṣatiṃ na kṣamate sa kṛpaṇa iti loke prasiddhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:346: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:347_0: tasya bhāvaḥ kārpaṇyam anātmādhyāsavattvaṃ tan-nimitto 'smin janmany eta eva madīyās
GE07bhg4c02u:347_1: teṣu hateṣu kiṃ jīvitenety abhiniveśa-rūpo mamatā-lakṣaṇo doṣas tenopahatas tiraskṛtaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:347_2: svabhāvaḥ kṣātro yuddhodyoga-lakṣaṇo yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c02u:348: dharme viṣaye nirṇāyaka-pramāṇaādarśanāt saṃmūḍhaṃ kim eteṣāṃ vadho dharmaḥ kim etat-paripālanaṃ dharmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:349: tathā kiṃ pṛthvī-paripālanaṃ dharmaḥ kiṃ vā yathāvasthito 'raṇya-nivāsa eva dharma ity ādi-saṃśayair vyāptaṃ ceto yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c02u:350: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīya ity atra vyākhyātam
GE07bhg4c02u:351: etat / evaṃvidhaḥ sann ahaṃ tvā tvām idānīṃ pṛcchāmi śreya ity anuṣaṅgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:352: ato yan niścitam aikāntikam ātyantikaṃ ca śreyaḥ parama-pumartha-bhūtaṃ phalaṃ syāt tan me mahyaṃ brūhi /
GE07bhg4c02u:355: yathā hy auṣadhe kṛte kadācid roga-nivṛttir na bhaved api jātāpi ca roga-nivṛttiḥ punar api rogotpattyā vināśyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:356: evaṃ kṛte 'pi yāge pratibandha-vaśāt svargo na bhaved api jāto 'pi svargo duḥkhākrānto naśyati ceti naikāntikatvam ātyantikatvaṃ vā tayoḥ / tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c02u:361: nanu tvaṃ mama sakhā na tu śiṣyo 'ta āha śiṣyas te 'ham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:362: tvad-anuśāsanayogyatvād ahaṃ tava śiṣya eva bhavāmi na sakhā nyūna-jñānatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:363: atas tvāṃ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ śādhi śikṣaya karuṇayā na tv aśiṣyatva-śaṅkayopekṣaṇīyo 'ham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:364: etena - tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahma-niṣṭham [ṃuṇḍU 1.2.11],
GE07bhg4c02u:367: adhīhi bhagavo brahmeti [TaittU 3.1] ity ādi-gurūpasatti-pratipādakaḥ śruty-artho darśitaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c02u:369: nanu tarhi sopapattikaṃ śāstrārthaṃ tvam eva bruvāṇaḥ kṣatriyo bhūtvā bhikṣāṭanaṃ niścinoṣi tarhy alaṃ mad-uktyeti tatrāha kārpaṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:370: svābhāvikasya śauryasya tyāga eva me kārpaṇyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:371: dharmasya sūkṣmā gatir ity ato dharma-vyavasthāyām apy ahaṃ mūḍha-buddhir evāsmi /
GE07bhg4c02u:372: atas tvam eva niścitya śreyo brūhi /
GE07bhg4c02u:373: nanu mad-vācas tvaṃ paṇḍata-mānitvena khaṇḍayasi cet,
GE07bhg4c02u:377: baladevaḥ : atha tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahma-niṣṭham [ṃuṇḍU 1.2.11],
GE07bhg4c02u:378: ācāryavān puruṣo veda [Chā 6.14.2] ity ādi śruti-siddhāṃ gurūpasattiṃ darśayati kārpaṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:379: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śravaṇād abrahmavittvaṃ kārpaṇyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:380: tena hetunā yo doṣo yān eva hatveti bandhu-vargam amatālakṣaṇas tenopahata-svabhāvo yuddha-spṛhā-lakṣaṇaḥ svadharmo yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:381: dharme saṃmūḍhaṃ kṣatriyasya me yuddhaṃ svadharmas tad vihāya bhikṣāṭanaṃ vety evaṃ sandihānaṃ ceto yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:382: īdṛśaḥ sann ahaṃ tvām idānīṃ pṛcchāmi - tasmān niścitaṃ ekāntikaṃ ātyantikaṃ yan me śreyaḥ syāt tat tvaṃ brūhi /
GE07bhg4c02u:386: nanu śaraṇāgatasyopadeśaḥ tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet ity ādi-śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:387: sakhāyaṃ tvāṃ katham upadiśāmīti cet tatrāha śiṣyas te 'ham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:395: śrīdharaḥ : tvam eva vicārya yad yuktaṃ tat kurv iti cet,
GE07bhg4c02u:397: indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇam atiśoṣaṇa-karaṃ madīyaṃ śokaṃ yat karma apanudyāt apanayet tad ahaṃ na prapaśyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:398: yadyapi bhūmau niṣkaṇṭakaṃ samṛddhaṃ rājyaṃ prāpsyāmi /
GE07bhg4c02u:399: tathā surendratvam api yadi prāpsyāmi evam abhīṣṭaṃ tat tat sarvam avāpyāpi śokāpanodanopāyaṃ na prapaśyāmīty anvayaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c02u:401: nanu svayam eva tvaṃ śreyo vicāraya śruta-sampanno 'si kiṃ para-śiṣyatvenety ata āha nahīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:402_0: yac-chreyaḥ prāptaṃ sat-kartṛ mama śokam apanudyād apanuden nivārayet tan na paśyāmi
GE07bhg4c02u:402_1: hi yasmāt tasmān māṃ śādhīti so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñ chokasya pāraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:403: śokānapanode ko doṣa ity āśaṅkya tad-viśeṣaṇam āha indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:405: nanu yuddhe prayatamānasya tava śoka-nivṛttir bhaviṣyati jeṣyasi cet tadā rājya-prāptyā dvāv etau puruṣau loke ity ādi-dharma-śāstrād ity āśaṅkyāha avāpyety ādinā /
GE07bhg4c02u:406: śatru-varjitaṃ sasyādi-sampannaṃ ca rājyaṃ tathā surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhatva-paryantam aiśvaryam avāpya sthitasyāpi mama yac chokam apanudyāt tan na paśyāmīty anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:407: tad yatheha karma-jito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇya-jito lokaḥ kṣīyate [Chā 8.1.6] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:408_0: yat-kṛtakaṃ tad-anityam ity anumānāt pratyakṣeṇāpy aihikānāṃ vināśa-darśanāc ca naihika
GE07bhg4c02u:408_1: āmutriko vā bhogaḥ śoka-nivartakaḥ kintu sva-sattā-kāle 'pi bhoga-pāratantryādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:408_2: vināśa-kāle 'pi vicchedāc choka-janaka eveti na yuddhaṃ śoka-nivṛttaye 'nuṣṭheyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:414: atas tvāṃ katham ahaṃ śiṣyaṃ karomi ?
GE07bhg4c02u:415: tasmād yatra tava gauravaṃ taṃ kam api dvaipāyanādikaṃ prapadyasva ity ata āha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:416: mama śokam apanudyāt dūrīkuryād evaṃ janaṃ na prakarṣeṇa paśyāmi trijagaty ekaṃ tvāṃ vinā /
GE07bhg4c02u:417: svasmād adhika-buddhimantaṃ bṛhaspatim api na jānāmīty ataḥ śokārta eva khalu kaṃ prapadyeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:418: yad yataḥ śokād indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇaṃ mahā-nidāghāt kṣudra-sarasām iva utkarṣeṇa śoṣo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:419: nanu tarhi sāmprataṃ tvaṃ śokārta eva khalu yudhyasva /
GE07bhg4c02u:420: tataś caitān jitvā rājyaṃ prātavatas tava rājya-bhogābhiniveśenaiva śoko 'payāsyatīty āha avāpyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:421: bhūmau niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ svarge surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ vā prāpyāpi sthitasya mamendriyāṇām etad ucchoṣaṇam evety arthaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c02u:422: baladevaḥ : nanu tvaṃ śāstrajño 'si sva-hitaṃ vicāryānutiṣṭha,
GE07bhg4c02u:423: sakhyur me śiṣyaḥ kathaṃ bhaver iti cet tatrāha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:424: yat karma mama śokam apanudyād dūrīkuryāt tad ahaṃ na prapaśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c02u:427: itthaṃ ca so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ māṃ bhavān śokasya pāraṃ tārayatu iti śruty-artho darśitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:428: nanu tvam adhunā śokākulaḥ prapadyase yuddhāt sukha-samṛddhi-lābhe viśoko bhaviṣyasīti cet tatrāha avāpyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:429_0: yadi yuddhe vijayī syāṃ tadā bhūmāv asapatnaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ prāpya yadi ca tatra
GE07bhg4c02u:429_1: hataḥ syāṃ tadā svarge surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ prāpya sthitasya me viśokatvaṃ na bhaved ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:430_0: tad yatheha karma-jito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇya-jito lokaḥ kṣīyate [ChāU
GE07bhg4c02u:430_1: 8.1.6] iti śruter naihikaṃ pāratrikaṃ vā yuddha-labdhaṃ sukhaṃ śokāpahaṃ tasmāt tādṛśam
GE07bhg4c02u:430_2: eva śreyastvaṃ brūhīti na yuddhaṃ śoka-haram //8 //
GE07bhg4c02u:435: na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha //9//
GE07bhg4c02u:436: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktvārjunaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:439: tad-anantaram arjunaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān iti dhṛtarāṣṭrākāṅkṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:440_0: guḍākeśo jitālasyaḥ parantapaḥ śatru-tāpano 'rjuno hṛṣīkeśaṃ sarvendriya-pravartakatvenāntaryāmiṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:440_1: govindaṃ gāṃ veda-lakṣaṇāṃ vāṇīṃ vindatīti vyutpattyā sarva-vedopādānatvena sarvajñam
GE07bhg4c02u:440_2: ādāv evaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhya ity ādinā yuddha-svarūpāyogyatām uktvā tad-anantaraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:440_3: na yotsya iti yuddha-phalābhāvaṃ coktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva bāhyendriya-vyāpārasya yuddhārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:440_4: pūrvaṃ kṛtasya nivṛttyā nirvyāpāro jāta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:441: svabhāvato jitālasye sarva-śatru-tāpane ca tasminn āgantukam ālasyam atāpakatvaṃ ca nāspadam ādhāsyatīti dyotayituṃ ha-śabdaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:445: baladevaḥ : tato 'rjunaḥ kim akarod ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam uktvety ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:446: guḍākeśo hṛṣīkeśaṃ prati evaṃ na hi prapaśyāmīty ādinā yuddhasya śokānivartakatvam uktvā parantapo 'pi govindaṃ sarva-vedajñaṃ prati na yotsye iti coktveti yojyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:448: sarva-veda-vittvād yuddhe sva-dharmatvaṃ grāhayiṣyatīti vyajya dhṛtarāṣṭra-hṛdi saṃjātā sva-putra-rājyāśā nirasyate //9//
GE07bhg4c02u:451: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata /
GE07bhg4c02u:452: senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c02u:453: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyām āha tam uvāceti /
GE07bhg4c02u:454: prahasann iva prasanna-mukhaḥ sann ity arthaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c02u:456: evaṃ yuddham upekṣitavaty apy arjune bhagavān nopekṣitavān iti dhṛtarāṣṭra-durāśā-nirāsāyā 'ha tam uvāceti /
GE07bhg4c02u:457_0: senayor ubhayor madhye yuddhodyamenāgatya tad-virodhinaṃ viṣādaṃ mohaṃ prāpnuvantaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:457_1: tam arjunaṃ prahasann ivānucitācāraṇa-prakāśanena lajjāmbudhau majjayann iva hṛṣīkeśaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:457_2: sarvāntaryāmī bhagavān idaṃ vakṣyamāṇam aśocyān ity ādi vacaḥ parama-gambhīrārtham
GE07bhg4c02u:457_3: anucitācaraṇa-prakāśakam uktavān na t”pekṣitavān ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:459: lajjā ca duḥkhātmiketi dveṣa-viṣaya eva sa mukhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:460: arjunasya tu bhagavat-kṛpā-viṣayatvād anucitācaraṇa-prakāśanasya ca vivekotpatti-hetutvād eka-dalābhāvena gauṇa evāyaṃ prahāsa iti kathayitum iva-śabdaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:461: lajjām utpādayitum iva vivkam utpādayitum arjunasyānucitācaraṇaṃ bhagavatā prakāśyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:462: lajjotpattis tu nāntarīyakatayāstu māstu veti na vivakṣiteti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:463: yadi hi yuddhārambhāt prāg eva sthito yuddham upekṣeta tadā nānucitaṃ kuryāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:464: mahatā saṃrambheṇa tu yuddha-bhūmāv āgatya tad-upekṣaṇam atīvānucitam iti kathayituṃ senayor ity ādi-viśeṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c02u:467_0: aho tvāpy etāvān khalv aviveka iti sakhya-bhāvena taṃ prahasan anaucitya-prakāśena
GE07bhg4c02u:467_1: lajjāmbudhau nimajjayan iveti tadānīṃ śiṣya-bhāvaṃ prāpte tasmin hāsyam anucitam
GE07bhg4c02u:467_2: ity adharoṣṭha-nikuñcanena hāsyam āvṛṇvaṃś cety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:468: hṛṣīkeśa iti pūrvaṃ premāivārjuna-vāṅ-niyamyo 'pi sāmpratam arjuna-hita-kāritvāt premṇaivārjuna-mano-niyantāpi bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:469: senayor ubhayor madhe ity arjunasya viṣādo bhagavatā prabodhaś ca ubhābhyāṃ senābhyāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭa eveti bhāvaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c02u:470: baladevaḥ : vyaṅgam arthaṃ prakāśayann āha tam uvāceti taṃ viṣīdantam arjunaṃ prati hṛṣīkeśo bhagavān aśocyān ity ādikam atigambhīrārthaṃ vacanam uvāca /
GE07bhg4c02u:473: iveti tadaiva śiṣyatāṃ prāpte tasmin hāsānaucityādīṣad adharollāsaṃ kurvann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:474: arjunasya viṣādo bhagavatā tasyopadeśaś ca sarva-sākṣika iti bodhayituṃ senayor ubhayor ity etat //10//
GE07bhg4c02u:478: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase /
GE07bhg4c02u:480: śrīdharaḥ : dehātmanor avivekād asyaivaṃ śoko bhavatīti tad-viveka-darśanārthaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca aśocyān ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:481: śokasyāviṣayī-bhūtān eva bandhūn tvam anvaśocaḥ anuśocitavān asi dṛṣṭvemān svajanān kṛṣṇa ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c02u:482: tatra kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam ity ādinā mayā bodhito 'pi punaś ca prajñāvatāṃ paṇḍitānāṃ vādān śabdān kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādīn kevalaṃ bhāṣase,
GE07bhg4c02u:484: yataḥ gatāsūn gata-prāṇān bandhūn agatāsūṃś ca jīvato 'pi,
GE07bhg4c02u:485: bandhu-hīnā ete kathaṃ jīviṣyantīti nānuśocanti paṇḍitā vivekinaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c02u:489: tathā kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādiko vivekaś cāprajñā-mūlaka evety āha aśocyān ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:490: aśocyān śokānārhān eva tvam anvaśoco 'nuśocitavān asi /
GE07bhg4c02u:491: tathā tvāṃ prabodhayantaṃ māṃ prati prajñā-vādān prajñāyāṃ satyām eva ye vādāḥ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādīni vākyāni tān bhāṣase,
GE07bhg4c02u:492: na tu tava kāpi prajñā vartate iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:493: yataḥ paṇḍitāḥ prajñāvanto gatāsūn gatā niḥsṛtā bhavanty asavo yebhyas tān sthūla-dehān na śocanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:495: agatāsūn aniḥsṛta-prāṇān sūkṣma-dehān api na śocanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:496: te hi mukteḥ pūrvaṃ naśvarā eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:497: ubhayeṣām api tathā tathā svabhāvasya duṣpariharatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:501: te prāyaḥ paricinvantyas atas tair alam /
GE07bhg4c02u:502: ete hi sarve bhīṣmādayaḥ sthūla-sūkṣma-deha-sahitā ātmāna eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:503_0: ātmanāṃ tu ityatvāt teṣu śoka-pravṛttir eva nāstīty atas tvayā yat pūrvam artha-śāstrāt
GE07bhg4c02u:503_1: dharma-śāstraṃ balavad ity uktaṃ tatra mayā tu dharma-śāstrād api jñāna-śāstraṃ balavad
GE07bhg4c02u:504: baladevaḥ : evaṃ arjune tūṣṇīṃ sthite tad-buddhim ākṣipan bhagavān āha aśocyān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:506: aśocyān śocitum ayogyān eva dhārtarāṣṭrāṃs tvaṃ anvaśocaḥ śocitavān asi /
GE07bhg4c02u:507: tathā māṃ prati prajñā-vādān prajñāvatām iva vacanāni dṛṣṭvemaṃ svajanam ity ādīni,
GE07bhg4c02u:508: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ity ādīni ca bhāṣase,
GE07bhg4c02u:509: na ca te prajñā-leśo 'py astīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:510: ye tu prajñāvantas te gatāsūn nirgata-prāṇān sthūla-dehān,
GE07bhg4c02u:514: nāntyaḥ sūkṣma-dehānāṃ mukteḥ prāg avaināśitvāt tadvatām ātmanāṃ tu ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-varjitānāṃ nityatvān na śocyāteti /
GE07bhg4c02u:518: tat kila tato 'pi balavatā jñāna-śāstreṇa pratyucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:519: tasmād aśocye śocya-bhramaḥ pāmara-sādhāraṇaḥ paṇḍitasya te na yogya iti bhāvaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c02u:522: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:523: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param //12//
GE07bhg4c02u:524: śrīdharaḥ : aśocyatve hetum āha na tv evāham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:525: yathāhaṃ parameśvaro jātu kadācit līlā-vigrahasyāvirbhāva-tirobhāvato nāsam iti tu naiva /
GE07bhg4c02u:529: ime vā janādhipā nṛpā nāsann iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:531: tathātaḥ param ita upary api na bhaviṣyāmo na sthāsyāma iti ca naiva,
GE07bhg4c02u:532: api tu sthāsyāma eveti janma-maraṇa-śūnyatvād aśocyā ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c02u:535: athavā sakhe tvām aham evaṃ pṛcchāmi /
GE07bhg4c02u:536: kiṃ ca prītyāspadasya maraṇe dṛṣṭe sati śoko jāyate,
GE07bhg4c02u:538_0: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ nṛpa svātmaiva vallabhaḥ [BhP 10.14.57] iti śukokter ātmaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:538_1: prīty-āspadam iti cet tarhi jīveśvara-bhedena dvividhasyaivātmano nityatvād eva maraṇābhāvād
GE07bhg4c02u:538_2: ātmā śokasya viṣayo nety āha na tv evāham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:539: ahaṃ paramātmā jātu kadācid api pūrvaṃ nāsam iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:541: tathā tvam api jīvātmā āsīr eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:542: tatheme janādhipā rājānaś ca jīvātmāna āsann eveti prāg-abhāvābhāvo darśitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:543: tathā sarve vayam ahaṃ tvam ime janādhipāś cātaḥ paraṃ na bhaviṣyāmo na sthāsyāma iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:544: api tu sthāsyāma eveti dhvaṃsābhāvaś ca darśita iti paramātmano jīvātmanāṃ ca nityatvād ātmā na śoka-viṣaya iti sādhitam
GE07bhg4c02u:545: / atra śrutayaḥ - nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] ity ādyāḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c02u:546_0: baladevaḥ : evam asthāna-śocitvād apāṇḍityam arjunasyāpādya tattva-jijñāsuṃ niyojitāñjaliṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:546_1: taṃ prati sarveśvaro bhagavān nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti
GE07bhg4c02u:546_2: kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] iti śruti-siddhaṃ svasmāj jīvānāṃ ca pāramarthikaṃ bhedam āha na tv evāham iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:549: pūrvasminn ādau kāle jātu kadācin nāsam iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:551: tathā tvam arjuno nāsīr iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:553: ime janādhipā rājāno nāsann iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:555: tathetaḥ parasminn ante kāle sarve vayam ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca ime ca na bhaviṣyāma iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:557: sarveśvaravaj jīvānāṃ ca traikālika-sattā-yogitvāt tad-viṣayako na śoko yukta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:560: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya ity ādinā mokṣe 'pi tasyābhidāsyamānatvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:561: na cābhedajñasyāpi harer bādhitānuvṛtti-nyāyeneyam arjunādi-bheda-dṛṣṭir iti vācyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:563: maru-marīcikādāv udaka-buddhir bādhitāpy anuvartamānā mithyārtha-viṣayatva-niścayān nodakāharaṇādau pravartayed evam abheda-bodha-bādhitāpy anuvartamānārjunādi-bheda-dṛṣṭis
GE07bhg4c02u:564: tattva-niścayān nopadeśādau pravartayiṣyatīti yat kiñcid etat /
GE07bhg4c02u:565: nanu phalavaty ajñāte 'rthe śāstra-tātparya-vīkṣaṇāt tādṛśo 'bhedas tātparya-viṣayo vaiphalyāj jñātatvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:567: kintu adbhyo vā eṣa prātar udety apaḥ sāyaṃ praviśati ity ādi-śruty-arthavad anuvādya eva sa iti cen mandam etat /
GE07bhg4c02u:568: pṛthag ātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā juṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam eti [ŚvetU 1.6] ity ādinā bheda evāmṛtatva-phala-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:570: te ca dharmā vibhutvāṇutva-svāmitva-bhṛtyatvādayaḥ śāstraika-gamyā mitho viruddhā bodhyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:576: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā /
GE07bhg4c02u:577: tathā dehāntara-prāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati //13//
GE07bhg4c02u:578: śrīdharaḥ : nanv īśvarasya tava janmādi-śūnyatvaṃ satyam eva,
GE07bhg4c02u:581: dehino dehābhimānino jīvasya yathāsmin sthūla-dehe kaumārādy-avasthās tad-deha-nibandhanā eva,
GE07bhg4c02u:584: vasthāntarotpattāv api sa evāham iti pratyabhijñānāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:588: ato dhīro dhīmān tatra tayor deha-nāśotpattyor na muhyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:589: ātmaiva mṛto jātaś ceti na manyate //13//
GE07bhg4c02u:595: atas teṣāṃ nāśe śokaḥ syād eveti ced ata āha dehina iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:596: dehino jīvasyāsmin dehe kaumāra kaumāraṃ kaumāra-prāptir bhavati,
GE07bhg4c02u:597: tataḥ kaumāra-nāśānantaraṃ jarā-prāptir yathā tathaiva dehāntara-prāptir iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:598: tatas cātma-sambandhināṃ kaumārādīnāṃ prīty-āspadānāṃ nāśe yathā śoko na kriyate tathā dehasyāpi ātma-sambandhinaḥ prītyāspadasya nāśe śoko na kartavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:599_0: yauvanasya nāśe jarā-prāptau śoko jāyate iti cet kaumārasya nāśe yauvana-prāptau
GE07bhg4c02u:599_1: harṣo 'pi jāyate ity ato bhīṣma-droṇādīnāṃ jīrṇa-deha-nāśe khalu navya-dehāntara-prāptau
GE07bhg4c02u:600: yad vā, ekasminn api dehe kaumārādīnāṃ yathā prāptis tathaivaikasyāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:602: baladevaḥ : nanu bhīṣmādi-dehāvacchinnānām ātmanāṃ nityatve 'pi tad-dehānāṃ tad-bhogāyatanānāṃ nāśe yuktaḥ śoka iti cet tatrāha dehino 'sminn iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:604: tasya dehino jīvasyāsmin vartamāne dehe kramāt kaumāra-yauvana-jarās tisro 'vasthā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:605_1: yathā na śokas tathaiva tad-deha-vināśe sati dehāntara-prāptir yayāti-yauvana-prāpti-nyāyena harṣa-hetur eveti,
GE07bhg4c02u:606: na tad-deha-vināśa-hetukaḥ śokas tavocita iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:608: atra dehina ity eka-vacanaṃ jāty-abhiprāyeṇa bodhyaṃ pūrvatrātma-bahutvokteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:609: atrāhuḥ - eka eva viśuddhātmā tasyāvidyayāparicchinnasya tasyāṃ pratibimbitasya vā nānātmatvam /
GE07bhg4c02u:610: śrutiś caivam āha ākāśam ekaṃ hi yathā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthag bhavet,
GE07bhg4c02u:611: tathātmaiko hy anekastho jalādhāreṣv ivāṃśumān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:612: tad-vijñānena tasya vināśe tu tan-nānātva-nivṛttyā tad-aikyaṃ sidhyatīty eka-vacanenaitat pārtha-sārathir āheti /
GE07bhg4c02u:615: vāstave cchede vikāritvādy-āpattiḥ ṭaṅka-chinna-pāṣāṇavat syāt - nīrūpasya vibhoḥ pratibimbāsambhavāc ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:617: na ca pratīty-anyathānupapattir evākāśasya pratibimbe mānaṃ tad-varti-graha-nakṣatra-prabhā-maṇḍalaṃ tasyiavāmbhasi bhāsamānatvena pratīteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:618: ākāśam ekaṃ hi iti śrutis tu paramātma-viṣayā
GE07bhg4c02u:619: tasyākāśavat sūryavac ca bahu-vṛttikatvaṃ vadatīty aviruddham /
GE07bhg4c02u:629: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tān ahaṃ na śocāmi,
GE07bhg4c02u:630: kintu tad-viyogādi-duḥkha-bhājaṃ mām eveti cet tatrāha mātrā-sparśā iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:631: mīyante jāyante viṣayā ābhir iti mātrā indriya-vṛttayaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:636: yathā jalātapādi-saṃsargās tat-tat-kāla-kṛtāḥ svabhāvataḥ śītoṣṇādi prayacchanti evam iṣṭa-saṃyoga-viyogā api sukha-duḥkhāni prayacchanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:637: teṣāṃ cāsthiratvāt sahanaṃ tava dhīrasyocitaṃ na tu tan-nimitta-harṣa-viṣāda-pāravaśyam ity arthaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c02u:641: tad apy avivekino mama mana evānarthakāni vṛtahiva śoka-moha-vyāptaṃ duḥkhayatīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:642: tatra na kevalam ekaṃ mana evāpi tu manaso vṛttayo 'pi sarvās tv agādīndriya-rūpāḥ sva-viṣayān anubhāvyānarthakāriṇya ity āha mātrā indriya-grāhya-viṣayās teṣāṃ sparśā anubhavāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:643: śītoṣṇety āgamāpāyina iti yad eva śītala-jalādikam uṣṇa-kāle sukhadam /
GE07bhg4c02u:644: tad eva śīta-kāle duḥkhadam ato 'niyatatvād āgamāpāyitvāc ca tān viṣayānubhavān titikṣasva sahasva /
GE07bhg4c02u:646: nahi māghe māsi jalasya duḥkhatva-buddhyaiva śāstre vihitaḥ snāna-rūpo dharmas tyajyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:648: evam eva ye putra-bhrātrādyotpatti-kāle dhanādy-upārjana-kāle ca sukhadās ta eva mṛtyu-kāle duḥkhadā āgamāpāyino
GE07bhg4c02u:650: na tu tad-anurodhena yuddha-rūpaḥ śāstra-vihitaḥ sva-dharmas tyājyo vihita-dharmānācaraṇaṃ khalu kāle mahānarthakṛd eveti bhāvaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c02u:651: baladevaḥ : nanu bhīṣmādayo mṛtāḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyantīti tad-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śoko mābhūt /
GE07bhg4c02u:652: tad-viccheda-duḥkha-nimittas tu me mana-prabhṛtīni pradahantīti cet tatrāha mātreti /
GE07bhg4c02u:653: mātrās tv agādīndriya-vṛttayaḥ mīyante paricchidyante viṣayā abhir iti vyutpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:654: sparśās tābhir viṣayāṇām anubhavānte khalu śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkhadā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:655: yad eva śītalam udakaṃ grīṣme sukhadaṃ tad eva hemante duḥkhadam ity ato 'niyatatvād āgamāpāyitvāc cānityān asthirāṃs tān titikṣasva sahasva /
GE07bhg4c02u:656: etad uktaṃ bhavati māgha-snānaṃ duḥkha-karam api dharmatayā vidhānād yathā kriyate tathā bhīṣmādibhiḥ saha yuddhaṃ duḥkha-karam api tathā vidhānāt kāryam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:657: tatratyo duḥkhānubhavas tv āgantuko dharma-siddhatvāt soḍhavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:659: tasya nānuvṛttiś ca jñāna-niṣṭhā paripākaṃ vinaiva dharma-tyāgas tv anartha-hetur iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:660: kaunteya bhārateti padābhyām ubhaya-kula-śuddhasya te dharma-bhraṃśo nocita iti sūcyate //14//
GE07bhg4c02u:663: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GE07bhg4c02u:665: śrīdharaḥ : tat-pratikāra-prayatnād api tat-sahanam evocitaṃ mahā-phalatvād ity āha yaṃ hīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:666: ete mātrā-sparśā yaṃ puruṣaṃ na vyathayanti nābhibhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:668: sa tair avikṣipyamāṇo dharma-jñāna-dvārā amṛtatvāya mokṣāya kalpate yogyo bhavati //15//
GE07bhg4c02u:671: evaṃ vicāreṇa tat-tat-sahanābhyāse sati te viṣayānubhavāḥ kāle kila nāpi duḥkhayanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:675: baladevaḥ : dharmārtha-duḥkha-sahanābhyāsasyottaratra sukha-hetutvaṃ darśayann āha yaṃ hīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:676_0: ete mātrā-sparśāḥ priyāpriya-viṣayānubhāvā yaṃ dhīraṃ dhiyam īrayati dharmeṣv iti
GE07bhg4c02u:676_1: vyutpatter dharma-niṣṭhaṃ puruṣaṃ na vyathayanti sukha-duḥkha-mūrcchitaṃ na kurvanti
GE07bhg4c02u:677: na tu tādṛśo duḥkha-sukha-mūrcchita ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:678: uktam arthaṃ sphuṭayan puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi sameti /
GE07bhg4c02u:679: dharmānuṣṭhānasya kaṣṭa-sādhyatvād duḥkham anuṣaṅga-labdhaṃ sukhaṃ ca yasya samaṃ bhavati tābhyāṃ mukha-mlānitollāsa-rahitam ity arthaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c02u:682: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:683: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattva-darśibhiḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c02u:684: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tathāpi śītoṣṇādikam atiduḥsahaṃ kathaṃ soḍhavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:685: atyantaṃ tat-sahane ca kadācid deha-nāśaḥ syād ity āśaṅkya tattva-vicārataḥ sarvaṃ soḍhuṃ śakyam ity āśayenāha nāsato vidyata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:686: asato 'nātma-dharmatvād avidyamānasya śītoṣṇāder ātmani bhāvaḥ sattā na vidyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:687: tathā sataḥ sat-svabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvo nāśo na vidyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:688: evam ubhayoḥ sad-asator anto nirṇayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:693: etac ca viveka-daśān adhirūḍhān prati uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:694: vastutas tu asaṅgo hy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ iti śruter jīvātmanaś ca sthūla-sūkṣma-dehābhyāṃ tad-dharmaiḥ śoka-mohādibhiś ca sambandho nāsty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:695: tat-sambandhasya avidyā kalpitatvād ity āha neti /
GE07bhg4c02u:696: asato 'nātma-dharmatvād ātmani jīve avartamānasya śoka-mohādes tad-āśrayasya dehasya ca bhāvaḥ sattā nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:697: tathā sataḥ satya-rūpasya jīvātmano 'bhāvo nāśo nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:698: tasmād ubhayor etayor asat-sator anto nirṇayo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:699: tena bhīṣmādiṣu tvad-ādiṣu ca jīvātmasu satyatvād anaśvareṣu deha-daihika-viveka-śoka-mohādayo naiva santi kathaṃ bhīṣmādayo naṅkṣanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:700: kathaṃ vā tāṃs tvaṃ śocasīti bhāvaḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c02u:701: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ bhagavatā pārthasyāsthānāśocitvena tat-pāṇḍityam ākṣiptam /
GE07bhg4c02u:702: śoka-haraṃ ca svopāsanam eva tac copāsopāsaka-bheda-ghaṭitam ity upāsyāj jīvāṃśinaḥ svasmād upāsakānāṃ jīvāṃśānāṃ tāttvikaṃ dvaitam upadiṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c02u:703_0: atha yad ātma-tattvena tu brahma-tattvaṃ dīpopameneha yuktaḥ prapaśyet [ŚvetU 2.15]
GE07bhg4c02u:703_2: sarvān pratyaviśeṣeṇopadeśyaṃ tac ca dehātmanor vaidharmya-dhiyam antarā na syād
GE07bhg4c02u:704: asataḥ pariṇāmino dehāder bhāvo 'pariṇāmitvaṃ na vidyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:705: sato ' pariṇāmina ātmanas tv abhāvaḥ pariṇāmitvaṃ na vidyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:708: anto nirṇayas tattva-darśibhis tad-ubhaya-svabhāva-vedibhiḥ puruṣair dṛṣṭo 'nubhūtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:709: atrāsac-chabdena vinaśvaraṃ dehādi jaḍaṃ sac-chabdena tv avinaśvaram ātma-caitanyam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:710: evam eva śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe 'pi nirṇītaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur [ViP 2.12.38] ity upakramya yad asti yan nāsti ca vipra-varya [?] ity asti /
GE07bhg4c02u:711: nāsti-śabda-vācyayoś cetana-jaḍayos tathātvaṃ vastv asti kiṃ kutradcid ity ādibhir nirūpitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:713: asti-śabdavātyaṃ tu caitanyam iti svayam eva vivṛtam /
GE07bhg4c02u:714: yat tu sat-kārya-vāda-sthāpanāyai tat-padyam ity āhus tan-niravadhānaṃ dehātma-svabhāvānabhijñāna-mohitaṃ prati tan-moha-vinivṛttaye tat-svabhāvābhijñāpanasya prakṛtatvāt //16//
GE07bhg4c02u:717: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
GE07bhg4c02u:718: vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati //17//
GE07bhg4c02u:719: śrīdharaḥ : atra sat-svabhāvam avināśi vastu sāmānyenoktaṃ tataṃ tat-sākṣitvena vyāptaṃ taṃ tu ātma-svarūpam avināśi vināśa-śūnyaṃ viddhi jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c02u:723: nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati avināśīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:724: taṃ jīvātma-svarūpaṃ yena sarvam idaṃ śarīraṃ tataṃ vyāptam /
GE07bhg4c02u:725: nanu śarīra-mātra-vyāpi-caitanyatve jīvātmano madhyama-parimāṇatvena anityatva-prasaktiḥ ? maivam /
GE07bhg4c02u:726: sūkṣmāṇām apy ahaṃ jīvaḥ iti bhagavad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:727: eṣoṇur ātmā cetasā veditavyo yasmin prāṇaḥ pañcadhā saṃviveśa iti,
GE07bhg4c02u:730: ārāgra-mātro hy aparo 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ iti śrutibhyaś ca tasya paramāṇu-parimāṇatvam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:731: tad api sampūrṇa-deha-vyāpi-śaktimattvaṃ jatu-jaṭitasya mahā-maṇer mahauṣadhi-khaṇḍasya vā śirasy urasi vā dhṛtasya sampūrṇa-deha-puṣṭi-karaṇa-śaktimattvam iva nāsamañjasam /
GE07bhg4c02u:733: tad uktaṃ prāṇam adhikṛtya dattātrayeṇa yena saṃsarate pumān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:734: ataevāsya sarva-gatatvam apy agrima-śloke vakṣyamāṇaṃ nāsamañjasam /
GE07bhg4c02u:735: ataevāvyayasya nityasya nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:736: yad vā, nanu deho jīvātmā paramātmety etad vastu-trikaṃ manuṣya-tiryag-ādiṣu sarvatra dṛśyate,
GE07bhg4c02u:737: tatrādyayor deha-jīvayos tattvaṃ nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ ity anenoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:738: tṛtīyasya paramātma-vastunaḥ kiṃ tattvam ity ata āha avināśi tv iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:740: paramātmano māyā-jīvābhyāṃ svarūpataḥ pārthakyād idaṃ jagat //17//
GE07bhg4c02u:741: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ jīvātma-dehayoḥ svabhāvaṃ viśadayaty avināśīti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:743: yena sarvam idaṃ śarīraṃ tataṃ dharma-bhūtena jñānena vyāptam asti /
GE07bhg4c02u:744: asyāvyayasya parmāṇutvena ca vināśānarhasya vināśaṃ na kaścit sthūlo 'rthaḥ kartum arhati prāṇasyeva dehaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:746: eṣo 'ṇur ātmā cetasā veditavyo yasmin prāṇaḥ pañcadhā saṃviveśa [ṃuṇḍU 3.1.9] ity ādiṣu tasya paramāṇutva-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:748: evam āha bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ - guṇād vālokavad [Vs. 2.3.26] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:749: ihāpi svayaṃ vakṣyati yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ [Gītā 13.33] ity ādinā //17//
GE07bhg4c02u:755: anto vināśo vidyate yeṣāṃ te antavantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:757: ataevānāśino vināśa-rahitasya aprameyasyaparicchinnasyātmana ime sukha-duḥkhādi-dharmaka-dehā uktās tattva-darśibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:763_0: nanu sphuraṇa-rūpasya sataḥ katham avināśitvaṃ tasya deha-dharmatvād dehasya cānukṣaṇa-vināśād
GE07bhg4c02u:763_1: iti bhūta-caitanya-vādinas tān nirākurvann āsato vidyate bhāva ity etad vivṛṇoti antavanta iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:764: antavanto vināśina ime 'parokṣā dehā upacitāpacita-rūpatvāc charīrāṇi /
GE07bhg4c02u:765_1: sarve nityasyāvināśina eva śarīriṇa ādhyāsika-sambandhena śarīravataekasyātmanaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:765_2: sva-prakāśa-sphuraṇa-rūpasya sambandhino dṛśyatvena bhogyatvena coktāḥ śrutibhir
GE07bhg4c02u:766: tathā ca taittirīyake 'nnamayādyānandamayānantān pañca kośān kalpayitvā tad-adhiṣṭhānam akalpitaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā [TaittU 2.5] iti darśitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:769_1: amūrta-rāśiḥ sūkṣma-samaṣṭiḥ trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma [BAU 1.6.1] iti bṛhad-āraṇyakokta-try-annātmakaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:771: rūpātmakatvena tad-ubhayāśrayatayā kartṛtvam ādāya vijñāna-maya-kośa uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:774: te ca sarva ekasyaivātmanaḥ śarīrāṇīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:777: tasya prāṇa-mayasyaiṣa eva śarīre bhavaḥ śārīra ātmā yaḥ satya-jñānādi-lakṣaṇo guhā-nihitatvenoktaḥ pūrvasyānna-mayasya /
GE07bhg4c02u:779: athaveme sarve dehās trailokya-varti-sarva-prāṇi-sambandhina ekasyaivātmana uktā iti yojanā /
GE07bhg4c02u:785: iti sarva-śarīra-sambandhinam ekam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ darśayati /
GE07bhg4c02u:786: nanu nityatvaṃ yāvat-kāla-sthāyitvaṃ tathā cāvidyādivat kālena saha nāśe 'pi tad-upapannam ity ata āha anāśina iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:787_0: deśataḥ kālato vastutaś caparicchinasyāvidyādeḥ kalpitatvenānityatve 'pi yāvat-kāla-sthāyi-svarūpam
GE07bhg4c02u:787_1: aupacārikaṃ nityatvaṃ vyavahriyate yāvad-vikāraṃ tu vibhāgo lokavat [Vs 2.3.7] iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:788: ātmanas tu pariccheda-traya-śūnyasyākalpitasya vināśa-hetv-abhāvān mukhyam eva kūṭastha-nityatvaṃ na tu pariṇāmi-nityatvaṃ yāvat-kāla-sthāyitvaṃ cety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:789: nanv etādṛśe dehini kiṃcit pramāṇam avaśyaṃ vācyam anyathā niṣpramāṇasya tasyālīkatvāpatteḥ śāstrārambha-vaiyarthyāpatteś ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:790: tathā ca vastu-paricchedo duṣpariharaḥ śāstra-yonitvāt [Vs 1.1.3] iti nyāyāc ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:792: ekadhaivānudraṣṭavyam etad apramayaṃ dhruvam [BAU 4.7.2] apramayam aprameyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:793: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:797: iti ca śruteḥ sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpa evātmātas tasya sarva-bhāsakasya svabhānārthaṃ na svabhāsyāpekṣā,
GE07bhg4c02u:803: svataḥ sarvadābhāsamānatvāt sarva-kalpanādhiṣṭhānatvād dṛśyamātra-bhāsakatvāc ca na tasya tucchatvāpattiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:804: tathā caikam evādvitīyaṃ satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmety ādi-śāstram eva sva-prameyānurodhena svasyāpi kalpitatvam āpādayati anyathā sva-prāmāṇyānupapatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:806: ātmanaḥ svaprakāśatvaṃ ca yuktito 'pi bhagavat-pūjyapādair upapāditam /
GE07bhg4c02u:807: tathā hi - yatra jijñāsoḥ saṃśaya-viparyaya-vyatireka-pramāṇānām anyatamam api nāsti tatra tad-virodhi jñānam iti sarvatra dṛṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c02u:809: ātmani cāhaṃ vā nāhaṃ veti na kasyacit saṃśayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:810: nāpi nāham iti viparyayo vyatirekaḥ pramā veti tat-svarūpa-pramā sarvadāstīti vācyaṃ tasya sarva-saṃśaya-viparyaya-dharmitvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:811: dharmyaśe sarvam abhrāntaṃ prakāre tu viparyayaḥ iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:813: pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ ca pramābhāsas tathaiva ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:814: kurvanty eva pramāṃ yatra tad-asambhāvanā kutaḥ //
GE07bhg4c02u:817: sva-prakāśe sad-rūpe dharmiṇi pramāṇāpramāṇayor viśeṣo nāstīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:818: ātmano 'bhāsamānatve ca ghaṭa-jñānaṃ mayi jātaṃ na vety ādi-saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:820: bāhya-padārthe k ptena virodhi-jñānenaiva saṃśayādi-pratibandha-saṃbhava āntara-padārthe svabhāva-bheda-kalpanāyā anaucityāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:823: yasya ca jñāna-mātre hetutvād ghaṭādi-bhāne 'py ātma-bhānaṃ samūhālambana-nyāyena tārkikāṇāṃ pravareṇāpi durnivāraṃ /
GE07bhg4c02u:829: na ca vyavasāya-bhānārthaṃ sa tasya dīpavat sva-vyavahāre sajātīyānapekṣatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:830: na hi ghaṭa-taj-jñānayor iva vyavasāyānuvyavasāyayor api viṣayatva-viṣayitva-vyavasthāpakaṃ vaijātyam asti vyakti-bhedātirikta-vaidharmyānabhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:831: viṣayatvāvacchedaka-rūpeṇaiva viṣayitvābhyupagame ghaṭa-taj-jñānayor api tad-bhāvāpattir aviśeṣāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:832_0: nanu yathā ghaṭa-vyavahārārthaṃ ghaṭa-jñānam abhyupeyate tathā ghaṭa-jñāna-vyavahārārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:832_1: ghaṭa-jñāna-viṣayaṃ jñānam abhyupeyaṃ vyavahārāsya vyavahartavya-jñāna-sādhyatvād iti cet /
GE07bhg4c02u:834: nahi vyavahartavya-bhinnatvam api jñāna-viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavahāra-hetutāvacchedakaṃ gauravāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:835: tathā ceśvara-jñānavadyogi-jñānavat prameyam iti jñānavac ca svenaiva sva-vyavahāropapattau na jñānāntara-kalpanāvakāśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:836: anuvyavasāyasyāpi ghaṭa-jñāna-vyavahāra-hetutvaṃ kiṃ ghaṭa-jñāna-jñānatvena kiṃ vā ghaṭa-jñānatvenaiveti vivecanīyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:838: tatra ghaṭa-vyavahāre ghaṭa-jñānatvenaiva hetutāyāḥ k ptatvāt tenaiva rūpeṇa ghata-jñāna-vyavahāre,
GE07bhg4c02u:841: tathā ca nānuvyavasāya-siddhir ekasyaiva vyavasāyasya vayvasātari vyavaseye vyavasāye ca vyavahāra-janakatvopapatter iti tripuṭī-pratyakṣa-vādinaḥ prābhākarāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:842: aupaniṣadāstu manyante sva-prakāśa-jñāna-rūpa evātmā na svaprakāśa-jñānāśrayaḥ kartṛ-karma-virodhena tad-bhānānupapatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:847: sa cakṣur-ādi-dvārāntaḥ-karaṇa-pariṇāmena ghaṭādīn vyāpya tad-ākāro bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:848: tato ghaṭāvacchinna-caitanyaṃ pramātra-bhedāt svājñānaṃ nāśayad aparokṣaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:850: antaḥ-karaṇa-pariṇāmaś ca vṛttyākhyo 'tisvacchaḥ svāvacchinnenaiva caitanyena bhāsyata ity antaḥ-karaṇa-tad-vṛtti-ghaṭānām aparokṣatā /
GE07bhg4c02u:851: tad etad ākāra-trayam ahaṃ jānāmi ghaṭam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:854: antaḥkaraṇa-tad-vṛttīḥ prati tu vṛtty-anapekṣatvāt sākṣiteti vivekaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:856_0: yasmād evaṃ prāg-ukta-nyāyena ntiyo vibhur asaṃsārī sarvadaika-rūpaś cātmā tasmāt
GE07bhg4c02u:856_1: tan-nāśa-śaṅkayā svadharme yuddhe prāk-pravṛttasya tava tasmād uparatir na yukteti
GE07bhg4c02u:856_2: yuddhābhyanujñayā bhagavān āha - tasmād yudhyasva bhārateti /
GE07bhg4c02u:857: arjunasya svadharme yuddhe pravṛttasya tata uparati-kāraṇaṃ śoka-mohau /
GE07bhg4c02u:858: tau ca vicāra-janitena vijñānena vādhitāv ity apavādāpavāda utsargasya sthitir iti nyāyena yudhyasvety anuvādo na vidhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:861: akākārayoḥ strī-pratyayayoḥ prayoge neti vaktavyam iti tad-apavādaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:862: tathā ca mumukṣor brahmaṇor jijñāsety atrāpavādāpavāde punar utsarga-sthiteḥ kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kṛtīty anenaiva ṣaṣṭhī /
GE07bhg4c02u:863: tathā ca karmaṇi ceti niṣedhā-prasārād brahma-jijñāseti karma-ṣaṣṭhī-samāsaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:865: kaścit tv etasmād eva vidher mokṣe jñāna-karmaṇoḥ samuccaya iti pralapati /
GE07bhg4c02u:866: tac ca yudhyasvety ato mokṣasya jñāna-karma-samuccaya-sādhyatvāpratīteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:869: nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati antavanta iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:871: tasmād yudhyasva iti śāstra-vihitasya svadharmasya tyāgo 'nucita iti bhāvaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c02u:874: aprameyasyātisūkṣmatvād vijñāna-vijñātṛ-svarūpatvāc ca pramātum aśakyasyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:875: tathā cedṛśa-svabhāvatvāj jīva-tad-dehau na śoka-sthānam iti jīvātmano deho dharmānuṣṭānuṣṭhāna-dvārā tasya bhogāya mokṣāya ca pareśena sṛjyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:876: sa ca sa ca dharmeṇa bhavet tasmād yudhyasva bhārata //18//
GE07bhg4c02u:879: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam /
GE07bhg4c02u:880: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate //19//
GE07bhg4c02u:881: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ bhīṣmādi-mṛtyu-nimittaḥ śoko nivāritaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:882: yac cātmano hantṛtva-nimittaṃ duḥkham uktam etān na hantum icchāmi ity ādinā,
GE07bhg4c02u:883: tad api tavad eva nirnimittam ity āha ya enam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:885: ātmano hanana-kriyāyāḥ karmatvaṃ kartṛtvam api nāstīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:888: nanv evam aśocyān anvaśocacas tvam ity ādinā bhīṣmādi-bandhu-viccheda-nibandhane śoke 'panīte 'pi tad-vadha-kartṛtva-nibandhanasya pāpasya nāsti pratīkāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:889: nahi yatra śoko nāsti tatra pāpaṃ nāstīti niyamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:891_0: ato 'haṃ kartā tvaṃ preraka iti dvayor api hiṃsā-nimitta-pātakāpatter ayuktam idaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:891_1: vacanaṃ tasmād yudhyasva bhāratety āśaṅkya kāṭhaka-paṭhitaya rcā pariharati bhagavān ya enam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:892: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinam adṛśyatvādi-guṇakaṃ yo hantāraṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartāraṃ vetti aham asya hanteti vijānāti /
GE07bhg4c02u:893: yaś cānya enaṃ manyate hataṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ karma-bhūtaṃ deha-hananena hato 'ham iti vijānāti /
GE07bhg4c02u:894: tāv ubhau dehābhimānitvād enam avikāriṇam akāraka-svabhāvam ātmānaṃ na vijānīto na vivekena jānītaḥ śāstrāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:895: kasmāt yasmān nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate kartā karma ca na bahvatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:896: atra ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ hataṃ cety etāvati vaktavye padānām āvṛttir vākyālaṅkārārthā /
GE07bhg4c02u:897: athavā ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ tārkikādir ātmanaḥ kartṛtvābhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:898: tathā yaś cainaṃ manyate hataṃ cārvākādir ātmano vināśitvābhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:899: tāv ubhau na vijānīta iti yojyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:902: hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam [KaṭhU 1.2.19] iti pūrvārdhe śrautaḥ pāṭhaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c02u:907: nāpi hanteḥ karma ity āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:908: enaṃ jīvātmānaṃ hantāraṃ vetti bhīṣmādīn arjuno hantīti yo vettīty arthaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:909: hatam iti bhīṣmādibhir arjuno hanyate iti yo vetti,
GE07bhg4c02u:911: ato 'rjuno 'yaṃ guru-janaṃ hantīty ajñāni-loka-gītād duryaśaḥ kā te bhītir iti bhāvaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c02u:913: enam ukta-svabhāvam ātmānaṃ jīvaṃ yo hantāraṃ khaḍgādinā hiṃsakaṃ vetti yaś cainaṃ tena hataṃ hiṃsitaṃ manyate tāv ubhau tat-svarūpaṃ na vijānītaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:914: atisūkṣmasya caitanyasya tasya chedādy-asambhavān nāyam ātmā hanti na hanyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:915: hanteḥ kartā karma ca bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:916: hanter deha-viyogārthatvān na tenātmanāṃ nāśo mantavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:917: śrutiś caivam āha - hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam [KaṭhU 1.2.19] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c02u:918: etena mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtāni ity ādi-vākyaṃ deha-viyoga-paraṃ vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c02u:919: na cātrātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ prasiddham iti vācyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:924: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:927: śrīdharaḥ : na hanyata ity etad eva ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-śūnyatvena draḍhayati neti /
GE07bhg4c02u:932: na cāyaṃ bhūtvā utpadya bhavitā bhavati astitvaṃ bhajate,
GE07bhg4c02u:933: kintu prāg eva svataḥ sad-rūpa iti janmāntarāstitva-lakṣaṇa-dvitīya-vikāra-pratiṣedhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:935: yo hi na jāyate sa hi janmāntaram astitvaṃ bhajate,
GE07bhg4c02u:936: na tu yaḥ svayam evāsti sa bhūyo 'pi anyad astitvaṃ bhajate ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:940: purāpi nava eva na tu pariṇāmataḥ rūpāntaraṃ prāpya navo bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:941: yad vā na bhavitety asyānuṣaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhūyo 'dhikaṃ yathā bhaviteti tathā na bhavatīti vṛddhi-pratiṣedhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:942: ajo nitya iti cobhaya-vṛddhy-ādy-abhāve hetur iti na paunaruktyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:943: tad evaṃ jāyate asti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate naśyaty evaṃ yāskādibhir veda-vādibhir uktāḥ ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārā nirastāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:944: yad artham ete vikārā nirastās taṃ prastutaṃ vināśābhāvam upasaṃharati na hanyate hanyamāne śarīra iti //20//
GE07bhg4c02u:946: kasmād ayam ātmā hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartā karma ca na bhavati ?
GE07bhg4c02u:948: jāyate 'sti vardhate vipariṇamate 'pakṣīyate vinaśyatīti ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārā iti vārṣyāyaṇiḥ iti nairuktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:949: tatrādy-antayor niṣedhaḥ kriyate na jāyate mriyate veti /
GE07bhg4c02u:951: na jāyate na mriyate cety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:953: yasmād ayam ātmā kadācit kasminn api kāle na bhūtvābhūtvā prāg bhūyaḥ punar api bhavitā na /
GE07bhg4c02u:954: yo hy abhūtvā bhavati sa utpatti-lakṣaṇāṃ vikriyām anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:955: ayaṃ tu prāg api sattvādyato notpadyate 'to 'jaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:956: tathāyam ātmā bhūtvā prāk kadācid bhūyaḥ punar na bhavitā /
GE07bhg4c02u:958: yo hi prāg-bhūtvottara-kāle na bhavati sa mṛt-lakṣaṇāṃ vikriyām anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:960: 'pi sattvādyato na miryate 'to nityo vināśāyogya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:961: atra na bhūtvety atra samāsābhāve 'pi nānupapattir nānuyojeṣv ativat /
GE07bhg4c02u:963: yat tu kātyāyanenoktaṃ samāsa-nityatābhiprāyeṇa vā-vacanānarthakyaṃ tu svabhāva-siddhatvāt iti tad-bhagavat-pāṇiini-vacana-virodhād anādeyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:964: tad uktam ācārya-śavara-svāminā - asad-vādī hi kātyāyanaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:965: atra na jāyate mriyate veti pratijñā /
GE07bhg4c02u:966: kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūya iti tad-upapādanam /
GE07bhg4c02u:967: ajo nitya iti tad-upasaṃhāra iti vibhāgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:968: ādyantayor vikārayor niṣedhena madhyavarti-vikārāṇāṃ tad-vyāpyānāṃ niṣedhe jāte 'pi gamanādi-vikārāṇām anuktānām apy upalakṣaṇāyāpakṣayaś ca vṛddhiś ca sva-śabdenaiva nirākriyete /
GE07bhg4c02u:969: tatra kūṭastha-nityatvād ātmano nirguṇatvāc ca na svarūpato guṇato vāpakṣayaḥ sambhavatīty uktaṃ śāśvata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:970: śaśvat sarvadā bhavati nāpakṣīyate nāpacīyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:971: yadi nāpakṣīyate tarhi vardhatām iti nety āha purāṇa iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:972: purāpi nava eka-rūpo na tv adhunā nūtanāṃ kāñcid avasthām anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:973: yo hi nūtanāṃ kāñcid upacayāvasthām anubhavati sa vardhata ity ucyate loke /
GE07bhg4c02u:974: ayaṃ tu sarvadaika-rūpatvān nāpacīyate nopacīyate cety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:977: yasmād evaṃ sarva-vikāra-śūnya ātmā tasmāc charīre hanyamāne tat-sambaddho 'pi kenāpy upāyena na hanyate na hantuṃ śakyata ity upasaṃhāraḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c02u:979: jīvātmano nityatvaṃ spaṣṭatayā sādhayati na jāyate miryate iti janma-maraṇayor vartamānatva-niṣedhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:980: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā iti tayor bhūtatva-bhaviṣyatva-niṣedhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:981: ataeva aja iti kāla-traye 'pi ajasya janmābhāvān nāsya prāg-abhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:982: śāśvataḥ śaśvat sarva-kāla eva vartata iti nāsya kāla-traye 'pi dhvaṃsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:984: tarhi bahu-kāla-sthāyitvāj jarā-grasto 'yam iti cen na /
GE07bhg4c02u:985: purāṇaḥ purāpi navaḥ prācīno 'py ayaṃ navīna iveti ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:986: nanu śarīrasya maraṇād aupacārikaṃ tu maraṇam asyāstu ?
GE07bhg4c02u:989: baladevaḥ : atha jāyate asti vardhate viparaṇamate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti yāskādy-ukta-ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-rāhityena prāg-ukta-nityatvaṃ draḍhayati na jāyate iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:991: ayam ātmā jīvaḥ kadācid api kāle na jāyate na mriyate ceti janma-vināśayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:992: na cāyam ātmā bhūtvotpadya bhavitā bhaviṣyatīti janmāntarasyāstitvasya pratiṣedhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:993: na bhūya iti ayam ātmā bhūyo 'dhikaṃ yathā syāt tathā na bhavatīti buddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:994: kuto bhūyo na bhavatīty atra hetur ajo nitya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:995: utpatti-vināśa-yogī khalu vṛkṣādir utpadya vṛddhiṃ gacchan naṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:996: ātmanas tu tad-ubhayābhāvāt na vṛddhir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:998: śaśvat sarvadā bhavati nāpakṣīyate nāpakṣayaṃ bhajatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1000: purāpi navo na tu kiṃcin nūtanaṃ rūpāntaram adhunā na labdha ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1002: yasmād īdṛśas tasmāc charīre hanyamāne 'pi sa na hanyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1003: tathā cārjuno 'yaṃ guru-hantety avijñoktyā duṣkīrter abibhyatā tvayā śāstrīyaṃ dharma-yuddhaṃ vidheyam //20//
GE07bhg4c02u:1006: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1007: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam //21//
GE07bhg4c02u:1008: śrīdharaḥ : ataeva hantṛtvābhāvo 'pi pūrvoktaḥ prasiddha ity āha vedāvināśinam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1012: yo veda sa puruṣaḥ kaṃ hanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1015: tathā svayaṃ prayojako bhūtvānyena kaṃ ghātayati ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1019: anena mayy api prayojakatvād doṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ mā kārṣīr ity uktaṃ bhavati //21//
GE07bhg4c02u:1021: nāyaṃ hanti na hanyata iti pratijñāya na hanyata ity upapāditam idānīṃ na hantīty upapādayann upasaṃharati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1022: na vinaṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tam avināśinam antya-vikāra-rahitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1023: tatra hetuḥ - avyayaṃ na vidyate vyayo 'vayavāpacayo guṇāpacayo vā yasya tam avyayam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1024: avayavāpacayena guṇāpacayena vā vināśa-darśanāt tad-ubhaya-rahitasya na vināśaḥ sambhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1025: nanu janyatvena vināśitvam anumāsyāmahe nety āha - ajam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1028: prāg-avidyamānasya hi janma dṛṣṭaṃ na tu sarvatā sata ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1032: janma-vināśa-śūnyaṃ jāyamānasya vinaśyataś ca sarva-vyāpakatva-satyatvayor ayogāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1033_0: evaṃ sarva-vikriyā-śūnyaṃ prakṛtam enaṃ dehinaṃ svam ātmānaṃ yo veda vijānāti śāstrācāryopadeśābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1033_1: sākṣātkaroti ahaṃ sarva-vikriyā-śūnyaḥ sarva-bhāsakaḥ sarva-dvaita-rahitaḥ paramānanda-bodha-rūpa
GE07bhg4c02u:1033_2: iti sa evaṃ vidvān puruṣaḥ pūrṇa-rūpaḥ kaṃ hanti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1036: na kam api hanti na katham api hantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1037: tathā kaṃ ghātayati kathaṃ ghātayati kam api na ghātayati katham api na ghātayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1040: ātmānaṃ ced vijānīyād ayam asmīti pūruṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1041: kim icchan kasya kāmāya śarīram anusaṃjvaret // [BAU 4.4.12]
GE07bhg4c02u:1042: iti śuddham ātmānaṃ viduṣas tad-ajñāna-nibandhanādhyāsa-nivṛttau tan-mūla-rāga-dveṣādy-abhāvāt-kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvādy-abhāvaṃ darśayati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1044: vastu-gatyā ko 'pi nakaroti na kārayati ca kiṃcit sarva-vikriyā-śūnya-svabhāvatvāt paraṃ tu svapna ivāvidyayā kartṛtvādikam ātmany abhimanyate mūḍhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1045: tad uktam ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ [Gītā 2.19] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1046: śrutiś ca - dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva [BAU 4.3.7] ity ādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1048: vidvāṃs tu samūlādhyāsa-bādhān nātmani kartṛtvādikam abhimanyate sthāṇu-svarūpaṃ vidvān iva coratvam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1049: ato vikriyā-rahitatvād advitīyatvāc ca vidvān na karoti kārayati cety ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1050: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- vidvān na bibheti kutaścana [TaittU 2.9.1] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1051: arjuno hi svasmin kartṛtvaṃ bhagavati ca kārayitṛtvam adhyasya hiṃsā-nimittaṃ doṣam ubhayatrāpy āśaśaṅke /
GE07bhg4c02u:1052: bhagavān api viditābhiprāyo hanti ghātayatīti tad-ubhayam ācikṣepa /
GE07bhg4c02u:1054: āropya pratyavāya-śaṅkāṃ mā kārṣīr ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1055: avikriyatva-pradarśanenātmanaḥ kartṛtva-pratiṣedhāt sarva-karmākṣepe bhagavad-abhiprete hantir upalakṣaṇārthaḥ puraḥ-sphūrtikatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1057: tathā ca vakṣyati tasya kāryaṃ na vidyata [Gītā 3.17] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1058: ato 'tra hanana-mātrākṣepeṇa karmāntaraṃ bhagavatābhyanujñāyata iti mūḍha-jana-jalpitam apāstam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1059: tasmād yudhyasvety atra hananasya bhagavatābhyanujñānād vāstava-kartṛtvādy-abhāvasya karma-mātre samatvād iti dik //21//
GE07bhg4c02u:1061: ata evambhūta-jñāne sati tvaṃ yudhyamāno 'pi ahaṃ yuddhe prerayann api doṣa-bhājau naiva bhavāva ity āha vedeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1065: avyayam ity etair vināśa-janyā apekṣayā niṣiddhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1070: baladevaḥ : evaṃ tattva-jñānavān yo dharma-buddhyā yuddhe pravartate yaś ca pravartayati,
GE07bhg4c02u:1071: tasya tasya ca ko 'pi na doṣa-gandha ity āha vedeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1072: enaṃ prakṛtam ātmānam avināśinam ajam avyayam apakṣaya-śūnyaṃ ca yo veda śāstra-yuktibhyāṃ jānāti,
GE07bhg4c02u:1073: sa puruṣo yuddhe pravṛtto 'pi kaṃ hanti kathaṃ vā hanti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1074: tatra pravartayann api kaṃ ghātayati kathaṃ vā ghātayati ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1075: kim ākṣepe - na kam api na katham apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1083: śrīdharaḥ : nanv ātmano 'vināśe 'pi tadīya-śarīra-nāśaṃ paryālocya śocāmīiti cet ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1085: karmaṇi bandhanānāṃ nūtanānāṃ dehānām avaśyambhāvitvāt na taj-jīrṇa-deha-nāśe śokāvakāśa ity arthaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c02u:1087_0: nanv evam ātmano vināśitvābhāve 'pi dehānāṃ vināśitvād yuddhasya ca tan-nāśakatvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1087_1: kathaṃ bhīṣmādi-dehānām aneka-sukṛta-sādhanānāṃ mayā yuddhena vināśaḥ kārya ity āśaṅkāyā uttaram vāsāṃsīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1088: jīrṇāni vihāya vastrāṇi navāni gṛhṇāti vikriyā-śūnya eva naro yathety etāvataiva virvāhe 'parāṇīit viśeṣaṇam utkarṣātiśaya-khyāpanārtham /
GE07bhg4c02u:1089: tena yathā nikṛṣṭāni vastrāṇi vihāyotkṛṣṭāni jano gṛhṇātīty aucityāyātam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1090_0: tathā jīrṇāni vayasā tapasā ca kṛśāni bhīṣmādi-śarīrāṇi vihāyānyāni devādi-śarīrāṇi
GE07bhg4c02u:1090_2: prāpnoti dehī prakṛṣṭa-dharmānuṣṭhātṛ-dehavān bhīṣmādir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1091: anyan navataraṃ kalyāṇataraṃ rūpaṃ kurute pitryaṃ vā gandharvaṃ vā daivaṃ vā prājāpatyaṃ vā brāhmaṃ vā ity ādi śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1092_0: etad uktaṃ bhavati bhīṣmādayo hi yāvaj jīvaṃ dharmānuṣṭhāna-kleśenaiva jarjara-śarīrā
GE07bhg4c02u:1092_1: vartamāna-śarīra-pātam antareṇa tat-phala-bhogāyāsam arthā yadi dharma-yuddhena svarga-pratibandhakāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1092_2: jarjarāṇi śarīrāṇi pātayitvā divya-deha-sampādanena svarga-bhoga-yogyāḥ kriyante
GE07bhg4c02u:1093: duryodhanādīnām api svarga-bhoga-yogya-deha-sampādanān mahān upakāra eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1094: tathā cātyantam upakārake yuddhe 'pakārakatva-bhramaṃ mā kārṣīr iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1095: aparāṇi anyāni saṃyātīti pada-traya-vaśād bhagavad-abhiprāya evam abhyūhitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1096: anena dṛṣṭāntenāvikṛta-pratipādanam ātmanaḥ kriyata iti tu prācāṃ vyākhyānam atispaṣṭam //22//
GE07bhg4c02u:1098: nanu madīya-yuddhād bhīṣma-saṃjñakaṃ śarīraṃ tu jīvātmā tyakṣyaty eva ity atas tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca tatra hetu bhavāva eva ity ata āha vāsāṃsīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1099: navīnaṃ vastraṃ paridhāpayituṃ jīrṇa-vastrasya tyajane kaścit kiṃ doṣo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1100: tathā śarīrāṇīti bhīṣmo jīrṇa-śarīraṃ parityajya divyaṃ navyaṃ anyac charīraṃ prāpsyatīti kas tava vā mama vā doṣo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c02u:1101: baladevaḥ : nanu mā bhūd ātmanāṃ vināśo bhīṣmādi-saṃjñānāṃ tac-charīrāṇāṃ tat-sukha-sādhanānāṃ yuddhena vināśe tat-sukha-viccheda-hetuko doṣaḥ syād eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1102: anyathā prāyaścitta-śāstrāṇi nirviṣayāṇi syur iti cet tatrāha vāsāṃsīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1103: sthūla-jīrṇa-vāsas-tyāgena navīna-vāso-dhāraṇam iva vṛddha-nṛ-deha-tyāgena yuva-deva-deha-dhāraṇaṃ teṣām ātmanām atisukhakaram eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1104: tad ubhayaṃ ca yuddhenaiva kṣipraṃ bhaved ity upakārakāt tasmān mā viraṃsīr iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1105: saṃyātīti samyag-garbha-vāsādi-yātanāṃ vinaiva śīghram eva prāpnotīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1106: prāyaścitta-vākyāni tu yajña-yuddha-vadhād anyasmin vadhe neyāni //22//
GE07bhg4c02u:1109: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1110: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c02u:1111: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ hantīti anena uktaṃ vadha-sādhanābhāvaṃ darśayann avināśitvam ātmanaḥ sphuṭīkaroti nainam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1112: āpo kledayanti mṛdu-karaṇena śithilaṃ na kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1116: na ca yuddhe tvayā prayuktebhyaḥ śastrāstrebhyaḥ kāpy ātmano vyathā sambhaved ity āha nainam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1121: baladevaḥ : nanu śastra-pātaiḥ śarīra-vināśe tad-antaḥ-sthasyātmano vināśaḥ syāt gṛha-dāhe tan-madhya-sthasyaiva jantor iti cet tatrāha nainam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1126: tathā ca tat-prayuktaiḥ śastrāstrair nātmanaḥ kācid vyatheti //23//
GE07bhg4c02u:1131: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha acchedya ity ādinā sārdhena /
GE07bhg4c02u:1141: śastrādīnāṃ tan-nāśakatvāsāmarthye tasya taj-janita-nāśānarhatve hetum āha acchedya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1145: yato 'śoṣyo 'yam ato nainaṃ śoṣayati māruta iti krameṇa yojanīyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1151: yāvad-vikāraṃ tu vibhāgaḥ iti nyāyāt parābhyupagata-paramāṇv-ādīnām anabhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1152: ayaṃ tu sarva-gato vibhur ato nitya eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1154: yadi cāyaṃ vikārī syāt tadā sarva-gato na syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1158: yadi cāyaṃ calaḥ kriyāvān syāt tadā vikārī syād ghaṭādivat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1163: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt sanātano 'yaṃ sarvadaika-rūpo na kasyā api kriyāyāḥ karmety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1168: sarvagatatvān na prāpyaḥ paricchinnasyaiva paya-ādeḥ prāpyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1172: tathā ca śrutayaḥ - ākāśavat sarva-gataś ca nityaḥ [ChāU 3.14.3],
GE07bhg4c02u:1173: vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ [ŚvetU 3.9],
GE07bhg4c02u:1175_0: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yo 'psu tiṣṭhann adbhyo 'ntaro yas tejasi tiṣṭhaṃs
GE07bhg4c02u:1175_1: tejaso 'ntaro yo vāyau tiṣṭan vāyor antaraḥ [BAU 3.7.3 ff] ity ādyā ca śrutiḥ sarvagatasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1176: yo hi śastrādau na tiṣṭhati taṃ śastrādayaś chindanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1177: ayaṃ tu śastrādīnāṃ sattā-sphūrti-pradatvena tat-prerakas tad-antaryāmī /
GE07bhg4c02u:1180: atra yena sūryas tapati tejaseddhaḥ [Taitt. Br. 3.12.97] ity ādi śrutayo 'nusandheyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1181: saptamādhyāye ca prakaṭīkariṣyati śrī-bhagavān iti dik //24//
GE07bhg4c02u:1183: tasmād ātmāyam evam ucyata ity āha acchedya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1184: atra prakaraṇe jīvātmano nityatvasya śabdato 'rthataś ca paunaruktyaṃ nirdhāraṇa-prayojakaṃ sandigdhadhīṣu jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1185: yathā kalāv asmin dharmo 'sti dharmo 'stīti tri-caturdhā-prayogād dharmo 'sty eveti niḥsaṃśayā pratītiḥ syād iti jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1188: atisūkṣmatvād avyaktas tad api deha-vyāpi-caitanyatvād acintyo 'tarkyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1190: baladevaḥ : chedādy-abhāvād eva tat-tan-nāmabhir ayam ākhyāyata ity āha acchedyo 'yam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1192: sarva-gataḥ sva-karma-hetukeṣu deva-mānavādiṣu paśu-pakṣy-ādiṣu ca sarveṣu śarīreṣu paryāyeṇa gataḥ prāpto 'pīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1195: avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchitti-dharmā [Bau 4.5.14] iti śruter ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1196: na cānucchittir eva dharmo yasyeti vyākhyeyaṃ tasyārthasyāvināśīty anenaiva lābhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1197: tasmād anucchittayo nityā dharmā yasya sa tathety evārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1198: sanātanaḥ śāśvataḥ paunarukta-doṣas tv agre parihariṣyate //24//
GE07bhg4c02u:1206: avikāryaḥ karmendriyāṇām apy agocara ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1209: tad evam ātmano janma-vināśābhāvān na śokaḥ kārya ity uktam //25//
GE07bhg4c02u:1211: chedyatvādi-grāhaka-pramāṇa-bhāvād api tad-abhāva ity āha - avyakto 'yam ity-ādy-ardhena /
GE07bhg4c02u:1212: yo hīndriya-gocaro bhavati sa pratyakṣatvād vyakta ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1214: ato na pratyakṣaṃ tatra cchedyatvādi-grāhakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1215: pratyakṣābhāve 'py anumānaṃ syād ity ata āha acintyo 'yaṃ cintyo 'numeyas tad-vilakṣaṇo 'yam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1216: kvacit pratyakṣo hi vahny-ādir gṛhīta-vyāptikasya dhūmāder darśanāt kvacid anumeyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1217: apratyakṣe tu vyāpti-grahaṇāsambhavān nānumeyatvam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1218_0: apratyakṣasyāpīndriyādeḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumāna-viṣayatvaṃ dṛṣṭam ata āha avikāryo
GE07bhg4c02u:1218_1: 'yaṃ yad vikriyāvac cakṣur-ādikaṃ tat-svakāryānyathānupapattyā kalpyamānam arthāpatteḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1219: ayaṃ tu na vikāryo na vikriyāvān ato nārthāpatteḥ sāmānyato-dṛṣṭasya vā viṣaya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1221: nanu vedenaiva tatra ccehdyatvādi grahīṣyata ity ata āha - ucyate vedena sopakaraṇenācchedyāvyaktādi-rūpa evāyam ucyate tātparyeṇa pratipādyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1222: ato na vedasya tat-pratipādikasyāpi cchedyatvādi-pratipādakatvam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1223: atra nainaṃ chindanti [Gītā 2.23] ity atra śastrādīnāṃ tan-nāśaka-sāmarthyābhāva uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1224: acchedyo 'yam ity ādau tasya cchedādi-karmatvāyogyatvam uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1225: avyakto 'yam ity atra tac-chedādi-grāhaka-mānābhāva ukta ity apaunaruktyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1226: vedāvināśinam ity ādīnāṃ tu ślokānām arthataḥ śabdataś ca paunaruktyaṃ bhāṣya-kṛdbhiḥ parihṛtam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1227_0: durbodhatvād ātma-vastunaḥ punaḥ punaḥ prasaṅgam āpādya śabdāntareṇa tad eva vastu
GE07bhg4c02u:1227_1: nirūpayati bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kathaṃ nu nāma saṃsāriṇām buddhi-gocaratām āpannaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1227_2: tattvaṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttaye syāt iti [Śaṅkara-bhāṣya 2.24] iti vadadbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1228: evaṃ pūrvokta-yuktibhir ātmano nityatve nirvikāratve ca siddhe tava śoko nopapanna ity upasaṃharati tasmād ity ardhena /
GE07bhg4c02u:1229: etādṛśātma-svarūpa-vedanasya śoka-kāraṇa-nivartakatvāt tasmin sati śoko nocitaḥ kāraṇa-bhāve kāryābhāvasyāvaśyakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1230: tenātmānam aviditvā yad anvaśocas tad yuktam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1231: ātmānaṃ viditvā tu nānuśocitum arhasīty abhiprāyaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c02u:1237: atra avināśi tu tad viddhi ity ādibhir ātma-tattvam upadiśan hariḥ śabdato 'rthataś ca yat punaḥ punar avocat tasya durbodhasya saubodhyārtham evety adoṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1239: ayaṃ dharmaṃ vettīty uktau tad vedanaṃ niścitaṃ yathā syāt tadvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1240: evam evāgre vakṣyati āścaryavat paśyati kaścit ity ādinā //25//
GE07bhg4c02u:1243: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1244: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi //26//
GE07bhg4c02u:1245: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ dehena saha ātmano janma tad-vināśena ca vināśam aṅgīkṛtyāpi śoko na kārya ity āha atha cainam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1246: atha ca yadyapy enam ātmānam nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi //26//
GE07bhg4c02u:1248: evam ātmano nirvikāratvenāśocyatvam uktam idānīṃ vikāravattvam abhyupetyāpi śloka-dvayenāśocyatvaṃ pratipādayati bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:1250: deha evātmā sa ca sthiro 'py anukṣaṇa-pariṇāmī jāyate naśyati ceti pratyakṣa-siddham evaitad iti lokāyatikāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1251: dehātirikto 'pi dehena sahaiva jāyate naśyati cety anye /
GE07bhg4c02u:1252: sargādya-kāla evākāśavaj jāyate deha-bhede 'py anuvartamāna evākalpa-sthāyī naśyati pralaya ity apare /
GE07bhg4c02u:1253: nitya evātmā jāyate mriyate ceti tārkikāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1257: idaṃ cobhayaṃ dharmādharma-nimittatvāt tad-ādhārasya nityasyaiva mukhyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1261: tatrānityatva-pakṣe 'pi śocyatvam ātmano niṣedhati atha cainam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1264: yadi durbodhatvād ātma-vastuno 'sakṛc-chravaṇe 'py avadhāraṇā-sāmarthyān mad-ukta-pakṣānaṅgīkāreṇa pakṣāntaram abhyupaiṣi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1265: tatrāpy anityatva-pakṣam evāśritya yady enam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ jātaṃ nityaṃ mṛtaṃ vā manyase /
GE07bhg4c02u:1267: kṣaṇikatva-pakṣe nityaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ pakṣāntare āvaśyakatvān nityaṃ niyataṃ jāto 'yaṃ mṛto 'yam iti laukika-pratyaya-vaśena yadi kalpayasi tathāpi he mahābāho /
GE07bhg4c02u:1269: tvayy etādṛśī kudṛṣṭir na sambhavatīti sānukampaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1270: evaṃ aha bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam [Gītā 1.45] ity ādi yathā śocasi evaṃ prakāram anuśokaṃ kartuṃ svayam api tvaṃ tādṛśa eva san nārhasi yogyo na bhavasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1272: saha janma-vināśa-pakṣe ca janmāntarābhāvena pāpa-bhayāsambhavāt pāpa-bhayenaiva khalu tvam anuśocasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1273: tac caitādṛśe darśane na sambhavati bandhu-vināśa-darśitvābhāvād ity adhikaṃ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1275: dṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimitta-śoka-sambhave 'py adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śokaḥ sarvathā nocita ity arthaḥ prathama-ślokasya //26//
GE07bhg4c02u:1277: tad evaṃ śāstrīya-tattva-dṛṣṭyā tvām ahaṃ prabodhayan /
GE07bhg4c02u:1279: nitya-jātaṃ dehe jāte saty enaṃ nityaṃ niyataṃ jātaṃ manyase /
GE07bhg4c02u:1280: tathā deha eva mṛte mṛtaṃ nityaṃ niyataṃ manyase /
GE07bhg4c02u:1281: mahā-bāho iti parākramavataḥ kṣatriyasya tava tad api yuddham avaśyakaṃ svadharmaḥ / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c02u:1283: bhrātāpi bhrātaraṃ hanyād yena ghorataras tataḥ // iti bhāvaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c02u:1284: baladevaḥ : evaṃ svoktasya jīvātmano 'śocyatvam uktvā paroktasyāpi tasya tad ucyate para-mata-jñānāya /
GE07bhg4c02u:1285: tad-abhijñaḥ khalu śiṣyas tad-avakarais tan nirasya vijayī san sva-mate sthairyam āsīt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1286: tathā hi manuṣyatvādi-viśiṣṭe bhūmy-ādi-bhūta-catuṣṭaye tāmbūla-rāgavat mada-śaktivac ca caitanyam utpadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1288: sa ca sthiro 'pi pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmād utpatti-vināśa-yogīti loka-pratyakṣa-siddham iti lokāyatikā manyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1289: dehād bhinno vijñāna-svarūpo 'py ātmā pratikṣaṇa-vināśīti vaibhāṣikādayo bauddhā vadanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1290: tad etad ubhaya-mate 'py ātmanaḥ śocyatvaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1294: tatra dehātma-pakṣe enaṃ deha-lakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ vā
GE07bhg4c02u:1297: tathāpi tvam enaṃ aho bata mahat pāpaṃ ity ādi-vacanaiḥ śocituṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1298: pariṇāma-svabhāvasya tasya tasya cātmano janma-vināśayor anivāryatvāj janmāntarābhāvena pāpa-bhayāsambhavāc ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:1299: he mahābāho iti sopahāsaṃ sambodhanaṃ kṣatriya-varyasya vaidikasya ca te nedṛśaṃ kumataṃ dhāryam iti bhāvaḥ //26/
GE07bhg4c02u:1302: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:1303: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi //27//
GE07bhg4c02u:1306: hi yasmāj jātasya svārambhaka-karma-kṣaye mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1307: mṛtasya ca tad-deha-kṛtena karmaṇā janmāpi dhruvam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1308: tasmād evam aparihārye 'rthe avaśyambhāvini janma-maraṇa-lakṣaṇe 'rthe tvaṃ vidvān śocitum nārhasi yogyo na bhavasi //27//
GE07bhg4c02u:1310: nanv ātmana ābhūta-saṃplava-sthāyitva-pakṣe ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-duḥkha-sambhavāt tad-bhayena śocāmīty ata āha dvitīya-ślokena jātasya hīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1311_1: sthirasyātmano dhruva āvaśyako mṛtyus tac-charīrādi-vicchedas tad-ārambhaka-karma-kṣaya-nimittaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1312: tathā dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca prāg-deha-kṛta-karma-phalopabhogārthaṃ sānuśayasyaiva prastutatvān na jīvan-mukte vyabhicāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1313: tasmād evam aparihārye parihartum aśakye 'smin janma-maraṇa-lakṣaṇe 'rthe viṣaye tvam evaṃ vidvān na śocitum arhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1314: tathā ca vakṣyati ṛte 'pi tvāṃ na bhaviṣyanti sarve [Gītā 11.32] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1315: yadi hi tvayā yuddhe 'nāhanyamānā ete jīveyur eva tadā yuddhāya śokas tavocitaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1317: svayam eva mriyanta iti tat-parihārāsamarthasya tava dṛṣṭ-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śoko nocita iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1318: evam adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimitte 'pi śoke tasmād aparihārye 'rthe ity evottaram /
