GE07bhg4c02u:1319: yuddhākhyaṃ hi karma kṣatriyasya niyatam agnihotrādivat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1320: tac ca yudha samprahāre ity asmād dhātor niṣpannaṃ śatru-prāṇa-viyogānukūla-śastra-prahāra-rūpaṃ vihitatvāgnīṣomīyādi-siṃhāvan na pratyavāya-janakam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1321: tathā ca gautamaḥ smarati na doṣo hiṃsāyām āhave 'nyatra vyaśvāsārathyanuyudha-kṛtāñjali-prakīrṇa-keśa-parāṅmukhopaviṣṭa-sthala-vṛkṣārūḍha-dūta-go-brāhmaṇa-vādibhyaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1323: etac ca sarvaṃ svadharmam api cāvekṣyety atra spaṣṭīkariṣyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1324: tathā ca yuddha-lakṣaṇe 'rthe 'gnihotrādivad vihitatvād aparihārye parihartum aśakye tad-akaraṇe pratyavāya-prasaṅgāt tvam adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-bhayena
GE07bhg4c02u:1326: yadi tu yuddhākhyaṃ karma kāmyam eva -
GE07bhg4c02u:1328: akūṭair āyudhair yānti te svargaṃ yogino yathā // [Yajñ. 13.324]
GE07bhg4c02u:1330: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm [Gītā 2.37] iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:1331: tadāpi prārabdhasya kāmyasyāpi avaśya-parisamāpanīyatvena nitya-tulyatvāt tvayā ca yuddhasya prārabdhatvād aparihāryatvaṃ tyulyam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1332: athavātma-nityatva-pakṣa eva śloka-dvayam arjunasya paramāstikasya veda-bāhya-matābhyupagamāsambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1333_0: akṣara-yojanā tu nityaś cāsau dehendriyādi-sambandha-vaśāj jātaś ceti nitya-jātas
GE07bhg4c02u:1333_1: tam enam ātmānaṃ nityam api santaṃ jātaṃ cen manyase tathā nityam api santaṃ mṛtaṃ

GE07bhg4c02u:1340: aparihārye 'rthe iti mṛtyur janma ca parihartum a]cakyam eva ity arthaḥ //27//

GE07bhg4c02u:1348: jātasya sva-karma-vaśāt prāpta-śarīrādi-yogasya nityasyāpy ātmanas tad-ārambhaka-karma-kṣaya-hetuko mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ /

GE07bhg4c02u:1351: tvayi yuddhān nivṛtte 'py ete svārambhake karmaṇi kṣīṇe sati mariṣyanty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1358: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca dehānāṃ svabhāvaṃ paryālocya tad-upādhike ātmano janma-maraṇe śoko na kārya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1361: tad eva ādir utpatteḥ pūrva-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyaktādīni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1364: tathā vyaktam abhivyaktaṃ madhyaṃ janma-maraṇāntarālaṃ sthiti-lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni vyakta-madhyāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1365: avyakte nidhanaṃ layo yeṣāṃ tānīmāny evaṃ-bhūtāny eva /

GE07bhg4c02u:1370: tad evaṃ sarva-prakāreṇātmano 'śocyatvam upapāditam athedānīm ātmano 'śocyatve 'pi bhūta-saṅghātātmakāni śarīrāṇy uddiśya śocāmīty arjunāśaṅkām apanudati bhagavān avyaktādīnīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1371: ādau janmanaḥ prāg-avyaktāni anupalabdhāni bhūtāni pṛthivyādi-bhūta-mayāni śarīrāṇi madhye janmānantaraṃ maraṇāt prāg-vyaktāni upalabdhāni santi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1373: yathā svapnendrajālādau pratibhāsa-mātra-jīvanāni śukti-rūpyādivan na tu jñānāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ vā sthitāni dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭy-abhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1374: tathā ca - ādāv ante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā [ṃā. Kā. 2.6] iti nyāyena madhye 'pi na santy evaitāni /

GE07bhg4c02u:1380_0: avyaktam avyākṛtam avidyopahita-caitanyam ādiḥ prāg avasthā yeṣāṃ tāni tathā vyaktaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1380_1: nāma-rūpābhyām evāvidyakābhyāṃ prakaṭībhūtaṃ na tu svena paramārtha-sadātmanā madhyaṃ

GE07bhg4c02u:1380_3: mṛd iva ghaṭādīnāṃ nidhanaṃ pralayo yeṣāṃ teṣu bhūteṣu kā paridevaneti pūrvavat /

GE07bhg4c02u:1385: uddiśya nocita iti kim u vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1386: athavā sarvadā teṣām avyakta-rūpeṇa vidyamānatvād vicchedābhāvena tan-nimittaḥ pralāpo nocita ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1387: bhāratety anena sambodhayan śuddha-vaṃśodbhavatvena śāstrīyam arthaṃ pratipattum arho 'si kim iti na pratipadyasa iti sūcayati //28//
GE07bhg4c02u:1389: tad evaṃ na jāyate na mriyate ity-ādinā,
GE07bhg4c02u:1390: deha-pakṣe ca jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyuḥ ity anena śoka-viṣayaṃ nirākṛtya idānīm ubhaya-pakṣe 'pi nirākaroti avyakteti /

GE07bhg4c02u:1395: na vyakti nidhanād anantaraṃ yeṣāṃ tāni /

GE07bhg4c02u:1397: tasmāt sarva-bhūtāni ādy-antarayor avyaktāni madhye vyaktānīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1398: yad uktaṃ śrutibhiḥ - sthira-cara-jātayaḥ syur ajayottha-nimitta-yujaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1401: yan manyase dhruvaṃ lokam adhruvaṃ vā na cobhayam /

GE07bhg4c02u:1403: baladevaḥ : atha dehātma-pakṣe ātmātirikta-deha-pakṣe ca deha-vināśa-hetuka-śoko na yuktas tad-ārambhakāṇāṃ bhūta-mātrāṇām avināśād ity āha avyaktādīnīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1404: avyaktaṃ nāma-rūpa-virahāt sūkṣmaṃ pradhānam ādi ādi-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyakta-nidhanāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1405: avyakte tādṛśi pradhāne nidhanaṃ nāma-rūpa-vimardana-lakṣaṇo nāśo yeṣāṃ tāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1406: mṛd-ādike sad-rūpe dravye kambu-grīvādy-avasthā-yoge ghaṭasyotpattis tad-virodhi-kapālādy-avasthā-yogas tu tasya vināśaḥ kathyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1408: evam evāha bhagavān parāśaraḥ - mahī ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭataḥ kapālikā cūrṇa-rajas tato 'ṇuḥ [ViP 2.12.42] iti /

GE07bhg4c02u:1413: dehānya-nityātma-pakṣe tu vāsāṃsi ity ādikaṃ na vismartavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1414_0: yat tv ādy-antayor asattvān madhye 'pi bhūtāny asanty evātaḥ svāpnika-rathāśvādi-prakhyāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1414_1: mṛṣā-bhūtāny eva tena tad-viyoga-hetukaḥ śokaḥ pratibuddhasya na dṛṣṭa iti dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭim
GE07bhg4c02u:1415: tad evaṃ mata-dvaye 'pi deha-vināśa-hetukaḥ śoko nāstīti siddham //28//
GE07bhg4c02u:1421: śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścit //29//
GE07bhg4c02u:1422: śrīdharaḥ : kutas tarhi vidvāṃso 'pi loke śocanti ?

GE07bhg4c02u:1425: sarva-gatasya nitya-jñānānada-svabhāvasyātmanaḥ alaukikatvād aindrajālikavad ghaṭamānaṃ paśyann iva vismayena paśyati asambhāvanābhibhūtatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1428: kaścit punaḥ viparīta-bhāvanābhibhūtaḥ śrutvāpi naiva veda /
GE07bhg4c02u:1429: ca-śabdād uktvāpi na dṛṣṭvāpi na samyag vedeti draṣṭavyam //29//

GE07bhg4c02u:1432_1: ca tavāpy anyeṣām iva svāśaya-doṣād iti nokta-doṣa-dvayam ity abhipretyātmano durvijñeyatām
GE07bhg4c02u:1433_0: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinam āścaryeṇādbhutena tulyatayā vartamānam āvidyaka-nānā-vidha-viruddha-dharmavattayā
GE07bhg4c02u:1433_1: satanm apy asantam iva sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpam api jaḍam ivānanda-ghanam api duḥkhitam
GE07bhg4c02u:1433_2: iva nirvikāram api savikāram iva nityam anityam iva prakāśamānam apy aprakāśamānam

GE07bhg4c02u:1437_1: sarvadā samādhi-niṣṭho 'pi vyuttiṣṭhati vyutthito 'pi punaḥ samādhim anubhavatīti
GE07bhg4c02u:1438: tad etat trayam apy āścaryam ātmā taj jñānaṃ taj-jñātā ceti parama-durvijñeyam ātmānaṃ tvaṃ katham anāyāsena jānīyā ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1439: īvam upadeṣṭur abhāvād apy ātmā durvijñeyaḥ /

GE07bhg4c02u:1444: yathā kathaṃcij jñāto 'pi lābha-pūjā-khyāty-ādi-prayojanānapekṣatvāc ca bravīty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1445: kathaṃcit kāruṇya-mātreṇa bruvaṃs tu parameśvaravad atyanta-durlabha evety āha āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānya iti /

GE07bhg4c02u:1450: atrāpi karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ kartari cāścaryavad iti yojyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1451: tatra karmaṇaḥ kartuś ca prāg āścaryavattvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ kriyāyās tu vyākhyāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1454: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1455_0: kenāpi śabdenāvācyasya śuddhasyātmano viśiṣṭa-śaktena padena jahad-ajahat-svārtha-lakṣaṇāyā
GE07bhg4c02u:1455_1: kalpita-sambandhena lakṣyatāvacchedakam antareṇaiva pratipādanaṃ tad api nirvikalpa-sākṣātkāra-rūpam
GE07bhg4c02u:1456: athavā vinā śaktiṃ vinā lakṣaṇāṃ vinā sambandhāntaraṃ suṣuptotthāpaka-vākya-vat tattvam asyādi-vākyena yadātmatattva-pratipādanaṃ tad āścaryavat /

GE07bhg4c02u:1477_0: tad evaṃ vacana-viṣayasya vaktur vacana-kriyāyāś cātyāścarya-rūpatvād ātmano durvijñānatvam
GE07bhg4c02u:1477_1: uktvā śrotur durmilatvād api tad āha āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrtuvā 'py enaṃ vedeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1478_0: anyo draṣṭur vaktuśc a muktād vilakṣaṇo mumukṣur vaktāraṃ brahma-vidaṃ vidhivad upasṛtyainaṃ

GE07bhg4c02u:1509: yadi tu śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścid ity eva vyākhyāyeta tadā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ [KaṭhU 1.2.7] iti śrutyaika-vākyatā na syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1510: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ [Gītā 7.3] iti bhagavad-vacana-virodhaś ceti vidvadbhir avinayaḥ kṣantavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1511_0: athavā na caiva kaścid ity asya sarvatra sambandhaḥ kaścid enaṃ na paśyati na vadati
GE07bhg4c02u:1511_1: na śṛṇoti śrutvāpi na vedeti pañca prakārā uktāḥ kaścit paśyaty eva na vadati kaścit
GE07bhg4c02u:1511_2: paśyati na vadati ca kaścit tad-vacanaṃ śṛṇoti ca tad-arthaṃ jānāti ca kaścic chrutvāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:1511_3: na jānāti na kaścit tu sarva-bahirbhūta iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1512: avidvat-pakṣe tu asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanābhibhūtatvād āścarya-tulyatvaṃ darśana-vadana-śravaṇeṣv iti nigada-vyākhyātaḥ ślokaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1517: yad eva prabodhyamānasyāpy aviveko nāpayātīti tatra satyam evem eva ity āha āścaryavad iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1518: enam ātmānaṃ dehaṃ ca tad-ubhaya-rūpaṃ sarva-lokam //29//
GE07bhg4c02u:1519: baladevaḥ : nanu sarvajñena tvayā bahūpadiśyamāno 'py ahaṃ śoka-nivārakam ātma-yāthātmyaṃ na budhye kim etad iti cet tatrāha āścaryavad iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1520_2: aspṛṣṭam evam ādi bahu-viruddha-dharmatayāścaryavad adbhuta-sādṛśyena sthitam enaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1520_3: mad-upadiṣṭaṃ jīvaṃ kaścid eva svadharmānuṣṭhānena satya-tapo-japādinā ca vimṛṣṭa-hṛd-guru-prasāda-labdha-tādṛśa-jñānaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1521: āścaryavad iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇaṃ vā kartṛ-viśeṣaṇaṃ veti vyākhyātāraḥ kaścid enam yat paśyati tad āścaryavat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1522: yaḥ kaścit paśyati so 'py āścaryavad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1534: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata /
GE07bhg4c02u:1535: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1536: śrīdharaḥ : tad evam avadhyatvam ātmanaḥ saṅkṣepenopadiśan aśocyatvam upasaṃharati dehīty ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1540_0: sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya dehe vadhyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī liṅga-dehopādhir ātmā vadhyo
GE07bhg4c02u:1540_1: na bhavatīti nityaṃ niyataṃ yasmāt tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthūlāni sūkṣmāṇi ca bhīṣmādi-bhāvāpannāny
GE07bhg4c02u:1542: liṅga-dehasyāśocyatvam ātmavad evāvadhyatvād iti na sthūla-dehasya liṅga-dehasyātmano vā śocyatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1544: tarhi niścitya brūhi kim ahaṃ kuryāṃ kiṃ vā na kuryām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1545: tatra śokaṃ mā kuru yuddhaṃ tu kurv ity āha dehīti dvābhyām //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1546: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ duradhigamaṃ jīva-yāthātmyaṃ samāsenopadiśann aśocyatvam upasaṃharati dehīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1547: sarvasya jīva-gaṇasya dehe hanyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī jīvo nityam avadhyo yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhīṣmādi-bhāvāpannāni śocituṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1548: ātmanāṃ nityatvād aśocyatvaṃ tad-dehānāṃ tv avaśya-vināśatvāt tattvam ity arthaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1551: sva-dharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1552: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate //31//
GE07bhg4c02u:1553: śrīdharaḥ : yac coktam arjunena vepathuś ca śarīre me ity ādi tad apy ayuktam ity āha svadharmam apīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1554: ātmano nāśābhāvād eva etesāṃ hanane 'pi vikampituṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1555: kiṃ ca svadharmam apy avekṣya vikampitum nārhasi iti sambandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1556: yac coktaṃ - na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhava iti tatrāha dharmyād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1560_1: karuṇādi-doṣa-nibandhanam asādhāraṇaṃ bhramaṃ nirākartuṃ hiṃsādimattve 'pi yuddhasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1561_0: na kevalaṃ paramārtha-tattvam evāvekṣya kiṃ tu svadharmam api kṣatriya-dharmam api
GE07bhg4c02u:1561_1: yuddhāparāṅmukhatva-rūpam avekṣya śāstrataḥ paryālocya vikampituṃ vicalituṃ dharmād
GE07bhg4c02u:1562_0: tatraivaṃ sati yadyapy ete na paśyanti ity ādinā narake niyataṃ vāso bhavati ity
GE07bhg4c02u:1562_1: antena yuddhasya pāpa-hetutvaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:1562_2: ca guru-vadha-brahma-vadhādy-akaraṇaṃ yad abhihitaṃ tat sarvaṃ dharma-śāstra-paryālocanād evoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1563: kasmāt ? hi yasmād dharmyād aparāṅmukhatva-dharmād anapetād yuddhād anyat kṣatriyasya śreyaḥ śreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1564: yuddham eva hi pṛthivī-jaya-dvāreṇa prajā-rakṣaṇa-brāhmaṇa-śuśrūṣādi-kṣātra-dharma-nirvāhakam iti tad eva kṣatriyasya praśastataram ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1566: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan /
GE07bhg4c02u:1570: samottamādhamai rājā tv āhūtaḥ pālayan prajāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1571: na nivarteta saṃgrāmāt kṣātraṃ dharmam anusmaran //
GE07bhg4c02u:1573: śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājñāṃ śreyaskaraṃ param //
GE07bhg4c02u:1576: tena bhūmi-pālasyaivāyaṃ dharma iti na bhramitavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1577: udāhṛta-vacane 'pi kṣatriyo hīti kṣāttraṃ dharmam iti ca spaṣṭaṃ liṅgam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1578: tasmāt kṣatriyasya yuddhaṃ praśasto dharma iti sādhu bhagavato 'bhihitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1579: apaśavo 'nye go-aśvebhyaḥ paśavo go-aśvāḥ itivat praśaṃsā-lakṣaṇayā yuddhād anyac-chreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyata ity uktam iti na doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1580: etena yuddhāt praśastataraṃ kiṃcid anuṣṭhātuṃ tato nivṛttir uciteti nirastam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1581: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ity etad api //31//
GE07bhg4c02u:1583: ātmano nāśābhāvād eva vadhād vikampituṃ bhetuṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1584: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasīti sambandhaḥ //31//
GE07bhg4c02u:1585_0: baladevaḥ : evaṃ paramātma-jñānopayogitvād ādau jīvātma-jñānaṃ sarvān prati taulyenopadiśya
GE07bhg4c02u:1585_1: sa-niṣṭhān prati niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi hṛd-viśuddhi-sahakṛtām ātma-jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1585_2: niṣpādayantīti vadiṣyan tasyāṃ pratītim utpādayituṃ sakāmatayānuṣṭhitānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1586: yuddhaṃ khalu kṣatriyasya nityatam agnihotrādivad vihitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1587: tac ca śatru-prāṇa-vihaṃsana-rūpam agniṣṭomādi-paśu-hiṃsanavan na pratyavāya-nimittam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1589: hīnayor deha-lokayos tyāgena divyayos tayor lobhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1592: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ // [Manu 7.90]
GE07bhg4c02u:1593: yajñeṣu paśavo brahman hanyante satataṃ dvijaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1594: saṃskṛtāḥ kila mantraiś ca te 'pi svargam avāpnuvan // [?] ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1595: evaṃ nija-dharmam avekṣya vikampituṃ dharmāt pracalituṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1596: yuktaṃ na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmīty ādinā narake nityataṃ vāso bhavatīyt antyena yuddhasya pāpa-hetutvaṃ tvayoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1597: tac cājñānād evety āha dharmyād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1600: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan /
GE07bhg4c02u:1606: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam //32//
GE07bhg4c02u:1607: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca mahati śreyasi svayam evopāgate sati kuto vikampasa iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1609: yadṛcchayā aprārthitam eva upapannaṃ prāptam īdṛśaṃ yuddham labhante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1611: yad vā ya evaṃvidhaṃ yuddhaṃ labhante ta eva sukhina ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1612: etena svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava iti yad uktaṃ tan nirastaṃ bhavati //32//
GE07bhg4c02u:1614: nanu yuddhasya kartavyatve 'pi na bhīṣma-droṇādibhir gurubhiḥ saha tat kartum ucitam atigarhitatvād ity āśaṅkyāha yadṛcchayeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1617_1: yuddhaṃ ye kṣatriyāḥ pratiyogitvena labhante te sukhinaḥ sukha-bhāja eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1618: jaye satyenāyāsenaiva yaśaso rājyasya ca lābhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1619: parājaye cātiśīghram eva svargasya lābhād ity āha svarga-dvāram apāvṛtam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1620: apratibaddhaṃ svarga-sādhanaṃ yuddham avyavadhānenaiva svarga-janakaṃ jyotiṣṭhomādikaṃ tu ciratareṇa deha-pātasya pratibandhābhāvasya cāpekṣaṇād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1621: svarga-dvāram ity anena śyenādivat pratyavāya-śaṅkā parihṛtā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1623: duṣṭāḥ / tat-phalasya śatru-vadhasya na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni,
GE07bhg4c02u:1624: brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt ity ādi-śāstra-niṣiddhasya pratyavāya-janakatvāt phale vidhy-abhāvāc ca na vidhi-spṛṣṭe niṣedhānavakāśaḥ iti nyāyāvatāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1625: yuddhasya hi phalaṃ svargaḥ sa ca na niṣiddhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1628: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ // [Manu 7.90] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1629: yuddhaṃ tu agnīṣomīyādy-ālambha-vadha-vihitatvān na niṣedhena spraṣṭuṃ śakyate ṣoḍaśi-grahaṇādivat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1630: grahaṇāgrahayos tulya-balatayā vikalpavat sāmānya-śāstrasya viśeṣa-śāstreṇa saṅkoca-sambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1631: tathā ca vidhi-spṛṣṭe niṣedhānavakāśaḥ iti nyāyād yuddhaṃ na pratyavāya-janakaṃ nāpi bhīṣma-droṇādi-guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimitto doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1634: guruṃ vā bāla-vṛddhau vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā bahu-śrutam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1637: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet //
GE07bhg4c02u:1638: nātatāyi-vadho doṣo hantur bhavati kaścana // [Manu 8.350-351] ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1640: smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1641: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ //
GE07bhg4c02u:1644: brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt iti hi dṛṣṭa-prayojanānapekṣatvād dharma-śāstraṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1645: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet iti ca sva-jīvanārthatvād artha-śāstram /
GE07bhg4c02u:1646: atrocyate brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabheta itivad yuddha-vidhāyakam api dharma-śāstram eva sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra dṛṣṭa-prayojanānapekṣatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1648_1: vidhānān mitra-labdhyādy-artha-śāstrānusāreṇa catuṣpād vyavahāre śatror api jaye
GE07bhg4c02u:1648_2: dharma-śāstrātikramo na kartavya ity etat paraṃ vacanam etad ity āha /
GE07bhg4c02u:1650: tad evaṃ yuddha-karaṇe sukhokteḥ svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava ity arjunoktam apākṛtam //32//
GE07bhg4c02u:1652: jetṛbhyaḥ sakāśād api nyāya-yuddhe mṛtānām adhikaṃ sukham ato bhīṣmādīn hatvā tān pratyuta svato 'pi adhika-sukhinaḥ kuru ity āha yadṛcchayeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1655: baladevaḥ : kiṃ cāyatnād āgate 'smin mahati śreyasi na yuktas te kampa ity āha yadṛcchayeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1657: yatnaṃ vinaiva copapannam īdṛśaṃ bhīṣmādibhir mahā-vīraiḥ saha yuddhaṃ sukhinaḥ sabhāgyāḥ kṣatriyā labhante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1658: vijaye satya-śrameṇa kīrti-rājyayor mṛtyau sati śīghram eva svargasya ca prāpter ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1659: etad vyañjayan viśinaṣṭi - svarga-dvāram upāvṛtam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1664: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1665: tataḥ sva-dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi //33//
GE07bhg4c02u:1666: śrīdharaḥ : viparyaye doṣam āha atha ced iti //33//
GE07bhg4c02u:1670: api trailokya-rājyasya ity uktatvāt tat kathaṃ mayā kartavyam ity āśaṅkyākaraṇe doṣam āha atha ced iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1672: imaṃ bhīṣma-droṇādi-vīra-puruṣa-pratiyogikaṃ dharmyaṃ hiṃsādi-doṣaṇāduṣṭaṃ satāṃ dharmād anapetām iti vā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1674: na kūṭair āyudhair hanyād yudhyamāno raṇe ripūn /
GE07bhg4c02u:1676: na ca hanyāt sthalārūḍhaṃ na klībaṃ na kṛtāñjalim /
GE07bhg4c02u:1677: na mukta-keśaṃ nāsīnaṃ na tavāsmīti vādinam //
GE07bhg4c02u:1678: na suptaṃ na visaṃnāhaṃ na nagnaṃ na nirāyudham /
GE07bhg4c02u:1681: na bhītaṃ na parāvṛttaṃ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran // [Manu 7.91-94] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1682: satāṃ dharmam ullaṅghya yudhyamāno hi pāpīyān syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1683_0: tvaṃ tu parair āhūto 'pi sad-dharmopetam api saṅgrāmaṃ yuddhaṃ na kariṣyasi dharmato
GE07bhg4c02u:1683_1: lokato vā bhītaḥ parāvṛtto bhaviṣyasi cet tato nirjitya para-sainyāni kṣitiṃ dharmeṇa
GE07bhg4c02u:1683_3: hitvānanuṣṭhāya kīrtiṃ ca mahādevādi-samāgama-nimittāṃ hitvā na nivarteta saṅgrāmāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1683_4: ity ādi-śāstra-niṣiddha-saṅgrāma-nivṛttyā ca raṇa-janyaṃ pāpam eva kevalam avāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c02u:1683_5: na tu dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ cety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1684: athavā 'neka-janmārjitaṃ dharmaṃ tyaktvā rāja-kṛtaṃ pāpam evāvāpsyasīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1685: yasmāt tvāṃ parāvṛttam ete duṣṭā avaśyaṃ haniṣyanti ataḥ parāvṛtta-hataḥ saṃś ciropārjita-nija-sukṛta-parityāgena paropārjita-duṣkṛta-mātra-bhāṅ mā bhūr ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1687: yas tu bhītaḥ parāvṛttaḥ saṅgrāme hanyate paraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1688: bhartur yad duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ pratipadyate //
GE07bhg4c02u:1689: yac cāsya sukṛtaṃ kiṃcid amutrārtham upārjitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1690: bhartā tat sarvam ādatte parāvṛtta-hatasya tu // [Manu 7.95-96] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1691: yājñavalkyo 'pi rājā sukṛtam ādatte hatānāṃ vipalāyinām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1692: tena yad uktam - pāpam evāśrayed asmān hatvaitān ātatāyinaḥ [Gītā 1.36],
GE07bhg4c02u:1693: etān na hantum icchāmi ghanto 'pi madhusūdana [Gītā 1.35] iti tan nirākṛtaṃ bhavati //33//
GE07bhg4c02u:1696: baladevaḥ : vipakṣe doṣān darśayati athety ādibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1697_0: svasya tava dharmyaṃ yuddha-lakṣaṇaṃ kīrtiṃ ca rudra-santoṣaṇa-nivāta-kavacādi-vadha-labdhāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1697_1: hitvā pāpaṃ na nivarteta saṅgrāmād ity ādi smṛti-pratiṣiddhaṃ sva-dharma-tyāga-lakṣaṇaṃ prāpsyasi //33 //
GE07bhg4c02u:1702: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca akīrtim ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1707: evaṃ kīrti-dharmayor iṣṭayor aprāptir aniṣṭasya ca pāpasya prāptir yuddha-parityāge darśitā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1708: tatra pāpākhyam aniṣṭaṃ vyavadhānena duḥkha-phaladam āmutrikatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1709: śiṣṭa-garhā-lakṣaṇaṃ tv aniṣṭam āsanna-phaladam atyasahyam ity āha akīrtim iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1710: bhūtāni devarṣi-manuṣyādīni te tavāvyayāṃ dīrgha-kālam akīrtiṃ na dharmātmāyaṃ na śūro 'yam ity evaṃ-rūpāṃ kathayiṣyanty anyonyaṃ kathā-prasaṅge /
GE07bhg4c02u:1712: na kevalaṃ kīrti-dharmau hitvā pāpaṃ prāpsyasi api tu akīrtiṃ ca prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1713: na kevalaṃ tvam eva tāṃ prāpsyasi api tu bhūtāny api kathayiṣyantīti vā nipātayor arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1714: nanu yuddhe sva-maraṇa-sandehāt tat-parihārārtham akīrtir api soḍhavyā ātma-rakṣaṇasyātyantāpekṣitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1716: sāmnā dānena bhedena samastair atha vā pṛthak /
GE07bhg4c02u:1717: vijetuṃ prayatetārīn na yuddhena kadā cana //
GE07bhg4c02u:1719: parājayaś ca saṃgrāme tasmād yuddhaṃ vivarjayet //
GE07bhg4c02u:1721: tathā yudhyeta saṃpanno vijayeta ripūn yathā // [ManuS 7.198-200]
GE07bhg4c02u:1723_0: tathā ca maraṇa-bhītasya kim akīrti-duḥkham iti śaṅkām apanudati sambhāvitasya dharmātmā
GE07bhg4c02u:1723_1: śūra ity evam ādibhir ananya-labhyair guṇair bahumatasya janasyākīrtir maraṇād apy
GE07bhg4c02u:1725: evaṃ yasmād ato 'kīrter maraṇam eva varaṃ nyūnatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1728: udāhṛta-vacanaṃ tv artha-śāstratvāt na nivarteta saṅgrāmāt [Manu 7.88] ity ādi-dharma-śāstrād durbalam iti bhāvaḥ //34//
GE07bhg4c02u:1732: baladevaḥ : na kevalaṃ svadharmasya kīrteś ca kṣati-mātram /
GE07bhg4c02u:1733: yuddhe samārabdhe 'rjunaḥ palāyata ity avyayāṃ śāśvatīm akīrtiṃ ca tava bhūtāni sarve lokāḥ kathayiṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1734: nanu maraṇād bhītena mayā akīrtiḥ soḍhavyeti cet tatrāha sambhāvitasyātipratiṣṭhitasya /
GE07bhg4c02u:1736: tathā ca tādṛśākīṛter maraṇam eva varam iti //34//
GE07bhg4c02u:1737: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ /

GE07bhg4c02u:1740: yeṣāṃ bahu-guṇatvena tvaṃ pūrvaṃ sammato 'bhūs ta eva bhayāt saṃgrāmān nivṛttaṃ tvāṃ manyeran /
GE07bhg4c02u:1741: tataś ca pūrvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā lāghavam laghutāṃ yāsyasi //35//
GE07bhg4c02u:1744_0: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ bahu-mato 'smac-chatrur arjunas tu mahāśūra iti bahu-saṃmāna-viṣayo bhūtvā
GE07bhg4c02u:1744_1: samprati yuddhād uparame sati lāghavaṃ yāsyasi te duryodhanādayo mahārathās tvāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1744_2: bhayād eva raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyanta ity anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1745: kṣatriyāṇāṃ hi bhayaṃ vinā yuddhoparati-hetur bandhu-snehādiko nopapadyata iti matveti bhāvaḥ //35//
GE07bhg4c02u:1746: baladevaḥ : nanu kula-kṣaya-doṣāt kāruṇyāc ca vinivṛttasya mama katham akīrtiḥ syād iti cet tatrāha bhayād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1747: mahārathā duryodhanādayas tvāṃ karṇādi-bhayān na tu bandhu-kāruṇyād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1748: na hi śūrasya śatru-bhayaṃ vinā bandhu-snehena yuddhād uparatir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1749: itaḥ pūrvaṃ yeṣāṃ tvaṃ bahumataḥ śūro vairīti bahu-guṇavattayā saṃmato 'bhūr idānīṃ yuddhe samupasthite kātaro 'yaṃ vinivṛtta ity evaṃ tat-kṛtaṃ lāghavaṃ duḥsahaṃ yāsyasi //35//
GE07bhg4c02u:1753: nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim //36//
GE07bhg4c02u:1755: avācyān vādān vacanānarhān śabdān tava ahitāḥ tvac-chatravo vadiṣyanti //36//
GE07bhg4c02u:1757: nanu bhīṣmādayo mahārathā na bahu manyantāṃ duryodhanādayas tu śatravo bahu maṃsyante māṃ yuddha-nivṛttyā tad-upakāritvād ity ata āha avācyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1758_0: tavāsādhāraṇaṃ yat sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ tan nindantas tava śatravo duryodhanādayo
GE07bhg4c02u:1758_1: 'vācyān vādān vacanān arhān ṣaṇḍha-tilādi-rūpān eva śabdān bahūn aneka-prakārān vadiṣyanti
GE07bhg4c02u:1758_2: na tu bahu maṃsyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1759: athavā tava sāmarthyaṃ stuti-yogyatvaṃ tava nindanto 'hitā avācya-vādān vadiṣyantīty anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1760_0: nanu bhīṣma-droṇādi-vadha-prayuktaṃ kaṣṭataraṃ duḥkham asahamāno yuddhān nivṛttaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1760_1: śatru-kṛta-sāmarthya-nindanādi-duḥkhaṃ soḍhuṃ śakṣyāmīty ata āha tatas tasmān nindā-prāpti-duḥkhāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1760_2: kiṃ tu duḥkhataraṃ tato 'dhikaṃ kim api duḥkhaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ //36 //
GE07bhg4c02u:1765: ahitāḥ śatravo dhārtarāṣṭrās tava sāmarthyaṃ pūrva-siddhaṃ parākramaṃ nindantaḥ bahūn avācya-vādān śaṇḍhatilādi-śabdān vadiṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1766: tata evaṃvidhāvācya-vāda-śravaṇād atiśāyitaṃ kiṃ duḥkham asti /

GE07bhg4c02u:1770: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm /
GE07bhg4c02u:1772: śrīdharaḥ : yad uktaṃ na caitad vidmaḥ [Gītā 2.6] iti tatrāha hato vety ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1775_0: nanu tarhi yuddhe gurv-ādi-vadha-vaśān madhyastha-kṛtā nindā tato nivṛttau tu śatru-kṛtā
GE07bhg4c02u:1775_1: nindety ubhayataḥ pāśā rajjur ity āśaṅkya jaye parājaye ca lābha-dhrauvyād yuddhārtham
GE07bhg4c02u:1775_2: evotthānam āvaśyakam ity āha hato veti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1777: yasmād ubhayathāpi te lābhas tasmāj jeṣyāmi śatrūn mariṣyāmi veti kṛta-niścayaḥ san yuddhāyottiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c02u:1779: etena na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyaḥ [Gītā 2.6] ity ādi parihṛtam //37//

GE07bhg4c02u:1783: baladevaḥ : nanu yuddhe vijaya eva me syād iti niścayābhāvāt tato 'haṃ nivṛtto 'smīti cet tatrāha hato veti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1788: tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1789: śrīdharaḥ : yad apy uktaṃ pāpam evāśrayed asmān [Gītā 1.36] iti tatrāha sukha-duḥkhe ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1792: tayor api kāraṇa-bhūtāu jayājayāv api samau kṛtvā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1795: sukhādy-abhilāsaṃ hitvā svadharma-buddhyā yudhyamānaḥ pāpaṃ na prāpsyasīty arthaḥ //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1797: nanv evaṃ svargam uddiśya yuddha-karaṇe tasya nityatva-vyāghātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1798: rājyam uddiśya yuddha-karaṇe tv artha-śāstratvād dharma-śāstrāpekṣayā daurbalyaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1799: tataś ca kāmyasyākaraṇe kutaḥ pāpaṃ dṛṣṭārthasya guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadhasya kuto dharmatvaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1800: tathā cātha ced iti ślokārtho vyāhata iti cet tatrāha sukha-duḥkhe iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1802: sukhe tat-kāraṇe lābhe tat-kāraṇe lābhe tat-kāraṇe jaye ca rāgam akṛtvā,
GE07bhg4c02u:1803: evaṃ duḥkhe tad-dhetāv alābhe tad-dhetāv ajaye ca dveṣam akṛtvā tato yuddhāya yujyasva sannadhau bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:1804: evaṃ sukha-kāmanāṃ duḥkha-nivṛtti-kāmanāṃ vā vihāya svadharma-buddhyā yudhyamāno guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimittaṃ nitya-karmākaraṇa-nimittaṃ ca pāpaṃ na prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1805: yas tu phala-kāmanayā karoti sa guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimittaṃ pāpaṃ prāpnoti yo vā na karoti sa nitya-karmākaraṇa-nimittam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1806: ataḥ phala-kāmanām antareṇa kurvann ubhaya-vidham api pāpaṃ na prāpnotīti prāg eva vyākhyāto 'bhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1807: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm [Gītā 2.37] iti svānuṣaṅgika-phala-kathanam iti na doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1808: tathā ca āpastambaḥ smarati - tad yathāmre
GE07bhg4c02u:1809: phalārthe nimitte chāyā-gandhāvanūtpadyete evaṃ dharmaṃ caryamāṇam arthā anūtpadyante no ced anūtpadyante na dharma-hānir bhavati iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1810: ato yuddha-śāstrasyārtha-śāstratvābhāvāt pāpam evāśrayed asmān [Gītā 1.36] ity ādi nirākṛtaṃ bhavati //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1812: tasmāt tava sarvathā yuddham eva dharmas tad api yad imaṃ pāpa-kāraṇam āśaṅkase,
GE07bhg4c02u:1813: tarhi mattaḥ pāpānutpatti-prakāraṃ śikṣitvā yudhyasvety āha sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1815: tad-dhetur jayājayāv api samau kṛtvā vivekena tulyau vibhāvety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1816: tataś caivaṃ-bhūta-sāmya-lakṣaṇe jñānavatas tava pāpaṃ naiva bhavet /
GE07bhg4c02u:1817: yad vakṣyate lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā [Gītā 5.10] iti //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1818: baladevaḥ : nanu atha cet tvam ity ādi-padyārtho vyāhṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1819: rājyādy-uddeśena kṛtasya yuddhasya guru-viprādi-vināśa-hetutvena pāpotpādakatvād iti cen mumukṣu-vartmanā yuddhamānasya tava tad-vināśa-hetukaṃ pāpaṃ na syād ity āha sukheti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1820: sāmya-karaṇam iha tatra tatra nirvikāratvaṃ bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1821: sukhe tad-dhetau jaye ca rāgam akṛtvā duḥkhe tad-dhetāv alābhe tad-dhetau parājaye ca dveṣam akṛtvā tatra tatra nirvikāra-cittaḥ san tato yuddhāya yujyasva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1823: evaṃ mumukṣu-rītyā yoddhā tvaṃ pāpaṃ tad-vināśa-hetukaṃ nāvāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1824: phalecchuḥ san yo yudhyate sa tat-pāpaṃ vindati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1825: vijñānārthī tu purātanam ananta-pāpam apanudatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1826: nanu phala-rāgaṃ vinā duṣkare yuddha-dānādau kathaṃ pravṛttir iti ced anantātmānanda-rāgaṃ tatra pravartakaṃ gṛhāṇa rājyādy-anurāgam iva bhṛgu-pāte //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1829: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c02u:1830: buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi //39//
GE07bhg4c02u:1831: śrīdharaḥ : upadiṣṭaṃ jñāna-yogam upasaṃharaṃs tat-sādhanaṃ karma-yogaṃ prastauti eṣety ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1832: samyak khyāyate prakāśyate vastu-tattvam anayeti saṅkhyā samyak jñānam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1835: evam abhihitāyām api tava ced ātma-tattvam aparokṣaṃ na bhavati tarhy antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvārā ātma-tattvāparokṣārthaṃ karma-yoga tv imāṃ buddhiṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c02u:1836: yayā buddhyā yuktaḥ parameśvarārpita-karma-yogena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ san tat-prasāda-labdhāparokṣa-jñānena karmātmakaṃ bandhaṃ prakarṣeṇa hāsyasi tyakṣyasi //39//
GE07bhg4c02u:1839: tathāpi na māṃ prati yuddha-kartavyatopadeśas tavocitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1840: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ [Gītā 2.19] ity ādinā kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam [Gītā 2.21] ity antena viduṣaḥ sarva-karma-pratikṣepāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1841: na hy akartr-bhoktṛ-śuddha-svarūpo 'ham asmi yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tat-phalaṃ bhokṣya iti ca jñānaṃ sambhavati virodhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1843: ayaṃ cārjunābhiprāyo jyāyasī ced ity atra vyakto bhaviṣyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1844: tasmād ekam eva māṃ prati jñānasya karmaṇaś copadeśo nopapadyata iti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c02u:1845: vidvad-avidvad-avasthā-bhedena jñāna-karmopadeśopapatter ity āha bhagavān eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1846_0: eṣā na tv evāham ity ādy-eka-viṃśati-ślokais te tubhyam abhihitā sāṅkhye samyak khyāyate
GE07bhg4c02u:1846_1: sarvopādhi-śūnyatayā pratipādyate paramātma-tattvam anayeti saṅkhyopaniṣat tayaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:1846_2: tāparya-parisamāptyā pratipādyate yaḥ sa sāṅkhya aupaniṣadaḥ puruṣa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1847: tasmin buddhis tan-mātra-viṣayaṃ jñānaṃ sarvānartha-nivṛtti-kāraṇaṃ tvāṃ prati mayoktaṃ naitādṛśa-jñānavataḥ kvacid api karmocyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1848: tasya kāryaṃ na vidyata iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1849: yadi punar evaṃ mayokte 'pi tavaiṣā buddhir nodeti citta-doṣāt,
GE07bhg4c02u:1851: tasmin yoge karma-yoge tu karaṇīyām imāṃ sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atroktāṃ phalābhisandhi-tyāga-lakṣaṇāṃ buddhiṃ vistareṇa mayā vakṣyamāṇāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c02u:1853: tathā ca śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ prati jñānopadeśo 'śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ prati karmopadeśa iti kutaḥ samuccaya-śaṅkayā virodhāvakāśa ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1854_0: yoga-viṣayāṃ buddhiṃ phala-kathanena stauti - yathā vyavasāyātmikayā buddhyā karmasu
GE07bhg4c02u:1854_1: yuktas tvaṃ karma-nimittaṃ bandha-nāśāyāśuddhi-lakṣaṇaṃ jñāna-pratibandhaṃ prakarṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c02u:1855: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - karma-nimitto jñāna-pratibandhaḥ karmaṇaiva dharmākhyenāpanetuṃ śakyate dharmeṇa pāpam apanudati [Mahānā 13.6] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1856: śravaṇādi-lakṣaṇo vicāras tu karmātmaka-pratibandha-rahitasyāsambhāvanādi-pratibandhaṃ dṛṣṭa-dvāreṇāpanayatīti na karma-bandha-nirākaraṇāyopadeṣṭuṃ śakyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1860: tathā ca vakṣyati - karmaṇy evādhikāras te [Gītā 2.47] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1862: antaraṅga-sādhanaṃ śravaṇādi vihāya bahiraṅga-sādhanaṃ karmaiva bhagavatā kim ity arjunāyopadiśyata iti nirastam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1863: karma-bandhaṃ saṃsāram īśvara-prasāda-nimitta-jñāna-prāptyā prahāsyasīti prācāṃ vyākhyāne tv adhyāhāra-doṣaḥ karma-pada-vaiyarthyaṃ ca parihartavyam //39//
GE07bhg4c02u:1866: samyak khyāyate prakāśyate vastu-tattvam aneneti sāṅkhyaṃ samyak jñānam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1868: adhunā yoge bhakti-yoge imāṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ buddhiṃ karaṇīyāṃ śṛṇu,
GE07bhg4c02u:1871: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ jñāna-yogam upasaṃharan tad-upāyaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogaṃ vaktum ārabhate eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1872: saṅkhyopaniṣat samyak khyāyate nirūpyate tattvam anayā iti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1875: ne tv evāhaṃ ity ādinā tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni ity antena /
GE07bhg4c02u:1876_0: sā cet tava citta-tad-doṣān nābhyudeti tarhi yoge tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā
GE07bhg4c02u:1876_1: vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasā nāśakena ity ādi śruty-uktāntargata-jñāne niṣkāma-karma-yoge
GE07bhg4c02u:1878: karmāṇi kurvāṇas tvaṃ bhagavad-ājñayā mahā-prayāsāni karmāṇi kurvaṃs tat-tad-uddeśa-mahimnā tvad-antar-abhyuditayātma-jñāna-niṣṭhayā saṃsāraṃ tariṣyasīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1880: karma sa-kāmaṃ jñāna-phalakaṃ tu tan-niṣkāmam iti śāstre 'smin paribhāṣyate //39//
GE07bhg4c02u:1884: svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt //40//
GE07bhg4c02u:1885: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kṛṣyādivat karmaṇāṃ kadācid vighna-bāhulyena phale vyabhicārāt mantrādy-aṅga-vaiguṇyena ca pratyavāya-sambhavaāt kutaḥ karma-yogena karma-bandha-prahāṇam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1887: iha niṣkāma-karma-yoge abhikramasya prārambhasya nāśo niṣphalatvaṃ nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1890: kiṃ cāsya dharmasya īśvarārādhanārtha-karma-yogasya svalpam apy upakrama-mātram api kṛtaṃ mahato bhayāt saṃsāra-lakṣaṇāt trāyate rakṣati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1891: na tu kāmya-karmavat kiñcid aṅga-vaikguṇyādinā naiṣphalyam asyety arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c02u:1893_0: nanu tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena [BAU
GE07bhg4c02u:1893_1: 4.4.22] iti śrutyā vividiṣāṃ jñānaṃ coddiśya saṃyoga-pṛthaktva-nyāyena sarva-karmaṇāṃ

GE07bhg4c02u:2098: akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsya-yājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati ity ādayo 'rthavādās teṣv eva ratāḥ vedasya satya-bhāṣitvād evam evaitad iti pratītimantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2099: ataeva nānyad iti karma-phalāt svargād anyat jīvāṃśi-paramārtha-jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2101: tat-pratipādikānāṃ vedānta-vācāṃ karmāṅga-kartṛ-devatād ekatayā tac-cheṣatvād iti vadana-śīlā ity arthaḥ //42//
GE07bhg4c02u:2103: evaṃ cet tādṛśaṃ mokṣaṃ kuto necchanti tatrāha svargeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2104: svarga eva sudhā devāṅganādy-upetatvena paraḥ śreṣṭho yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c02u:2105: tādṛg-vāsanā-grastatvāt teṣāṃ nānyad bhāṣata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2109: tāni prakarṣeṇāvicchedena dadāti tāṃ bhogaiśvaryayor gatiṃ prāptiṃ prati ye kriyā-viśeṣā jyotiṣṭpmādayas te bahulāḥ pracurā yatra tāṃ vācaṃ vadantīti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2111: aiśvaryaṃ ca devādi-svāmitvaṃ tayor gatim ity arthaḥ //43//
GE07bhg4c02u:2112_0: baladevaḥ : bhogeti teṣāṃ pūrvoktayor bhogaiśvaryayoḥ prasaktānāṃ kṣayitva-doṣāsphūrtyā
GE07bhg4c02u:2112_1: tayor abhiniviṣṭānāṃ tayā puṣpitayā vācāpahṛtam viluptaṃ ceto viveka-jñānaṃ yeṣām
GE07bhg4c02u:2113: samyag ādhīyate 'sminn ātma-tattva-yāthātmyam iti nirukteḥ samādhir manas tasminn ity arthaḥ //44//
GE07bhg4c02u:2118: śrīdharaḥ : nanu svargādikaṃ paramaṃ phalaṃ yadi na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2119: tarhi kim iti vedas tat-sādhanatayā karmāṇi vidhīyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:2121: triguṇātmakāḥ sakāmā ye 'dhikāriṇas tad-viṣayās teṣāṃ karma-phala-sambandha-pratipādakā vedāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2135: nahi dvandvākulasya yoga-kṣema-vyāpṛtasya ca pramādinas traiguṇyātikramaḥ sambhavatīti //45//
GE07bhg4c02u:2137: nanu sakāmānāṃ mā bhūd āśaya-doṣād vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2138: niṣkāmānāṃ tu vyavasāyātmaka-buddhyā karma kurvatāṃ karma-svābhāvyāt svargādi-phala-prāptau jñāna-pratibandhaḥ samāna ity āśaṅkyāha traiguṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2139: trayāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ karma traiguṇyaṃ kāma-mūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2140: sa eva prakāśatvena viṣayo yeṣāṃ tādṛśā vedāḥ karma-kāṇḍātmakā yo yat-phala-kāmas tasyaiva tat-phalaṃ bodhayantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2141: na hi saarvebhyaḥ kāmebhyo darśa-pūrṇamāsāv iti viniyoge 'pi sakṛd-anuṣṭhānāt sarva-phala-prāptir bhavati tat-tat-kāmanāvirahāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2142: yat-phala-kāmanayānutiṣṭhati tad eva phalaṃ tasmin prayoga iti sthitaṃ yogasiddhy-adhikaraṇe /
GE07bhg4c02u:2143: yasmād evaṃ kāmā-virahe phala-virahas tasmāt tvaṃ nistraiguṇyo niṣkāmo bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2147: nanu śītoṣṇādi-dvandva-pratīkārāya vastrādy-apekṣaṇāt kuto niṣkāmatvam ata āha nirdvandvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2149: mātrā-sparśās tv ity ukta-nyāyena śītoṣṇādi-dvandva-sahiṣṇur bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2151: rajas-tamobhyām abhibhūta-sattvo hi śītoṣṇādi-pīḍayā mariṣyāmīti manvāno dharmād vimukho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2152: tvaṃ tu rajas tamasī abhibhūya sattva-mātrālambano bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2153_0: nanu śītoṣṇādi-sahane 'pi kṣut-pipāsādi-pratīkārārthaṃ kiṃcid anupāttam upādeyam
GE07bhg4c02u:2153_1: upāttaṃ ca rakṣaṇīyam iti tad-arthaṃ yatne kriyamāṇe kutaḥ sattva-sthatvam ity ata
GE07bhg4c02u:2158: na caivaṃ cintā kartavyā katham evaṃ sati jīviṣyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2159: yataḥ sarvāntaryāmī parameśvara eva tava yoga-kṣemādi nirvāhayiṣyatīty āha ātmavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:2160: ātmā paramātmā dhyeyatvena yoga-kṣemādi-nirvāhakatvena ca vartate yasya sa ātmavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:2161: sarva-kāmanā-parityāgena parameśvaram ārādhayato mama sa eva deha-yātrā-mātram apekṣitaṃ sampādayiṣyatīti niścitya niścinto bhavety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2164: tvaṃ tu catur-varga-sādhanebhyo virajya kevalaṃ bhakti-yogam evāśrayasvety āha traiguṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2165: traiguṇyās triguṇātmikāḥ karma-jñānādyāḥ prakāśyatvena viṣayā yeṣāṃ te traiguṇya-viṣayā vedāḥ svārthe ṣyañ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2166: etac ca bhūmnā vyapadeśā bhavanti iti nyāyenoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2168: yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau ity ādi śrutayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2169: pañcarātrādi-smṛtayaś ca gītopaniṣad-gopāla-tāpanyādy-upaniṣadaś ca nirguṇāṃ bhaktim api viṣayīkurvanty eva vedoktatvābhāve bhakter aprāmāṇyam eva syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2170: tataś ca vedoktā ye triguṇamayā jñāna-karma-vidhayas tebhya eva nirgato bhava tān na kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2171: ye tu vedoktā bhakti-vidhayas tāṃs tu sarvathaivānutiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c02u:2179: nirguṇayā mad-bhaktyaiva triguṇātmakebhyas tebhyo niṣkrānto bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2181: ataeva nityaiḥ sattvaiḥ prāṇibhir mad-bhaktair eva saha tiṣṭhatīti tathā saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2182: nityaṃ sattva-guṇastho bhaveti vyākhyāyāṃ nistraiguṇyo bhaeti vyākhyāyāṃ virodhaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2186: yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy aham it bhakta-vatsalena mayaiva tad-bhāra-vahanāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2190: mad-arpaṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ vā sāttvikaṃ nija-karma yat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2192: niṣphalaṃ veti naimittikaṃ nija-karma-phalākāṅkṣyā-rahitam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2193: kaivalyaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ rajo vaikalpikaṃ tu yat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2194: prākṛtaṃ tāmasaṃ jñānaṃ man-niṣṭhaṃ nirguṇaṃ smṛtam //
GE07bhg4c02u:2195: vanaṃ tu sāttviko vāso grāmo rājasa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2200: tāmasy adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyāṃ tu nirguṇā //
GE07bhg4c02u:2201: pathyaṃ pūtam anāyastam āhāryaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2203: sāttvikaṃ sukham ātmotthaṃ viṣayotthaṃ tu rājasam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2205: ity antena granthena traiguṇya-vastūny api bhaktyā svasmin kathañcit sthitasya traiguṇyasya nirjayo 'py uktas tad-anantaram eva / yathā -
GE07bhg4c02u:2206: dravyaṃ deśas tathā kālo jñānaṃ karma ca kārakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2207: śraddhāvasthā-kṛtir niṣṭhā traiguṇyaḥ sarva eva hi //
GE07bhg4c02u:2209: dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam anudhyātaṃ buddhyā vā puruṣarṣabha //
GE07bhg4c02u:2214: atrāpy agre kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate iti praśne vakṣyate --
GE07bhg4c02u:2218: mām eva parameśvaram avyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate ity eṣā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2219: nistraiguṇyo bhavārjuna nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān //45//
GE07bhg4c02u:2220: baladevaḥ : nanu phalanairapekṣyeṇa karmāṇi kurvāṇān api tāni sva-phalair yojayeyus tat svābhāvyāt tataḥ kathaṃ tad-buddheḥ sambhava iti cet tatrāha traiguṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2222: guṇa-vacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca iti sūtrāt [Pāṇ 5.1.124] ṣyañ-sakāmatvam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2223: tad-viṣayā vedāḥ karma-kāṇḍāni tvaṃ tu tac-chiro-bhūta-vedānta-niṣṭho nistraiguṇyo niṣkāmo bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2224_0: ayam arthaḥ - pitṛ-koṭi-vatsalo hi vedo 'nādi-bhagavad-vimukhān māyā-guṇair nibaddhāṃs
GE07bhg4c02u:2224_1: tad-guṇa-sṛṣṭa-sāttvikādi-sukha-saktān prati tat-kāmān anurudhya phalāni prakāśayan
GE07bhg4c02u:2225: tad-viśrambheṇa tat-pariśīlinas te tan-mūrdha-bhūtopanisat-pratīta-yāthātmya-niścayena tāṃ buddhiṃ yāntīti na cākāmitāny api tāny āpateyuḥ kāmitānām eva teṣāṃ phalatva-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2226: na ca sarveṣāṃ vedānāṃ traiguṇya-viṣayatvaṃ nistraiguṇyatāyā aprāmāṇikatvāpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2227: nanu śītoṣṇādi-nivāraṇāya mātrāsparśās tu kaunteyety ādi vimarśena dvandva-saho bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2229: nityaṃ yat sattvam apariṇāmitvaṃ jīva-niṣṭhaṃ tat-sthas tad-vibhāvyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2231: alabdha-lābho yogaḥ labdhasya parirakṣaṇaṃ kṣemaṃ tad-rahito bhavety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2232: nanu kṣut-pipāse tathāpi vādhike iti cet tatrāha ātmavān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2233: ātmā viśvambharaḥ paramātmā sa yasya dhyeyatayāsti tādṛśo bhavety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2234: sa te deha-yātrāṃ sampādayed ity arthaḥ //45//
GE07bhg4c02u:2239: śrīdharaḥ : nanu vedokta-nānā-phala-tyāgena niṣāmatayeśvarārādhana-viṣayā vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ kubuddhir evety āśaḍkyāha yāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2240: udakaṃ pīyate yasmiṃs tad udapānaṃ vāpī-kūpa-taḍāg-ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2241_0: tasmin svalpodaka ekatra kṛtsnārthasyāsambhavāt tatra tatra paribhramaṇena vibhāgaśo
GE07bhg4c02u:2241_1: yāvān snāna-pānādir arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavati tāvān sarvo 'py arthaḥ sarvataḥ saṃplutodake
GE07bhg4c02u:2242: evaṃ yāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu tat-tat-karma-phala-rūpo 'rthas tāvān sarvo 'pi vijānato vyavasāyātmikā-buddhi-yuktasya brāhmaṇasya brahma-niṣṭhasya bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2244: etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrām upajīvanti iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2245: tasmād iyam eva subuddhir ity arthaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2247: na caivaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ sarva-kāmanā-parityāgena karma kurvann ahaṃ tais taiḥ karma-janitair ānandair vañcitaḥ syām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2251: yāvān artho yāvat-snāna-pānādi-prayojanaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ saṃplutodake mahati jalāśaye tāvān artho bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2252_0: yathā hi parvata-nirjharāḥ sarvataḥ sravantaḥ kvacid upatyakāyām ekatra milanti tatra
GE07bhg4c02u:2252_1: pratyekaṃ jāyamānam udaka-prayojanaṃ samudite sutarāṃ bhavati sarveṣāṃ nirjharāṇām
GE07bhg4c02u:2253: evaṃ sarveṣu vedeṣu vedokteṣu kāmya-karmasu yāvān artho hairaṇyagarbhānanda-paryantas tāvān vijānato brahma-tattvaṃ sākṣāt-kṛtavato brāhmaṇasya brahma-bubhūṣor bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2255: etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrām upajīvanti iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2257: tathā ca niṣkāma-karmabhiḥ śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya tavātma-jñānodaye para-brahmānanda-prāptiḥ syāt tathaiva ca sarvānanda-prāptau na kṣudrānanda-prāpti-nibandhana-vaiyagryāvakāśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2258: ataḥ paramānanda-prāpakāya tattva-jñānāya niṣkāma-karmāṇi kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2259: atra yathā tathā bhavatīti-pada-trayādhyāhāro yāvāṃs tāvān iti pada-dvayānuṣaṅgaś ca dārṣṭāntike draṣṭavyaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2261: hanta kiṃ vaktavyaṃ niṣkāmasya nirguṇasya bhaktiyogasya māhātmyaṃ yasyaivārambhaṇa-mātre 'pi nāśa-pratyavāyau na staḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2270: yāvān artha iti kaścit kūpaḥ śauca-karmārthakaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2275: kaścit pānārthaka ity evaṃ sarvataḥ sarveṣudapāneṣu yāvān artho yāvanti prayojanānīty arthaḥ tasmin ekasminn eva śaucādi-karma-siddheḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2276: kiṃ ca, tat-tat-kūpeṣu pṛthak pṛthak paribhramaṇa-śrameṇa,
GE07bhg4c02u:2278: tathā kūpeṣu virasa-jalena sarovare tu surama-jalenaivety api viśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2279: evaṃ sarveṣu vedeṣu tat-tad-devatārādhanena yāvanto 'rthās tāvanta ekasya bhagavad-ārādhanena vijānato vijñasya brāhmaṇasyeti brahma vedaṃ bettīti
GE07bhg4c02u:2280: brahmaṇas tasya vijānato vedajñatve 'pi veda-tātparyaṃ bhaktiṃ viśeṣato jānataḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2284: daivīṃ māyāṃ tu śrī-kāmaḥ ity ādy-uktyā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2287: iti meghādy-amiśrasya saura-kiraṇasya tīvratvam iva bhaktiyogasya jñāna-karmādy-amiśratvaṃ tīvratvaṃ jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2288: atra bahubhyo bahu-kāma-siddhir iti sarvathā bahu-buddhitvam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2289: ekasmād bhagavata eva sarva-kāma-siddhir ity aṃśenaika-buddhitvād eka-buddhitvam eva viṣaya-sādguṇyāj jñeyam //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2290: baladevaḥ : mami sarvān vedān adhīyānasya bahu-kāla-vyayād bahu-vikṣepa-sambhavāc ca kathaṃ tad-buddher abhudayas tatrāha yāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2292: vistīrṇe udapāne jalāśaye snānādy-arthino yāvān snāna-pānādir arthaḥ prayojanaṃ tāvān eva sa tena tasmāt sampadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2293_0: evaṃ sarveṣu sopaniṣatsu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vedādhyāyino vijānata ātma-yāthātmya-jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2293_1: labdhu-kāmasya yāvān taj-jñāna-siddhi-lakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ syāt tāvān eva tena tebhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2294: tathā ca sva-śākhayaiva sopaniṣadācireṇaiva tat siddhau tad buddhir abhudiyād eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2295: iha dārṣṭāntike 'pi yāvāṃs tāvān iti pada-dvayam anuṣañjanīyam //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2298: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana /
GE07bhg4c02u:2299: mā karma-phala-hetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2300: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi sarvāṇi karma-phalāni parameśvarārādhanād eva bhaviṣyantīty abhisandhāya pravarteta /
GE07bhg4c02u:2301: kiṃ karmaṇā ity āśaṅkya tad vārayann āha karmaṇy eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2304: nanu karmaṇi kṛti tat-phalaṃ syād eva bhojane kṛte tṛptivat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2307: karma-phalaṃ pravṛtti-hetur yasya sa tathābhūto mā bhūḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2308: kāmyamānasyaiva svargāder niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena phalatvād akāmitaṃ phalaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2309: ataeva phalaṃ bandhakaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe 'pi tava saṅgo niṣṭhā māstu //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2311_0: nanu niṣkāma-karmabhir ātma-jñānaṃ sampādya parānanda-prāptiḥ kriyate ced ātma-jñānam
GE07bhg4c02u:2311_1: eva tarhi sampādyaṃ kiṃ bahvāyāsaiḥ karmabhir bahiraṅga-sādhana-bhūtair ity āśaṅkyāha karmaṇy eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2312: te tavāśuddhāntaḥkaraṇasya tāttvika-jñānotpatty-ayogyasya karmaṇy evāntaḥkaraṇa-śodhake 'dhikāro mayedaṃ kartavyam iti bodho 'stu na jñāna-niṣṭhā-rūpaṃ vedānta-vākya-vicārādau /
GE07bhg4c02u:2313: karma ca kurvatas tava tat-phaleṣu svargādiṣu kadācana kasyāṃcid apy avasthāyāṃ karmānuṣṭhānāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ tat-kāle vādhikāro mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti bodho māstu /
GE07bhg4c02u:2314: nanu mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti buddhy-abhāve 'pi karma sva-sāmārthyād eva phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti cen nety āha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2315: phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya heteur utpādako bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2316: tvaṃ tu niṣkāmaḥ san karma-phala-hetur mā bhūḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2317: na hi niṣkāmena bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kṛtaṃ karma phalāya kalpata ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2318: phalābhāve kiṃ karmaṇety ata āha - mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2319: yadi phalaṃ neṣyate kiṃ karmaṇā duḥkha-rūpeṇety akaraṇe tava prītir mā bhūt //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2321_0: evam ekam evārjunaṃ sva-priya-sakhaṃ lakṣīkṛtya jñāna-bhakti-karma-yogān ācikhyāsur
GE07bhg4c02u:2321_1: bhagavān jñāna-bhakti-yogau procya tayor arjunasyānadhikāraḥ vimṛśya niṣkāma-karma-yogam āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2322: mā phaleṣv iti - phalākāṅkṣiṇo 'py atyanta-śuddha-cittā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2323: tvaṃ tu prāyaḥ śuddha-citta iti mayā jñātvaivocyasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2324: nanu karmaṇi kṛte phalam avaśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2325: tatrāha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya hetur utpādako bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2326: tvaṃ tu tādṛśo mā bhūr ity āśīr mayā dīyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2327: akarmaṇi sva-dharmākaraṇe vikarmaṇi pāpe vā saṅgas tava māstu,
GE07bhg4c02u:2328: kintu dveṣa evāstv iti punar apy āśīr dīyata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2329: atrāgrimādhyāye vyāmiśreṇaiva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me ity arjunokti-darśanād atrādhyāye pūrvottara-vākyānām avatārikābhir nātīva saṅgatir vidhitsiteti jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2331: tathā tvam api mad-ājñāyāṃ tiṣṭheti kṛṣṇārjunayor mano 'nulāpo 'yam atra draṣṭavyaḥ //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2332: baladevaḥ : nanu karmabhir jñāna-siddhir iṣyate cet tarhi tasya śamādīny evāntaraṅgatvād anuṣṭheyāni santu kiṃ bahu prayāsais tair iti cet tatrāha - karmaṇy eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2334_0: te tava sva-dharme 'pi yuddhe 'dharma-buddher aśuddha-cittasya tāvat karmasv eva
GE07bhg4c02u:2334_1: yuddhādiṣv adhikāro 'stu mayaitāni bhoktavyānīti tat phaleṣu bandhakeṣu tavādhikāro
GE07bhg4c02u:2335: nanu phalecchā-virahe 'pi tāni sva-phaair yojayeyur iti cet tatrāha mā karmeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2336: karma-phalānāṃ hetur utpādakas tvaṃ mābhūḥ kāmanayā kṛtāni tāni sva-phalair yojayanti kāmitānām eva phalānāṃ niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena phalatvāmnātāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2337: ataeva bandhakāni phalāni āpatiṣyantīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe tava saṅgaḥ prītir māstu kintu vidveṣa evāstv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2338: niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi yaṣṭidhānyavad antar eva jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ niṣpādayiṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2339: śamādīni tu tat-pṛṣṭha-lagnāny eva syur iti bhāvaḥ //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2342: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya /
GE07bhg4c02u:2343: siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate //48//
GE07bhg4c02u:2348: tathā saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2349: tat-phalasya jñānasyāpi siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2350: yata evaṃbhūtaṃ samatvam eva yoga ucyate sadbhiḥ citta-samādhāna-rūpatvāt //48//
GE07bhg4c02u:2353: he dhanañjaya tvaṃ yogasthaḥ san saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā karmāṇi kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2354: atra bahu-vacanāt karmaṇy evādhikāras ta ity atra jātāv eka-vacanam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2355: saṅga-tyāgopāyam āha siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā phala-siddhau harṣaṃ phalāsiddhau ca viṣādaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhana-buddhyā karmāṇi kurv iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2357: atra tu yoga-sthaḥ karmāṇi kurv ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2358: ataḥ katham etad boddhyṃ śakyam ity ata āha samatvaṃ yoga ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2359: yad etat siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatvam idam eva yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenocyate na tu karmeti na ko 'pi virodha ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2360: atra pūrvārdhasyottarārdhena vyākhyānaṃ kriyata ity apaunaruktyam iti bhāṣyakārīyaḥ panthāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2361: sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra jayājaya-sāmyena yuddha-mātra-kartavyatā prakṛtatvād uktā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2365: tena jayājayayos tulya-buddhiḥ san saṅgrāmam eva sva-dharmaṃ kurv iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2369: tvaṃ saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā yogasthaḥ san karmāṇi kuru yuddhādīni /
GE07bhg4c02u:2375: tad-anuṣaṅga-phalānāṃ jayādīnāṃ siddhāv asiddhau ca samo bhūtvā rāga-dveṣa-rahitaḥ san kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2376: idam eva samatvaṃ mayā yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenoktaṃ citta-samādhi-rūpatvāt //48//
GE07bhg4c02u:2379: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhi-yogād dhanaṃjaya /
GE07bhg4c02u:2381: śrīdharaḥ : kāmyaṃ tu karmātinikṛṣṭam ity āha dūreṇeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2382: buddhyā vyavasāyātmikayā kṛtaḥ karma-yogo buddhi-yogo buddhi-sādhana-bhūto vā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2383: tasmāt sakāśād anyat sādhana-bhūtaṃ kāmyaṃ karma dūreṇa avaraṃ atyantam apakṛṣṭaṃ hi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2384: yasmād evaṃ tasmād buddhau jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ karma-yogam anviccha anutiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c02u:2385: yad vā buddhau śaraṇaṃ trātāram īśvaram āśrayety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2386: phalahetur astu sakāmā narāḥ kṛpaṇā dīnāḥ yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ //49//
GE07bhg4c02u:2388: nanu kiṃ karmānuṣṭhānam eva puruṣārtho yena niṣphalam eva sadā kartavyam ity ucyate prayojanam anuddiśya na mando 'pi pravartate iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2389: tad varaṃ phala-kāmanayaiva karmānuṣṭhānam iti cen nety āha dūreṇeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2390: buddhi-yogād ātma-buddhi-sādhana-bhūtān niṣkāma-karma-yogād dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram adhamaṃ karma phalābhisandhinā kriyamāṇaṃ janma-maraṇa-hetu-bhūtam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2391: athavā paramātma-buddhi-yogād dūreṇāvaraṃ sarvam api karma yasmād,
GE07bhg4c02u:2393: tasmād buddhau paramātma-buddhau sarvānartha-nivartikāyāṃ śaraṇaṃ pratibandhaka-pāpa-kṣayeṇa rakṣakaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam anviccha kartum iccha /
GE07bhg4c02u:2394: ye tu phala-hetavaḥ phala-kāmā avaraṃ karma kurvanti te kṛpaṇāḥ sarvadā janma-maraṇādi-ghaṭī-yantra-bhramaṇena para-vaśā atyanta-dīnā
GE07bhg4c02u:2395: ity arthaḥ / yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2396: tathā ca tvam api kṛpaṇo mā bhūḥ kintu sarvānartha-nivartakātma-jñānotpādakaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam evānutiṣṭhety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2397_0: yathā hi kṛpaṇā janā atiduḥkhena dhanam arjayanto yat kiṃcid dṛṣṭa-sukha-mātra-lobhena
GE07bhg4c02u:2397_1: dānādi-janitaṃ mahat sukham anubhavituṃ na śaknuvantīty ātmānam eva vañcayanti tathā
GE07bhg4c02u:2397_2: mahatā duḥkhena karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ kṣudra-phala-mātra-lobhena paramānandā-nubhavena
GE07bhg4c02u:2397_3: vañcitā ity aho daurbhāgyaṃ mauḍhyaṃ ca teṣām iti kṛpaṇa-padena dhvanitam //49 //
GE07bhg4c02u:2403: baladevaḥ : atha kāmya-karmaṇo nikṛṣṭatvam āha dūreṇeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2406: ātma-yāthātmya-buddhi-sādhana-bhūtān niṣkāma-karma-yogāt dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram atyapakṛṣṭaṃ janma-maraṇādy-anartha-nimittaṃ kāmyaṃ karmety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2407: hi yasmād evam atas tvaṃ buddhau tad-yāthātmya-jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam anviccha kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2408: ye tu phala-hetavaḥ phala-kāmā avara-karma-kāriṇas te kṛpaṇās tat-phala-janma-karmādi-pravāha-paravaśā dīnā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2409_0: tathā ca tvaṃ kṛpaṇo mābhūr iti iha kṛpaṇāḥ khalu kaṣṭopārjita-vittādṛṣṭa-sukha-lava-lubdhā
GE07bhg4c02u:2409_1: vittāni dātum asamarthā mahatā dāna-sukhena vañcitās tathā kaṣṭānuṣṭhita-karmāṇas
GE07bhg4c02u:2414: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam //50//
GE07bhg4c02u:2415: śrīdharaḥ : buddhi-yoga-yuktas tu śreṣṭha ity āha buddhi-yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2417: te ubhe ihaiva janmani parameśvara-prasādena tyajati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2418: tasmād yogāya tad-arthāya karma-yogāya yujyasva ghaṭasva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2420: sva-dharmākhyeṣu karmasu vartamānasya yā siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatva-buddhir īśvarārpita-cetastayā tat kauśalaṃ kuśala-bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2421: tad dhi kauśalaṃ yad bandha-svabhāvāny api karmāṇi samatva-buddhyā svabhāvān nivartante /
GE07bhg4c02u:2424: evaṃ buddhi-yogābhāve doṣam uktvā tad-bhāve guṇam āha buddhīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2425: iha karmasu buddhi-yuktaḥ samatva-buddhyā yukto jahāti parityajati ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte puṇya-pāpe sattva-śuddhi-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇa /
GE07bhg4c02u:2426: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt samatva-buddhi-yogāya tvaṃ yujyasva ghaṭasvodyukto bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2427_0: yasmād īdṛśaḥ samatva-buddhi-yoga īśvarārpita-cetasaḥ karmasu pravartamānasya kauśalaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2427_1: kuśala-bhāvo yad-bandha-hetūnām api karmaṇāṃ tad-abhāvo mokṣa-paryavasāyitvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c02u:2428: samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-yogaḥ karmātmāpi san duṣṭa-karma-kṣayaṃ karotīti mahā-kuśalaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2429: tvaṃ tu na kuśalo yataś cetano 'pi san sajātīya-duṣṭa-kṣayaṃ na karoṣīti vyatireko 'tra dhvanitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2430: athavā iha samatva-buddhi-yukte karmaṇi kṛte sati sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa buddhi-yuktaḥ paramātma-sākṣātkāravān sañjahāty ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte /
GE07bhg4c02u:2432: yasmāt karmasu madhye samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-yogaḥ kauśalaṃ kuśalo duṣṭa-karma-nivāraṇa-catura ity arthaḥ //50//
GE07bhg4c02u:2435: yataḥ karmasu sakāma-niṣkāmeṣu madhye yoga evodāsīnatvena karma-karaṇam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2437: baladevaḥ : uktasya buddhi-yogasya prabhāvam āha buddhīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2438: iha karmasu yo buddhi-yuktaḥ pradhāna-phala-tyāga-viṣayānuṣaṅga-phala-siddhy-asiddhi-samatva-viṣayayā ca buddhyā yuktas tāni karoti,
GE07bhg4c02u:2439: sa ubhe anādi-kāla-sañcite jñāna-pratibandhake sukṛta-duṣkṛte jahāti vināśayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2442: kauśalam cāturyaṃ bandhakānām eva buddhi-samparkād viśodhita-viṣa-pārada-nyāyena mocakatvena pariṇāmāt //50//
GE07bhg4c02u:2445: karmajaṃ buddhi-yuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2447: śrīdharaḥ : karmaṇāṃ mokṣa-sādhanatva-prakāram āha karma-jam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2448_0: karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ karma kurvāṇo manīṣiṇo jñānino
GE07bhg4c02u:2448_1: bhūtvā janma-rūpeṇa bandhena vinirmuktāḥ santo 'nāmayaṃ sarvopadrava-rahitaṃ viṣṇoḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2450: nanu duṣkṛta-hānam apekṣitaṃ na tu sukṛta-hānaṃ puruṣārtha-bhraṃśāpatter ity āśaṅkya tuccha-phala-tyāgena parama-puruṣārtha-prāptiṃ phalam āha karma-jam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2451_0: samatva-buddhi-yuktā hi yasmāt karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2451_1: karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa manīṣiṇas tat tvam asi ity ādi-vākya-janyātma-manīṣāvanto bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2452_0: tādṛśāś ca santo janmātmakena bandhena vinirmuktā viśeṣeṇātyantikatva-lakṣaṇena niravaśeṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2452_1: muktāḥ padaṃ padanīyam ātma-tattvam ānanda-rūpaṃ brahmānāmayam avidyā-tat-kāryātmaka-roga-rahitābhayaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2452_2: mokṣākhyaṃ puruṣārthaṃ gacchanty abhedena prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2453_0: yasmād evaṃ phala-kāmanāṃ tyaktvā samatva-buddhyā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhantas taiḥ kṛtāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhayas
GE07bhg4c02u:2453_2: mokṣākhyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ gacchanti tasmāt tvam api yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2453_3: brūhi tan me [Gītā 2.7] ity ukteḥ śreyo jijñāsur evaṃvidhaṃ karma-yogam anutiṣṭheti
GE07bhg4c02u:2456_0: buddhi-yuktās tādṛśa-buddhimantaḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhanto manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2457: tasmāt tvam api śreyo jijñāsur evaṃ vidhāni karmāṇi kurv iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2462: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2463: śrīdharaḥ : kadāhaṃ tat padaṃ prāpsyāmi ity apekṣāyām āha yadeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2468_0: evaṃ parameśvarārādhane kriyamāṇe yadā tat-prasādena tava buddhir dehābhimāna-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2468_1: moha-mayaṃ gahanaṃ durgaṃ viśeṣeṇātitariṣyati tadā śrotavyasya śrutasya cārthasya
GE07bhg4c02u:2469: tayor anupādeyatvena jijñāsām na kariṣyasīty arthaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2471: evaṃ karmāṇy anutiṣṭhataḥ kadā me sattva-śuddhiḥ syād ity ata āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2472: na hy etāvatā kālena sattva-śuddhir bhavatīti kāla-niyamo 'sti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2473_0: kintu yadā yasmin kāle te tava buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ vyatitariṣyati avivekātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2473_1: kāluṣam aham idaṃ mamedaṃ ity ādy-ajñāna-vilasitam atigahanam vyatikramiṣyati rajas-tamo-malam
GE07bhg4c02u:2474: tadā tasmin kāle śrotavyasya śrutasya ca karma-phalasya nirvedaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ gantāsi prāptāsi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2475: parīkṣya lokān karma-citān brāhmaṇo nirvedam āyāt [MuṇḍU 1.2.12] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2478: evaṃ parameśvarārpita-niṣkāma-karmābhyāsāt tava yogo bhaviṣyatīty āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2479: tava buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ moha-rūpaṃ gahanaṃ viśeṣato 'tiśayena tariṣyati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2480: tadā śrotavyasya śrotavyeṣv artheṣu śrutasya śruteṣv apy artheṣu nirvedaṃ prāpsyasi asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanayor naṣṭatvāt kiṃ me śāstropadeśa-vākya-śravaṇena /
GE07bhg4c02u:2481: sāmprataṃ me sādhaneṣv eva pratikṣaṇam abhyāsaḥ sarvathocita iti maṃsyasa iti bhāvaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2482: baladevaḥ : nanu niṣkāmāṇi karmāṇi kurvato me kadātma-viṣayā manīṣābhyudiyād iti cet tatrāha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2483: yadā te buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ tuccha-phalābhilāṣa-hetum ajñāna-gahanaṃ vyatitariṣyati parityakṣyatīty arthaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2484: tadā pūrvaṃ śrutasyānantaraṃ śrotavyasya ca tasya tuccha-phalasya sambandhinaṃ nirvedaṃ gantāsi gamiṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2485: parīkṣya lokān karma-citān brāhmaṇo nirvedaṃ āyāt iti śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2486: nirvedena phalena tad-viṣayāṃ tāṃ pariceṣyati iti nāsty atra kāla-niyama ity arthaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2490: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasyi //53//
GE07bhg4c02u:2493: itaḥ pūrvaṃ vikṣiptā satī tava buddhir yadā samādhau sthāsyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2494: samādhīyate cittam asminn iti samādhiḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2497: abhyāsa-pāṭavena tatraiva sthirā ca satī yogaṃ yoga-phalaṃ tattva-jñānam avāpsyasi //53//
GE07bhg4c02u:2499: antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhyaivaṃ jāta-nirvedasya kadā jñāna-prāptir ity apekṣāyām āha śrutīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2500: te tava buddhiḥ śrutibhir nānā-vidha-phala-śravaṇair avicārita-tātparyair vipratipannā 'neka-vidha-saṃśaya-viparyāsavattvena vikṣiptā prāk /

GE07bhg4c02u:2598: tatra hetuḥ - ātmani pratyāhṛte manasi prāpto ya ātmānanda-rūpas tena tuṣṭaḥ /

GE07bhg4c02u:2628_1: ko me duḥkham īdṛśaṃ nirākuryād ity anutāpātmako bhrānti-rūpas tāmasaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣa udvegākhyo jāyate
GE07bhg4c02u:2629: / yady ayaṃ pāpānuṣṭhāna-samaye syāt tadā tat-pravṛtti-pratibandhakatvena saphalaḥ syāt /

GE07bhg4c02u:2630_1: saty api kim iti mama duḥkhaṃ jāyate iti avivekaja-bhrama-rūpatvān na vivekinaḥ sthita-prajñasya sambhavati /

GE07bhg4c02u:2635: tathā sukheṣu sattva-pariṇāma-rūpa-prītyātmaka-citta-vṛtti-viśeṣeṣu trividheṣu prārabdha-puṇya-karma-prāpiteṣu vigata-spṛha āgāmi-taj-jātīya-sukha-spṛhā-rahitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2636: spṛhā hi nāma sukhānubhava-kāle taj-jātīya-sukhasya kāraṇaṃ dharmam ananuṣṭhāya vṛthaiva tad-ākāṅkṣā-rūpā tāmasī citta-vṛttir bhrāntir eva /

GE07bhg4c02u:2642: aho dhanyo 'haṃ yasya mamedṛśaṃ sukham upasthitaṃ ko vā mayā tulas tribhuvane kena vopāyena mamedṛśaṃ sukhaṃ na vicchidyetety evam ātmikotphullatā-rūpā tāmasī citta-vṛttiḥ /

GE07bhg4c02u:2649: evaṃ rāga-viṣaya-vināśake samupasthite tan-nivāraṇa-sāmarthyam ātmano manyamānasyābhijvalanātmakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ krodhaḥ /

GE07bhg4c02u:2656_0: kiṃ prabhāṣetety asya uttaram āha duḥkheṣu kṣut-pipāsa-jvara-śiro-rogādiṣv ādhyātmikeṣu

GE07bhg4c02u:2670: vīta-bhayaḥ viṣayāpahartṛṣu prāpteṣu durlabhasya mamaitāni dharmyair bhavadbhir hriyanta iti dainya-śūnyaḥ /

GE07bhg4c02u:2674: itthaṃ svānubhavaṃ parān prati svagataṃ vā vadan naudvego nispṛhatādi-vacaḥ prabhāṣate ity uttaram //56//

GE07bhg4c02u:2686: yasmin saty anyadīye hāni-vṛddhī svasminn āropyete sa tādṛśo 'nya-viṣayaḥ premāpara-paryāyas tāmaso vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ snehaḥ sarva-prakāreṇa tad-rahito 'nabhisnehaḥ /
