GE07bhg4c02u:2690: aśubhaṃ duḥkha-hetuṃ viṣayaṃ prāpya na dveṣṭi antar-asūyā-pūrvakaṃ na nindati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2691: ajñasya hi sukha-hetur yaḥ sva-kalatrādiḥ sa śubho viṣayas tad-guṇa-kathanādi-pravartikā dhī-vṛttir bhrānti-rūpābhinandaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2694: evam asūyotpādanena duḥkha-hetuḥ parakīya-vidyā-prakarṣādir enaṃ pratyaśubho viṣayas tan-nindādi-pravartikā bhrānti-rūpā dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2697: tāv abhinanda-dveṣau bhrānti-rūpau tāmasau katham abhrānte śuddha-sattve sthita-prajñe sambhavatām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2699: harṣa-viṣāda-rahitasya muneḥ prajñā paramātma-tattva-viṣayā pratiṣṭhitā phala-paryavasāyinī sa sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2702: aśubhaṃ prāpya na ninded ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2703: atra ca nindā-praśaṃsādi-rūpā vāco na prabhāṣeteti vyatireka uktaḥ //57//
GE07bhg4c02u:2705: anabhisnehaḥ sopādhi-sneha-śūnyo dayālutvān nirupādhir īṣan-mātra-snehas tu tiṣṭhed eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2706: tat tat prasiddhaṃ sammāna-bhojanādibhyaḥ sva-paricaraṇaṃ śubhaṃ prāpyāśubham anādaraṇaṃ muṣṭi-prahārādikaṃ ca prāpya krameṇa nābhinandati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2707: na praśaṃsati tvaṃ dhārmikaḥ paramahaṃsa-sevī sukhī bhaveti na brūte /
GE07bhg4c02u:2708: na dveṣṭi tvaṃ pāpātmā narake pateti nābhiśapati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2709: tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā samādhiṃ prati sthitā susthira-prajñā ucyata ity arthaḥ //57//
GE07bhg4c02u:2710: baladevaḥ : ya iti sarveṣu prāṇiṣu anabhisneha aupādhika-sneha-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2711: kāruṇikatvān nirupādhir īṣad-snehas tv asty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2712: tat tat prasiddhaṃ śubham uttama-bhojana-srak-candanārpaṇa-rūpaṃ prāpya nābhinandati tad-arpakaṃ prati dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ ciraṃ jīveti na vadati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2713: aśubham apamānaṃ yaṣṭi-prahārādikaṃ ca prāpya na dveṣṭi,
GE07bhg4c02u:2715: tasya prajñeti sa sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2716: atra stuti-nindā-rūpaṃ vaco na bhāṣata iti vyatirekeṇa tal lakṣaṇam //57//
GE07bhg4c02u:2722: yadā cāyaṃ yogī indriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sakāśād indriyāṇi saṃharate sarvata evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭha indriyāṇīnidryārthebhyaḥ sarva-viṣayebhyaḥ upasaṃharate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2726: idānīṃ kim āsīteti praśnasyottaraṃ vaktum ārabhate bhagavān ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2727: tatra prārabdha-karma-vaśād vyutthānena vikṣiptānīndriyāṇi punar upasaṃhṛtya samādhy-artham eva sthita-prajñasyopaveśanam iti darśayitum āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2728: ayaṃ vyutthitaḥ sarvaśaḥ sarvāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2734: adhunā tu punaḥ samādhy-avasthāyāṃ sakala-vṛtty-abhāva iti viśeṣaḥ //58//
GE07bhg4c02u:2738: svādhīnānām indriyāṇāṃ bāhya-viṣayeṣu calanaṃ niṣidhyāntareva niścalatayā sthāpanaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2740: kūrmo 'ṅgāni mukha-netrādīni yathā svāntar eva svecchayā sthāpayati //58//
GE07bhg4c02u:2741: baladevaḥ : atha kim āsītety asyottaram āha yadety ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir /
GE07bhg4c02u:2742: ayaṃ yogī yadā cendriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ svādhīnānīndriyāṇi śrotrādīny anāyāsena saṃharati samākarṣati tadā tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2744: mukha-kara-caraṇāni yathānāyasena kamaṭhaḥ saṃharati tadvat viṣayebhyaḥ samākṛṣṭendriyāṇām antaḥ-sthāpanaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam //58//
GE07bhg4c02u:2748: rasa-varjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate //59//
GE07bhg4c02u:2749: śrīdharaḥ : nanu nendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv apravṛttir sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2750: jaḍānām āturāṇām upavāsa-parāṇāṃ ca viṣayeṣv pravṛtter aviśeṣāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2753: nirāhārasya indriyāir viṣaya-grahaṇam akurvato dehino dehābhimānino 'jñasya rāgo 'bhilāṣas tad-varjaṃ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2755: yad vā nirāhārasya upavāsa-parasya viṣayāḥ prāyaśo nivartante kṣudhā-santaptasya śabda-sparśādy-apekṣābhāvāt,
GE07bhg4c02u:2756: kintu rasa-varjaṃ rasāpekṣā tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2759: nanu mūḍhasyāpi rogādi-vaśād viṣayebhya indriyāṇām upasaṃharaṇaṃ bhavati tat kathaṃ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety uktam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2761_0: nirāhārasya indriyāir indriyāir viṣayān anāharato dehino dehābhimānavato mūḍhasyāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:2761_1: rogiṇaḥ kāṣṭha-tapasvino vā viṣayāḥ śabdādayo vinivartante kintu rasa-varjaṃ rasa-tṛṣṇā taṃ varjayitvā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2762: ajñasya viṣayā nivartante tad-viṣayo rāgas tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2763: asya tu sthita-prajñasya paraṃ puruṣārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad evāham asmīti sākṣātkṛtya sthitasya raso 'pi kṣudra-sukha-rāgo 'pi nivartate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2765: tathā ca yāvān artha ity ādau vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2766: evaṃ ca sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttiḥ sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇam iti na mūḍhe vyabhicāra ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2768: tasmāt sa-rāga-viṣayocchedikāyāḥ samyag-darśanātmikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ sthairyaṃ mahatā yatnena sampādayed ity abhiprāyaḥ //59//
GE07bhg4c02u:2770: mūḍhasyāpi upavāsato rogādi-vaśād vendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv acalanaṃ sambhavet tatrāha viṣayā iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2772: abhilāṣas tu viṣayeṣu na nivartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2773: asya sthita-prajñasya tu paraṃ paramātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣayeṣv abhilāṣo nivartata iti na lakṣaṇa-vyabhicāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2776: baladevaḥ : nanu mūḍhasyāmaya-grastasya viṣayeṣv indriyāpravṛtti-dṛṣṭā tat katham etat sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāha viṣayā iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2777: nirāhārasya roga-bhayād bhojanādīny akurvato mūḍhasyāpi dehino janasya viṣayās tad-anubhavā vinivartante /
GE07bhg4c02u:2778: kintu raso rāga-tṛṣṇā tad-varjaṃ viṣaya-tṛṣṇā tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2779_0: asya sthita-prajñasya tu raso 'pi viṣaya-rāgo 'pi viṣayebhyaḥ paraṃ sva-prakāśānandam
GE07bhg4c02u:2779_1: ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvānubhūya nivartate vinaśyatīti sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttis tasya lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:2782: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2784: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamaṃ vinā sthita-prajñatā na sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2785: ataḥ sādhakāvasthāyāṃ tatra mahān prayatnaḥ kartavya ity āha yatato hy apīti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2791_0: tatra prajñā-sthairye bāhyendriya-nigraho mano-nigrahaś cāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tad-ubhayābhāve
GE07bhg4c02u:2791_1: prajñā-nāśa-darśanād iti vaktuṃ bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve prathamaṃ doṣam āha yatata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2793: yatato bhūyo bhūyo viṣaya-doṣa-darśanātmakaṃ yatnaṃ kurvato 'pi,
GE07bhg4c02u:2794: cakṣiṅo ṅitva-karaṇād anudātteto 'nāvaśyakam ātmanepadam iti jñāpanāt parasmaipadam aviruddham /
GE07bhg4c02u:2795: vipaścito 'tyanta-vivekino 'pi puruṣasya manaḥ kṣaṇa-mātraṃ nirvikāraṃ kṛtam apīndriyāṇi haranti vikāraṃ prāpayanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2796: nanu virodhinī viveke sati kuto vikāra-prāptis tatrāha pramāthīni pramathana-śīlāni atibalīyastvād vivekopamardana-kṣamāṇi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2797_0: ataḥ prasabhaṃ prasahya balātkāreṇa paśyaty eva vipaściti svāmini viveke ca rakṣake
GE07bhg4c02u:2797_1: sati sarva-pramāthītvād evendriyāṇi vivekaja-prajñāyāṃ praviṣṭaṃ manas tataḥ pracyāvya
GE07bhg4c02u:2799_0: prasiddho hy ayam artho loke yathā pramāthino dasyavaḥ prasabham eva dhaninaṃ dhana-rakṣakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2799_1: cābhibhūya tayoḥ paśyator eva dhanaṃ haranti tathendriyāṇy api viṣaya-sannidhāne
GE07bhg4c02u:2802: na tv indriyāṇi parāvartayituṃ sarvathā śaktir ity āha yatata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2804: baladevaḥ : athāsyā jñāna-niṣṭhayā daurlabhyam āha yatato hīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2805: vipaścito viṣayātma-svarūpa-vivekajñasya tata indriya-jaye prayatamānasyāpi puruṣasya indriyāṇi śrotrādīni kartṝṇi manaḥ parasabhaṃ balād iva haranti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2807: nanu virodhini viveka-jñāne sthite kathaṃ haranti tatrāha pramāthīnīti ati-baliṣṭhatvāt taj-jñānopamardana-kṣamāṇīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2808: tasmāt caurebhyo mahā-nidher ivendriyebhyo jñāna-niṣṭhāyāḥ saṃrakṣaṇaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam iti //60//
GE07bhg4c02u:2811: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2812: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:2814: yukto yogī tāni indriyāṇi saṃyamya mat-paraḥ sann āsīta /
GE07bhg4c02u:2816: etena ca katham āsīteti praśnasya vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:2818: evaṃ tarhi tatra kaḥ pratīkāra ity ata āha tānīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2819: tānīndriyāṇi sarvāṇi jñāna-karma-sādhana-bhūtāni saṃyamya vaśīkṛtya yuktaḥ samāhito nigṛhīta-manāḥ sann āsīta nirvāpāras tiṣṭhet /
GE07bhg4c02u:2820: pramāthināṃ kathaṃ sva-vaśīkaraṇam iti cet tatrāha mat-para iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2821: ahaṃ sarvātmā vāsudeva eva para utkṛṣṭa upādeyo yasya sa mat-para ekānta-mad-bhakta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2822: tathā coktam na vāsudeva-bhaktānām aśubhaṃ vidyate kvacit iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2823_0: yathā hi loke balavantaṃ rājānam āśritya dasyavo nigṛhyante rājāśrito 'yam iti jñātvā
GE07bhg4c02u:2823_1: ca svayam eva tad-vaśyā bhavanti tathaiva bhagavantaṃ sarvāntaryāminam āśritya tat-prabhāveṇaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:2823_2: duṣṭānīndriyāṇi nigrāhyāṇi punaś ca bhagavad-āśrito 'yam iti matvā tāni tad-vaśyāny
GE07bhg4c02u:2828: tad etad vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti kim āsīteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:2831: mad-bhaktiṃ vinā naivendriya-jaya ity agrima-granthe 'pi sarvatra draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2835: athāta ānanda-dughaṃ padāmbujaṃ haṃsāḥ śrayeran // [BhP 11.29.1-2] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2836: vaśe hīti sthita-prajñasyendriyāṇi vaśībhūtāni bhavantīti sādhakād viśeṣa uktaḥ //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:2837: baladevaḥ : nanu nirjitendriyāṇām apy ātmānubhavo na pratītas tatra ko 'bhyupāya iti cet tatrāha tānīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2838: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya mat-paro man-niṣṭhaḥ san yuktaḥ kṛtāma-samādhir āsīta tiṣṭheta /
GE07bhg4c02u:2842: tathā citta-sthito viṣṇur yogināṃ sarva-kilbiṣam // [ViP 6.7.74] ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2844: itthaṃ ca vaśīkṛtendriyatayāvasthitiḥ kim āsītety asyottaram uktam //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:2851: śrīdharaḥ : bāhyendriya-saṃyamābhāve doṣam uktvā manaḥ-saṃyamābhāve doṣam āha dhyāyata iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2852: guṇa-buddhyā viṣayān dhyāyataḥ puṃsaḥ teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2853: āsaktyā ca teṣu adhikaḥ kāmo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2854: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2862_0: nigṛhīta-bāhyendriyasyāpi śabdādīnviṣayān dhyāyato manasā punaḥ punaś cintayataḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2862_1: puṃsas teṣu viṣayeṣu saṅga āsaṅgo mamātyantaṃ sukha-hetava eta ity evaṃ śobhanādhyāsa-lakṣaṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2862_2: prīti-viśeṣa upajāyate saṅgāt sukha-hetutva-jñāna-lakṣaṇāt saṃjāyate kāmo mamaite
GE07bhg4c02u:2863: tasmāt kāmāt kutaścit pratihanyamānāt tat-pratighāta-viṣayaḥ krodho 'bhijvalanātmābhijāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2865: saṃmohāt smṛti-vibhramaḥ smṛteḥ śāstrācāryopadiṣṭārthānusandhānasya vibhramo vicalanaṃ vibhraṃśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2866: tasmāc ca smṛti-bhraṃśād buddher aikātmyākāra-mano-vṛtter nāśo viparīta-bhāvanopacaya-doṣeṇa pratibandhād anutpattir utpannāyāś ca phalāyogyatvena vilayaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2867: / buddhi-nāśāt praṇaśyati tasyāś ca phala-bhūtāyā buddher vilopāt praṇaśyati sarva-puruṣārthāyogyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2868: yo hi puruṣārthāyogyo jātaḥ sa mṛta eveti loke vyavahriyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2870: yasmād evaṃ manaso nigrahābhāve nigṛhīta-bāhyendriyasyāpi paramānartha-prāptis taramān mahatā prayatnena mano nigṛhṇīyād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2871: ato yuktam uktaṃ tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīteti //62-63//
GE07bhg4c02u:2873: sthita-prajñasya mano-vaśīkāra eva bāhyendriya-vaśīkāra-kāraṇaṃ sarvathā mano-vaśīkārābhāve tu yat syāt tat śṛṇv ity āha dhyāyata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2881: baladevaḥ : vijitendriyasyāpi mayy aniveśita-manasaḥ punar anartho durvāra ity āha dhyāyata iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2882: viṣayān śabdādīn sukha-hetutva-buddhyā dhyāyataḥ punaḥ punaś cintayato yoginas teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2884: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodhaś citta-jvālas tat-pratighātako bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2888: buddhi-nāśāt praṇaśyati punar viṣaya-bhoga-nimagno bhavati saṃsaratīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2889: madanāśrayaṇād durbalaṃ manas tāni sva-viṣayair yojayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2895: śrīdharaḥ : nanv indriyāṇāṃ viṣaya-pravaṇa-svabhāvānāṃ niroddhum aśakyatvād ayaṃ doṣo duṣparihara iti sthita-prajñatvaṃ kathaṃ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2897: rāga-dveṣa-rahitaiḥ vigata-darpair indriyaiḥ viṣayāṃś carann upabhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ śāntiṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2899: ātmano manasaḥ vaśyair indriyaiḥ vidheyo vaśavartī ātmā mano yasyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2900: anenaiva kathaṃ vrajetety asya caturtha-praśnasya svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān gacchatīty uttaram uktaṃ bhavati //64//
GE07bhg4c02u:2902: manasi nigṛhīte tu bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve 'pi na doṣa iti vadan kiṃ vrajetety asyottaram āhāṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2903: yo 'samāhita-cetāḥ sa bāhyendriyāṇi nigṛhyāpi rāga-dveṣa-duṣṭena manasā viṣayāṃś cintayan puruṣārthād bhraṣṭo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2905_0: vaśīkṛtāntaḥ-karaṇas tu ātma-vaśyair mano 'dhīnaiḥ svādhīnair iti vā rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2905_1: viyuktair virahitair indriyaiḥ śrotrādibhir viṣayān śabdādīn aniṣiddhāṃś carann upalabhamānaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2905_2: prasādaṃ prasannātāṃ cittasya svacchatāṃ paramātma-sākṣātkāra-yogyatām adhigacchati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2910: na doṣam āvahatīti na śuddhi-vyāghāta iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2911: etena viṣayāṇāṃ smaraṇam api ced anartha-kāraṇaṃ sutarāṃ tarhi bhogas tena jīvanārthaṃ viṣayān bhuñjānaḥ katham anarthaṃ na pratipadyeteti śaṅkā nirastā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2912: svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān prāpnotīti ca kiṃ vrajeteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati //64//
GE07bhg4c02u:2914: mānasa-viṣaya-grahaṇābhāve sati sva-vaśyair indriyair viṣaya-grahaṇe 'pi na doṣa iti vadan sthita-prajño vrajeta kim ity asyottaram āha rāgeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2915: vidheyo vacane sthta ātmā mano yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2918: prasādam adhigacchatīty etādṛśasyādhikāriṇo viṣaya-grahaṇam api na doṣa iti kiṃ vaktavyam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2920: sthita-prajñasya viṣaya-tyāga-svīkārāv eva āsana-vrajane te ubhe api tasya bhadre iti bhāvaḥ //64//
GE07bhg4c02u:2921: baladevaḥ : manasi nirjite śrotrādi-nirjayābhāvo 'pi na doṣa iti bruvan vrajeta kim ity asottaram āha rāgeti ādibhir aṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2922: vijita-bahir-indriyo 'pi mad-anarpita-manāḥ paramārthād vicyuta ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2923_0: yo vidheyātmā svādhīna-manā mad-arpita-manās tata eva nidagdha-rāgādi-mano-malaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2923_1: sa tv ātma-vaśyair mano 'dhīnair ata eva rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ viyuktair indriyaiḥ śrotrādyair
GE07bhg4c02u:2923_2: viṣayān niṣiddhān śabdādīṃś caran bhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ viṣayāsakty-ādi-malānāgamād
GE07bhg4c02u:2928: śrīdharaḥ : prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity atrāha prasāda iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2930: tataś ca prasanna-cetaso buddhiḥ pratiṣṭhitā bhavatīty arthaḥ //65//
GE07bhg4c02u:2932: prasādam adhigacchatīty uktaṃ tatra prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity ucyate prasāda iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2933: cittasya prasāde svacchatva-rūpe sati sarva-duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnām ajñāna-vilasitānāṃ hānir vināśo 'sya yater upajāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2934: hi yasmāt prasanna-cetaso yater āśu śīghram eva buddhir brahmātmaikyākārā paryavatiṣṭhate pari samantād avatiṣṭhate sthirā bhavati viparīta-bhāvanādi-pratibandhābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2935: tataś ca prasāde sati buddhi-paryavasthānaṃ tatas tad-virodhy-ajñāna-nivṛttiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2936: tatas tat-kārya-sakala-duḥkha-hānir iti krame 'pi prasāde yatrādhikyāya sarva-duḥkha-hāni-karatva-kathanam iti na virodhaḥ //65//
GE07bhg4c02u:2938: buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate sarvato-bhāvena svābhīṣṭaṃprati sthirī-bhavatīti viṣaya-grahaṇābhāvād api samucita-viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ tasya sukham iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2940: tayā vinā tu na citta-prasāda iti prathama-skandha eva prapañcitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2942: baladevaḥ : prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity āha asya yogino manaḥ prasāde sati sarveṣāṃ prakṛti-saṃsarga-kṛtānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ hānir upajāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2943: prasanna-cetasaḥ svātma-yāthātmya-viṣayā buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate sthirā bhavati //65//
GE07bhg4c02u:2946: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2947: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:2954: bhāvanayā hi buddher ātmani pratiṣṭhā bhavati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2956: na cābhāvayataḥ ātma-dhyānam akurvataḥ śāntiḥ ātmani cittoparamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2957: aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:2960: ayuktasyājita-cittasya buddhir ātma-viṣayā śravaṇa-mananākhya-vedānta-vicāra-janyā nāsti notpadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2963: na cābhāvayata ātmānaṃ śāntiḥ sakāryāvidyā-nivṛtti-rūpā vedānta-vākya-janyā brahmātmaikya-sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2964: aśāntasyātma-sākṣātkāra-śūnyasya kutaḥ sukhaṃ mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:2971: baladevaḥ : pūrvoktam arthaṃ vyatireka-mukhenāha ayuktasyāyogino mad-aniveśita-manaso buddhir ukta-lakṣaṇā nāsti na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2973: tādṛśam ātmānam abhāvayataḥ śāntir viṣaya-tṛṣṇā-nivṛttir nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2974: aśāntasya tat-tṛṣṇākulasya sukham sva-prakāśānandātmānubhava-lakṣaṇaṃ kutaḥ syāt //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:2978: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi //67//
GE07bhg4c02u:2979: śrīdharaḥ : nāsti buddhir ayuktasya [Gītā 2.66] ity atra hetum āha indriyāṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2980: indriyāṇām avaśīkṛtānāṃ svairaṃ viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yadaivaikam indriyaṃ mano 'nuvidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2982: tadaivaikam indriyasya manasaḥ puruṣasya vā prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati viṣaya-vikṣiptāṃ karoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2983: kim uta vaktavyaṃ bahūni prajñāṃ harantīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2984: yathā pramattasya karṇadhārasya nāvaṃ vāyuḥ sarvataḥ paribhramayati tadvad iti //67//
GE07bhg4c02u:2986: ayuktasya kuto nāsti buddhir ity ata āha indriyāṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2987: caratāṃ sva-viṣayeṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu pravartamānānām avaśīkṛtānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekam apīndriyam anulakṣyīkṛtya mano vidhīyate preryate pravartate iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2989: tat indriyam ekam api manasānusṛtam asya sādhakasya manaso vā prajñām ātma-viṣayāṃ śāstrīyāṃ harati apanayati manasas tad-viṣayāviṣṭatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2990: yadaikam apīndriyaṃ prajñāṃ harati tadā sarvāṇi harantīti kim u vaktavyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2992: abhyasyeti vāyor naukā-haraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ na bhuvīti sūcayitum ambhasīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2993: evaṃ dārṣṭāntike 'py ambhaḥ-sthānīye manaś cāñcalye saty eva prajñā-haraṇa-sāmarthyam indriyasya na tu bhū-sthānīye manaḥ-sthairya iti sūcitam //67//
GE07bhg4c02u:2995: ayuktasya buddhir nāstīty upapādayati indriyāṇāṃ sva-sva-viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yan mama ekam indriyam anuvidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2997: tad eva mano 'sya prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3000: viṣayeṣu caratām avijitānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekaṃ śrotraṃ vā cakṣur vānulakṣyīkṛtya mano vidhīyate pravartate,
GE07bhg4c02u:3001: tad ekam evendriyaṃ manasānugatam asya pravartakasya prajñāṃ viviktātma-viṣayāṃ haraty apanayati manasasas tad-viṣayākṛṣṭatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3003: pratikūlo vāyur yathāmbhasi nīyamānāṃ nāvaṃ tadvat //67//
GE07bhg4c02u:3008: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamasya sthita-prajñatve sādhanatvaṃ coktam upasaṃharati tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3009: sādhanatvopasaṃhāre tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā jñātavyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3011: iti sambodhayan vairi-nigrahe samarthasya tavātrāpi sāmarthyaṃ bhaved iti sūcayati //68//
GE07bhg4c02u:3015: he mahābāho iti sambodhayan sarva-śatru-nivāraṇa-kṣamatvād indriya-śatru-nivāraṇe 'pi tvaṃ kṣamo 'sīti sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3018: indriya-saṃyamasya sthita-prajñaṃ prati lakṣaṇatvasya mumukṣuṃ prati prajñā-sādhanatvasya copasaṃharaṇīyatvāt //68//
GE07bhg4c02u:3026: he mahābāho iti yathā ripūn nigṛhṇāsi tathendriyāṇi nigṛhāṇety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3027: ebhiḥ ślokair bhagavan-niviṣṭatayendriya-vijayaḥ sthita-prajñasya siddhasya svābhāvikaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3031: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
GE07bhg4c02u:3032: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //69//
GE07bhg4c02u:3033: śrīdharaḥ : nanu na kaścid api prasupta iva darśanādi-vyāpāra-śūnyaḥ sarvātmanā nigṛhītendriyo loke dṛśyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3034: ato 'saktāvitam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ity āśaṅkyāha yā niśeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3038: tasyāṃ ātma-niṣṭhāyāṃ saṃyamī nigṛhītendriyo jāgrati prabudhyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:3040: tasyāṃ darśanādi-vyāpāras tasya nāsti ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3041: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathā divāndhānām ulukādīnāṃ rātrāv eva darśanaṃ na tu divase /
GE07bhg4c02u:3046: tad evaṃ mumukṣuṇā prajñā-sthairyāya prayatna-pūrvakam indriya-saṃyamaḥ kartavya ity uktaṃ sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ siddha eva sarvendriya-saṃyama ity āha yā niśeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3047: yā vedānta-vākya-janita-sākṣātkāra-rūpāhaṃ brahmāsmīti prajñā sarva-bhūtānām ajñānāṃ niśeva niśā tān praty aprakāśa-rūpatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3048: tasyāṃ brahma-vidyā-lakṣaṇāyāṃ sarva-bhūta-niśāyāṃ jāgarti ajñāna-nidrāyāḥ prabuddhaḥ san sāvadhāno vartate saṃyamīndriya-saṃyamavān sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3049_0: yasyāṃ tu dvaita-darśana-lakṣaṇāyām avidyā-nidrāyāṃ prasuptāny eva bhūtāni jāgrati
GE07bhg4c02u:3049_1: svapnavad vyavaharanti sā niśā na prakāśata ātma-tattvaṃ paśyato 'parokṣatayā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya /
GE07bhg4c02u:3050: yāvad dhi na prabudhyate tāvad eva svapna-darśanaṃ bodhya-paryantatvād bhramasya tattva-jñāna-kāle
GE07bhg4c02u:3053: kāraka-vyavahāre hi śuddhaṃ vastu na vīkṣyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:3054: śuddhe vastuni siddhe ca kāraka-vyāpṛtis tathā //
GE07bhg4c02u:3056: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānām ity avocat svayaṃ hariḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3057: tathā ca yasya viparīta-darśanaṃ tasya na vastu-darśanaṃ viparīta-darśanasya vastv-adarśana-janyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3058: yasya ca vastu-darśanaṃ tasya na viparīta-darśanaṃ viparīta-darśana-kāraṇasya vastv-adarśanasya vastu-darśanena bādhitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3059: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yatra vā anyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyet /
GE07bhg4c02u:3060: yatra svasya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet //
GE07bhg4c02u:3062: yathā kākasya rātry-andhasya dinam ulūkasya divāndhasya niśā rātrau paśyataś colūkasya yad dinaṃ rātrir eva sā kākasyeti mahad āścaryam etat /
GE07bhg4c02u:3063: atas tattva-darśibhiḥ katham āvidyaka-kriyā-kārakādi-vyavahāraḥ syād iti svataḥ siddha eva tasyendriya-saṃyama ity arthaḥ //69//
GE07bhg4c02u:3065: sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ-siddha eva sarvendriya-nigraha ity āha yeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3066: buddhir hi dvividhā bhavati ātma-pravaṇā viṣaya-pravaṇā ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:3067: tatra yā ātma-pravaṇā buddhiḥ sā sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3068: niśāyāṃ kiṃ kiṃ syād iti tasyāṃ svapanto janā yathā na jānanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:3069: tathaiva ātma-pravaṇa-buddhau prāpyamāṇaṃ vastu sarva-bhūtāni na jānanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3074: tan-niṣṭhaṃ viṣaya-sukha-śoka-mohādikaṃ sākṣād anubhavanti na tu tatra svapanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3075: sā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya niśā tan-niṣṭhaṃ kim api nānubhavati ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3076: kintu paśyataḥ sāṃsārikānāṃ sukha-duḥkha-pradān viṣayān tatraudāsīnyenāvalokayataḥ svabhogyān
GE07bhg4c02u:3077: viṣayān api yathocitaṃ nirlepam ādadānasyety arthaḥ //69//
GE07bhg4c02u:3078: baladevaḥ : sādhakāvasthasya sthita-prajñasyendriya-saṃyamaḥ prayatna-sādhya ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3079: siddhāvasthasya tu tasya tan-niyamaḥ svābhāvika ity āha yā niśeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3081: yātma-niṣṭhā buddhiḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśā-rūpakeṇopamātra vyajyate rātri-tulyā tadvad aprakāśikā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3082: rātrāv ivātma-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau svapanto janās tal-labhyam ātmānaṃ sarve nānubhavantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3083: saṃyamī jitendriyas tu tasyāṃ jāgarti na tu svapiti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3085: yasyāṃ viṣya-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau bhūtānio jāgrati viṣaya-bhogān anubhavanti na tu tatra svapanti sā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya niśā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3097: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣayeṣu dṛṣṭy-abhāve katham asau tān bhuṅkte ity apekṣāyām āha āpūryamāṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3098_0: nānā-nada-nadīnbhir āpūryamāṇam api acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādam eva samudraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3098_1: punar api anyā āpo yathā praviśanti tathā kāmā viṣayā yaṃ munim antar-dṛṣṭiṃ bhogair
GE07bhg4c02u:3098_2: avikriyamāṇam eva prārabdha-karmabhir ākṣiptāḥ santaḥ praviśanti sa śāntim kaivalyaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3101: etādṛśasya sthita-prajñasya sarva-vikṣepa-śāntir apy artha-siddheti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha āpūryamāṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3102: sarvābhir nadībhir āpūryamāṇaṃ santaṃ vṛṣṭy-ādi-prabhavā api sarvā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3104: acalānāṃ mainākādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhā yasminn iti vā gāmbhīryātiśaya uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3105_0: yadvad yena prakāreṇa nirvikāratvena tadvat tenaiva nirvikāratva-prakāreṇa yaṃ sthita-prajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3105_1: nirvikāram eva santaṃ kāmā ajñair lokaiḥ kāmyamānāḥ śabdādyāḥ sarve viṣayā avarjanīyatayā
GE07bhg4c02u:3105_2: prārabdha-karma-vaśāt praviśanti na tu vikartuṃ śaknuvanti sa mahā-samudra-sthānīyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3106: / na kāma-kāmī kāmān viṣayān kāmayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa kāma-kāmy ajñaḥ śāntiṃ samākhyātāṃ nāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3107: api tu sarvadā laukikālaukika-karma-vikṣepeṇa mahati kleśārṇave magno bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3108: etena jñānina eva phala-bhūto vidvat-saṃnyāsas tasyaiva ca sarva-vikṣepa-nivṛtti-rūpā jīvan-muktir daivāddhnīna-viṣaya-bhoge 'pi nirvikāratety-ādikam uktaṃ veditavyam //70//
GE07bhg4c02u:3110: viṣaya-grahaṇe kṣobha-rāhityam eva nirlepety āha āpūryamāṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3111: yathā varṣāsu itas tataḥ nādeyā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti kīdṛśam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3112: ā īṣad api āpūryamāṇam tāvatībhir apy adbhiḥ pūrayituṃ na śakyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3113: acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādaṃ tadvad eva kāmā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti bhogyatvenāyānti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3114: yathā apāṃ praveśe apraveśe vā samudro na kam api viśeṣam āpadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3115: evam eva yaḥ kāmānāṃ bhoge abhoge ca kṣobha-rahita eva syāt sa sthita-prajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3117: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ bhāvaṃ sphuṭayann āha āpūryeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3118: svarūpeṇaivāpūryamāṇaṃ tathāpy acala-pratiṣṭham anullaṅghita-velaṃ samudraṃ yathāpo 'nyā varṣodbhavā nadyaḥ praviśanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:3119: na tu tatra kiñcid viśeṣaṃ śaknuvanti kartuṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:3120: tadvat sarve kāmāḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti na tu vikartuṃ prabhavanti sa śāntim āpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3121: śabdādiṣu tad indriya-gocareṣv api sat svātmānandānubhava-tṛptair vikāra-leśam apy avindan sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3122: yaḥ kāma-kāmī viṣaya-lipsuḥ sa tūkta-lakṣaṇāṃ śāntiṃ nāpnoti //70//
GE07bhg4c02u:3125: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3128: prāptān kāmān vihāya tyaktvopekṣya aprāpteṣu ca niḥspṛhaḥ yato nirahaṅkāro 'taeva tad-bhoga-sādhaneṣu nirmamaḥ sann antar-dṛṣṭir bhūtvā yaś carati prārabdha-vaśena bhogān bhuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c02u:3133_0: prāptān api sarvān bāhyān gṛha-kṣetrādīnāntarān manorājya-rūpān vāsanā-mātra-rūpāṃś
GE07bhg4c02u:3133_1: ca pathi gacchaṃs tṛṇa-sparśa-rūpān kāmāṃs trividhān vihāyopekṣya śarīra-jīvana-mātre 'pi nispṛhaḥ san /
GE07bhg4c02u:3134: yato nirahaṅkāra śarīrendriyādāv ayam aham ity abhimāna-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3136_1: mamedam ity abhimāna-varjitaḥ san yaḥ pumāṃś carati prārabdha-karma-vaśena bhogān
GE07bhg4c02u:3136_2: bhuṅkte yādṛcchikatayā yatra kvāpi gacchatīti vā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3137: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ śāntiṃ sarva-saṃsāra-duḥkhoparama-lakṣaṇām avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttim adhigacchati jñāna-balena prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3141: kaścit tu kāmeṣu aviśvasan naiva tān bhuṅkte ity āha /
GE07bhg4c02u:3142: vihāyeti nirahaṅkāro nirmama iti deha-daihikeṣu ahaṃtā-mamatā-śūnyaḥ //71//
GE07bhg4c02u:3144_0: prāptān kāmān viṣayān sarvān vihāya śarīropajīvana-mātre 'pi nirmamo mamtā-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3144_1: nirahaṅkāro 'nātmani śarīre ātmābhimāna-śūnyaś carati tad-upajīvana-mātraṃ bhakṣayati
GE07bhg4c02u:3144_2: yatra kvāpi gacchati vā sa śāntiṃ labhate iti vrajeta kim ity asyottaram //71 //
GE07bhg4c02u:3147: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3149: śrīdharaḥ : uktāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ stuvann upasaṃharati eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3152: enāṃ parameśvarārādhanena viśuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān prāpya na vimuhyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3154: yato 'nta-kāle mṛtyu-samaye 'py asyāṃ lakṣa-mātram api sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇam brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ layam ṛcchati prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3155: kiṃ punar vaktavyaṃ bālyam ārabhya sthitvā prāpnotīti //72//
GE07bhg4c02u:3162: tad evaṃ caturṇāṃ praśnānām uttara-vyājena sarvāṇi sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇāni mumukṣu-kartavyatayā kathitāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:3163: samprati karma-yoga-phala-bhūtāṃ sāṅkhya-niṣṭhāṃ stuvann upasaṃharati eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3165: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṅkhye buddhir iti ca prāg uktā sthitir niṣṭhā sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-pūrvaka-paramātma-jñāna-lakṣaṇā brāhmī brahma-viṣayā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3167: enāṃ sthitiṃ prāpya yaḥ kaścid api pnar na vimuhyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3168: na hi jñāna-bādhitasyājñānasya punaḥ sambhavo 'sti anāditvenotpatty-asambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3169: asyāṃ sthitāv anta-kāle 'pi antye 'pi vaayasi sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇaṃ brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛttiṃ brahma-rūpaṃ nirvāṇam iti vā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3171: kim u vaktavyaṃ yo bramacaryād eva saṃnyasya yāvaj-jīvam asyāṃ brāhmyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3172: sthitāv avatiṣṭhate sa brahma-nirvāṇam ṛcchatīty api-śabdārthaḥ //72//
GE07bhg4c02u:3180: jñānaṃ karma ca vispaṣṭam aspaṣṭaṃ bhaktim uktavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:3187: kiṃ punar ākaumāraṃ brahma ṛcchati labhate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3188: nirvāṇam amṛta-rūpaṃ tat pradam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3189: nanu tasyāṃ sthitaḥ kathaṃ brahma prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3192: niṣkāma-karmabhir jñānī harim eva smaran bhavet /
GE07bhg4c02u:3197: [*ENDNOTE] This is a reference to chapter 11.25. See VCT to 18.28.
